description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人，中华人民共和国第一代最高领导人。他曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席，在此期间，他下令开展抗疟药物研究。1950年10月，他决定派兵入朝作战，组建中国人民志愿军。他率领部队在井冈山建立了第一个革命根据地。他十分赏识梅兰芳的艺术。他是文化大革命和大跃进运动的主要发动者和领导者，中共第一代领导集体的核心，并确定了民族区域自治制度。其执政时期普遍实行领导干部职务终身制。其著作《体育之研究》中的一句话被用作北京体育大学的校训精神。此外，他在中共八届十中全会上就小说《刘志丹》问题发表的言论，为该案的升级和扩大化提供了支持。1972年会见访华的田中角荣。阎明复曾为他与赫鲁晓夫的会谈担任翻译，并于1975年在其指示下获释。毛新宇的祖父，毛泽民之兄。魏京生因大跃进的后果而认为其是“刽子手”。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, and the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. He was also the first-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. As Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, he ordered the commencement of antimalarial drug research. In October 1950, he decided to send troops into Korea, forming the Chinese People's Volunteer Army. He led troops to establish the first revolutionary base in the Jinggang Mountains. He greatly admired Mei Lanfang's art. He was the main initiator and leader of the Cultural Revolution and the Great Leap Forward, the core of the first generation of CCP leadership, and established the system of national regional autonomy. During his rule, the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres was widely practiced. A phrase from his work 'A Study of Physical Education' is used as the spirit of Beijing Sport University's motto. Furthermore, his remarks on the novel 'Liu Zhidan' at the Tenth Plenary Session of the Eighth Central Committee of the CCP provided support for the escalation and expansion of the case. He met with Kakuei Tanaka during his visit to China in 1972. Yan Mingfu served as a translator for his meeting with Khrushchev and was released from prison in 1975 under his instruction. He was also the elder brother of Mao Zemin. Wei Jingsheng considered him a 'butcher' due to the consequences of the Great Leap Forward.

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省广安市广安区协兴镇牌坊村

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，改革开放的总设计师。在抗日战争和第二次国共内战期间，曾与李达、刘伯承长期共事。曾任晋冀鲁豫野战军及第二野战军政治委员、中国共产党中央书记处总书记。文革中被打倒。文革后，他领导拨乱反正并推动改革开放，成为中华人民共和国第二代最高领导人，但也被魏京生批评为独裁者。其曾担任中共中央军委主席、国家军委主席，提出“一国两制”构想，并主导推动了废除干部领导职务终身制。他在处理八六学潮问题上持强硬立场，批评胡耀邦，推动了随后的“反对资产阶级自由化”运动，是六四戒严及清场的主要决策者。他还曾在1958年主持会议批判粟裕，并支持了中国人民大学的复校。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and statesman, and the core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He served as the second-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from December 1978 to November 1989, and was known as the chief architect of Reform and Opening-up, though he was also criticized by Wei Jingsheng as a dictator. He worked closely with Li Da and Liu Bocheng during the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Second Chinese Civil War. During his leadership period, he also served as Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He led and promoted the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres. He took a hardline stance on the 1986 student demonstrations, criticized Hu Yaobang, and promoted the subsequent 'Anti-Bourgeois Liberalization Campaign'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖北省黄州府黄冈县回龙山镇林家大湾村

death_place.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国肯特省巴特瑙劳布县苏布拉嘎盆地

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的现代政治人物、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅，林立果之父。他曾任国防部部长、中共中央副主席、国务院副总理，是原中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一。毛泽东在中共九大上确立他为接班人，后在九一三事件中坠机身亡。在文化大革命期间，他曾迫害贺龙，并支持韦国清在广西镇压造反派。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician and military leader, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of National Defense.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝江苏省淮安府山阳县驸马巷

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、革命家、外交家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国及中国人民解放军的创建者和重要领导人之一，也是南昌起义的领导者之一。曾任中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理，并长期担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席等要职。他也是南开大学校友。在四一二事件中指挥上海工人武装，后被南京国民政府通缉。作为中共中央南方局负责人，他曾重视和支持育才学校，并亲自到校看望师生。他曾与毛泽东一同下令开展抗疟药物研究，并组建了523项目。在文革期间，他努力维持国家正常运转，也曾过问张孝骞的情况，但后期也曾支持韦国清镇压“4·22”派。他曾设法营救毛泽民等人。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, an important leader of the Chinese Communist Party, and one of the leaders of the Nanchang Uprising. He commanded the armed workers in Shanghai during the April 12th Incident and was later wanted by the Nanjing Nationalist Government. He was also an alumnus of Nankai University. As the head of the Southern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, he valued and supported Yucai School, and personally visited its teachers and students. He established Project 523 and, along with Mao Zedong, ordered the commencement of antimalarial drug research. During the Cultural Revolution, he strived to maintain the normal operation of the state and intervened in Zhang Xiaoqian's situation, but later also supported Wei Guoqing in suppressing the 'April 22' faction. He also attempted to rescue Mao Zemin and others.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东第四任妻子，毛岸青继母，中国政治人物、演员、文艺理论家，原国家级副职领导人，曾任中央文化革命小组副组长。她是文化大革命期间中国共产党的主要领导人之一，“四人帮”之首，魏京生在文革期间曾对其产生怀疑。
description.en: Mao Zedong's fourth wife and a prominent member of the Gang of Four, of whom Wei Jingsheng became suspicious during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中华人民共和国的重要政治人物，中国共产党高级领导人，原国家级正职领导人。四人帮核心成员，曾任上海市革委会主任、中央文革小组副组长、中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。

birth_place.zh-cn: 浙江省诸暨县直埠镇姚公埠村

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，中央文革小组成员，文革的理论旗手，发表《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。中国文化大革命时期的重要政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。
毛泽东指定的接班人，在他逝世后领导粉碎“四人帮”，成为中国最高领导人。中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾兼任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理、中央军事委员会主席，是至今唯一一位同时出任党政军三大最高领导职务的领导人。
description.en: Mao Zedong's designated successor, who served as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and Premier of the State Council.

birth_place.zh-cn: 广东省嘉应直隶州雁洋

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国开国元帅，中共元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的创建者和缔造者之一。曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央副主席、国防部部长等职，在粉碎“四人帮”事件中起了决定性作用。他提出设立台湾特别行政区的构想，也是凌孜的父亲。
description.en: Marshal of the PRC, played a decisive role in the smashing of the Gang of Four.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清四川省顺庆府南充县
birth_place.en: Nanchong County, Shunqing Prefecture, Sichuan Province, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 西德巴登-符腾堡州海德堡

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国副国级领导人之一，无产阶级革命家、军事家。曾任中共中央书记处书记、国务院副总理、解放军总参谋长（文革初期被打倒）、中华人民共和国公安部首任部长、国防部副部长等职，被授予中国人民解放军大将军衔。另有记录描述此人为罗瑞卿的第三任妻子。
description.en: One of the sub-national leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a proletarian revolutionary and military strategist. He served as Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, Vice Premier of the State Council, Chief of the General Staff of the PLA (purged during the Cultural Revolution), the first Minister of Public Security of the PRC, and Deputy Minister of National Defense. He was awarded the rank of PLA General. Another record describes this person as the third wife of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，曾任中宣部部长。文革初期被打倒。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, former head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原国家级正职领导人、中国人民解放军高级将领。曾任中共中央办公厅主任（期间作为阎明复的直接上级，并推荐其出任中共中央统战部部长），文革初期被打倒。历任中华人民共和国主席，中共中央政治局委员、中共中央军委副主席兼秘书长，是中共八大元老之一。他任国家主席、中央军委副主席兼秘书长期间，曾负责部署军队执行戒严；并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former national-level state leader, and high-ranking general of the People's Liberation Army, he was one of the Eight Elders of the CPC. He served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee (during which he was Yan Mingfu's direct superior and later recommended Yan to be the head of the United Front Work Department), and was purged during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution. His career also included serving as President of the People's Republic of China, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, and Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission. During his tenure as President and Vice Chairman of the CMC, he was responsible for deploying troops for martial law and demonstrated support for abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 明史学家、中国历史学家，因其剧作《海瑞罢官》在文革初期受到批判，被迫害致死。北京市副市长。
中国近现代小说家、散文家、剧作家，被广泛认为是中国近现代文学的代表人物。在文革初期因不堪迫害而投湖自尽。

中国共产党和中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人之一。曾任中共中央主席、总书记。文革后，主持平反冤假错案，派出工作组调查广西屠杀事件，积极推动真理标准大讨论、拨乱反正、改革开放并支持废除干部终身制，是改革开放早期的主要领导人之一，被视为改革派代表人物。在担任中共中央总书记期间，阎明复任中共中央统战部部长初期，胡耀邦是其直接上级。1986年，他批示认为党史题材作品不应虚构重大史实，导致小说《刘志丹》再次被停止发行。后因处理八六学潮的方式被党内保守派批评为纵容“资产阶级自由化”，而被迫辞职。其逝世是六四事件的导火索。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, one of the second generation of leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. After the Cultural Revolution, he presided over the redress of unjust, false, and wrong cases, dispatched working groups to investigate the Guangxi Massacre, actively promoted the great discussion on the criterion of truth, rectified past errors, and pushed for reform and opening up, supporting the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres. He was one of the main leaders in the early stages of Reform and Opening-up, and was regarded as a representative of reformists. During his tenure as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Hu Yaobang was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan first served as head of the United Front Work Department. In 1986, his instruction that works on Party history should not fictionalize major historical facts led to the novel 'Liu Zhidan' being withdrawn from distribution again. He was later forced to resign due to his handling of the 1986 student demonstrations, which was criticized by party conservatives as condoning 'bourgeois liberalization'. His death was a catalyst for the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人、政治人物，曾任国务院总理和中共中央总书记，被视为中共党内改革派领袖。在胡耀邦辞职后代理中共中央总书记，他通过讲话限制了“反对资产阶级自由化”运动的扩大化，使其在1987年夏天基本结束。文革后支持改革开放，但在六四事件中，因同情学生运动、反对戒严而被免去中共中央总书记职务并被长期软禁。在阎明复任中共中央书记处书记期间，赵紫阳是其直接上级。
description.en: A prominent political figure and former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He served as Premier of the State Council and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, and was regarded as a reformist leader within the Party. After Hu Yaobang's resignation, he became the acting General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and delivered a speech that curbed the expansion of the 'Anti-Bourgeois Liberalization Campaign', effectively ending it by the summer of 1987. While supporting reform and opening up after the Cultural Revolution, he was dismissed from his post as General Secretary and placed under long-term house arrest for sympathizing with student movements and opposing martial law during the Tiananmen Square incident. He was also Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as a secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心人物，自2012年起担任中华人民共和国最高领导人。现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。他被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者。他在中共二十大上获得第三任期，并于其任内通过宪法修正案取消了国家主席的任期限制。他于2013年9月和10月首次提出“一带一路”倡议。曾任浙江省人大常委会主任，并于第十一届全国人民代表大会期间当选为中华人民共和国副主席，当时他还担任中央港澳工作协调小组组长。其在全国政协会议期间与梁振英阵营委员的互动被外界解读为对梁振英的支持。2019年，他曾给北京体育大学研究生冠军班回信。他曾是薄熙来在中共十八大前的政治竞争对手，其一些政策被部分学者视为可能导致“文革2.0”。他也是曾被公开信要求辞职的对象。
description.en: Chinese politician and the core figure of the fifth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He has served as the supreme leader of the People's Republic of China since 2012, currently holding the titles of General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era. He secured a third term at the 20th CPC National Congress, and during his tenure, a constitutional amendment was passed to remove the term limit for the presidency. He first proposed the 'Belt and Road' initiative in September and October 2013. He formerly served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress, and was elected as Vice President of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress, at which time he also served as head of the Central Coordination Group for Hong Kong and Macau Affairs. His interaction with a member of Leung Chun-ying's camp during the National People's Congress was interpreted by outsiders as a sign of support for Leung. In 2019, he wrote a reply letter to the graduate champion class of Beijing Sport University. He was a political rival of Bo Xilai before the 18th CPC National Congress, and some of his policies are considered by certain scholars to potentially lead to a 'Cultural Revolution 2.0'. He was also the target of an open letter demanding his resignation.

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区钓鱼台国宾馆

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的实际指挥机构，取代了中央政治局和中央书记处的部分职能。文化大革命期间设立的中央权力机构，直接指挥文化大革命。
文革前夕负责文化工作的领导小组，由彭真领导，后被撤销。中央文化革命小组的前身，由彭真担任组长。
指1950年代末期中国共产党在中国大陆推行的“社会主义建设总路线、大跃进、人民公社”三项政策和运动。这是文化大革命前的政治运动，其挫败也是文化大革命的背景之一。
description.en: Refers to the three policies and movements promoted by the CCP in mainland China in the late 1950s: the General Line for Socialist Construction, the Great Leap Forward, and the People's Commune.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国在1959年至1961年期间，大跃进后发生的大规模饥荒，导致数千万人非正常死亡，并导致毛泽东退居二线。
description.en: Refers to the widespread famine that occurred in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进失败后，毛泽东为解决干部作风和经济管理等问题，在城乡开展的清政治、清经济、清组织、清思想的政治运动，被视为文化大革命的预演。
文化大革命期间各派群众组织之间发生的大规模武装暴力冲突事件，导致全面内战状态。其中，重庆的武斗尤为激烈。
description.en: Large-scale violent conflicts that occurred during the Cultural Revolution. The struggles in Chongqing were particularly intense.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命后期，由毛泽东发动、江青等人积极推行的政治运动。名义上批判林彪和孔子，实则针对周恩来等人。
群众自发悼念周恩来、抗议四人帮的运动，后被定性为反革命事件。悼念周恩来、反对“四人帮”的群众运动。
1976年10月6日，由时任中共中央第一副主席华国锋、中共中央副主席叶剑英、中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴等人策划发动，在北京市中南海怀仁堂拘捕“四人帮”及其在北京的骨干成员的政治事件，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: A political event planned by Hua Guofeng, then First Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Ye Jianying, Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, and Wang Dongxing, Director of the CCP General Office, to arrest the Gang of Four and their associates.

description.zh-cn: 文革结束后，由邓小平等人启动的，中华人民共和国于1978年12月起推行的一项以经济建设为中心，对内改革、对外开放为核心的社会经济政策与运动。这项政策带来的思想解放氛围，也是后来八六学潮发生的宏观背景。
description.en: The economic reform and opening-up policy implemented by the People's Republic of China since 1978. The atmosphere of intellectual liberation brought about by this policy provided the macro context for the 1986 student demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 法国发生的学生和工人抗议运动，受到中国文革的影响。
全称《中国共产党中央委员会通知》，是指导“文化大革命”的纲领性文件，标志着文革的全面发动。

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
en: Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party since the Founding of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央对建国以来若干重大历史问题（包括文化大革命）作出的官方定论文件，全面否定文化大革命，并对毛泽东的功过进行了评价。
description.en: A document that provided the official conclusion on several major historical issues of the CCP since the founding of the PRC, evaluating Mao Zedong's merits and demerits.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家、领导人，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记、苏联部长会议主席，二战期间同盟国“三巨头”之一。在雅尔塔会议上，他承诺对日作战，其领导的苏联出兵对日本的投降决策造成了重要影响。赫鲁晓夫对其的全盘否定是中苏论战和文革的重要背景。他还同意并决定由苏联帮助中国建立中国人民大学。
description.en: General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and a prominent leader of the Soviet Union. As one of the 'Big Three' Allied leaders during World War II, he promised at the Yalta Conference to enter the war against Japan, and the subsequent Soviet invasion had a major impact on Japan's decision to surrender.

zh-cn: 关于个人崇拜及其后果
en: On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上发表的秘密报告，全盘否定斯大林，深刻影响了毛泽东。
文化大革命的核心理论和实践之一。
中共八大元老之一，中国政治家、经济管理家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国第一代和第二代中央领导集体的重要成员。他以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。在文革中被下放。曾任中纪委第一书记，后任中共中央顾问委员会主任。他是六四事件中的保守派代表人物，曾支持对学生运动采取强硬措施，并曾推荐和保护李锐。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 由工农兵组成的宣传队伍，进驻各单位领导斗批改。

zh-cn: 第四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 文革后期召开的全国人民代表大会，通过了《七五宪法》。
文革期间在广东发生的系统性大屠杀。
因毛泽东将芒果转赠给工宣队而引发的对芒果的崇拜现象。

习仲勋是中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，陕甘边区革命根据地的主要创建者和领导者之一。他也是中共八大元老之一，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。曾任西北野战军副政委、国务院副总理。在1962年，他因审阅小说《刘志丹》手稿并提出修改意见，被打成“习贾刘反党集团”核心成员，遭受长期审查、关押和迫害。他还曾任中共广东省委第一书记，并向中央建议在深圳等地建立“贸易合作区”。他是习近平之父。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was a prominent political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He was one of the main founders and leaders of the Shaan-Gan Border Revolutionary Base Area, and later served as Deputy Political Commissar of the Northwest Field Army and Vice Premier of the State Council. He was also one of the Eight Elders of the CPC, notably supporting the abolition of lifelong tenure for leading positions through his own retirement. In 1962, he faced severe persecution, being labeled a core member of the 'Xi-Jia-Liu Anti-Party Clique' after reviewing and providing suggestions for the novel 'Liu Zhidan,' leading to long-term investigation, detention, and persecution. Post-Cultural Revolution, he served as the First Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, where he famously proposed establishing 'trade cooperation zones' in Shenzhen and other areas. He is the father of current Chinese leader Xi Jinping.

birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省忻州直隶州定襄县蒋村
birth_place.en: Jiang Village, Dingxiang County, Xinzhou Prefecture, Shanxi Province

death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，中华人民共和国开国元勋，原副国级领导人，邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一、二、三代主要领导人之一。曾任国务院副总理、中共中央顾问委员会副主任。在文化大革命中被打倒监禁。曾就读山西省立国民师范学校。他是薄熙来之父，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。该人物还有一位二女，其生卒年为1946年至2019年11月24日，以及一位三子，生于1951年，和一位四子。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China political figure, a founding father of the People's Republic of China, a former Vice Premier of the State Council, and a former deputy national leader. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP during Deng Xiaoping's administration and one of the main leaders of the first, second, and third generations of the CCP and PRC. He was also imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution and studied at Shanxi Provincial National Normal School. He was the father of Bo Xilai and supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement. This individual also had a second daughter, who lived from 1946 to November 24, 2019, a third son, born in 1951, and a fourth son.

description.zh-cn: 1989年4月中旬开始，由高校学生发起，持续近两个月的学生民主示威运动。广义上指波及中华人民共和国全境的示威活动；狭义上特指发生在北京天安门广场的学生示威运动及随后的清场行动，最终以6月4日凌晨的武力清场告终。八六学潮被认为是其前奏，为该事件埋下伏笔。阎明复因在此事件中的表现而被免去中共中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: A series of student-led pro-democracy demonstrations in China in 1989, primarily held in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, which ended with a military crackdown. The 1986 student demonstrations are considered a precursor that set the stage for this event. This political event led to Yan Mingfu's dismissal from his post as secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat and other positions due to his actions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理，在中共二十届一中全会后成为排名第二的中共中央政治局常委。曾任中共上海市委书记、浙江省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、中共中央政治局常委，曾任中共中央纪委书记、中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，中国共产党中央政治局常委。现任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席（接替汪洋），曾任中央书记处第一书记（蔡奇的前任），并担任中共二十大秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the principal leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He is currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (succeeding Wang Yang). He previously served as First Secretary of the Central Secretariat (predecessor to Cai Qi) and Secretary-General of the 20th CPC National Congress.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市西城区人民大会堂

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关和国家立法机关，负责选举和罢免最高人民法院院长。
中国共产党在第一次国共内战期间建立的政权。
抗日战争时期中国国民党与中国共产党的第二次合作，是为共同抗日而结成的统一战线。
中国共产党在第二次国共内战时期的主要武装力量，前身为中国工农红军、八路军和新四军。后改编为中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。曾计划进攻台湾，但因朝鲜战争爆发而被迫放弃，并曾执行六四戒严和清场任务。
description.en: The main armed force of the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Chinese Civil War, formerly known as the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, Eighth Route Army, and New Fourth Army. It was later reorganized into the primary armed force of the People's Republic of China. It had planned to attack Taiwan but was forced to abandon the plan due to the outbreak of the Korean War, and carried out the June Fourth martial law and clearing operations.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛爆发的一场战争，它是朝鲜民主主义人民共和国（朝鲜）与大韩民国（韩国）之间的军事冲突。一方为朝鲜、中国人民志愿军，另一方为韩国、美国领导的联合国军。作为冷战时期的一场区域性冲突，它也导致美国介入台湾海峡，阻止了解放军攻台计划。战争最终以《朝鲜停战协定》的签署而告终，但未签订和平条约。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953. It was a military conflict between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (North Korea) and the Republic of Korea (South Korea). On one side were North Korea and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army (China), and on the other were South Korea and a United Nations force led by the United States. As a regional conflict during the Cold War, it also led to U.S. intervention in the Taiwan Strait, preventing the PLA's plan to invade Taiwan. The war ended with the signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement, but no peace treaty was signed.

description.zh-cn: 全球性的国际组织，二战后成立，旨在促进国际合作和防止未来冲突。罗斯福是其关键推动者。其大会多次通过决议谴责俄罗斯的入侵行为。
description.en: An international organization founded after World War II, with Roosevelt as a key driving force. Its General Assembly has passed multiple resolutions condemning Russia's invasion.

description.zh-cn: 1992年1月至2月，邓小平对中国南方城市，包括武昌、深圳、珠海、上海等地进行了巡视，并发表了一系列重要讲话（即南方谈话）。这些讲话对推动改革开放有重要意义，不仅重新启动了因六四事件而停滞的改革开放进程，也深化了改革开放。
负责监管国家之间贸易规则，并监督成员经济体之间执行各项贸易协定的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛是中华人民共和国第四代主要领导人、中国共产党第四代中央领导集体的核心人物。他曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是习近平的前任，被视为李克强的政治导师。在任中共中央总书记、国家主席期间，他曾亲临神舟五号发射现场观看发射过程，并在航天员出征仪式上发表讲话，并为梁振英及香港第四届政府主要官员监誓。他作为时任中共中央总书记，主持了决定对陈良宇进行立案调查的中央政治局会议。2012年卸任所有党政军职务实现“裸退”，此举被认为是完善废除干部领导职务终身制的表现。薄熙来曾对其进行窃听，在薄熙来事件中，胡锦涛是处理该事件的主要决策者之一。
description.en: Hu Jintao was the former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China and the core figure of the fourth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He was Xi Jinping's predecessor and was regarded as Li Keqiang's political mentor. While serving as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President, he personally watched the launch of Shenzhou 5 on-site, delivered a speech at the astronaut's departure ceremony, and administered the oath of office for Leung Chun-ying and the principal officials of the fourth-term Hong Kong government. As the then General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, he presided over the Politburo meeting that decided to launch an investigation into Chen Liangyu. In 2012, he implemented a 'naked retirement' by relinquishing all party, government, and military positions, a move seen as perfecting the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres. Bo Xilai conducted surveillance on him, and during the Bo Xilai incident, Hu was one of the key decision-makers in handling the case.

description.zh-cn: 李克强是中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院总理，原正国级领导人。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。他曾是薄熙来在中共十八大前的政治竞争对手，并主持二十大开幕会。在任国务院总理期间，他曾在亚洲和欧洲访问时推广“一带一路”倡议，并曾在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后致函祝贺。在记者会上被问及《穹顶之下》时，他回避了直接评价。
description.en: Li Keqiang was a political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, formerly a national-level leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. During the 11th National People's Congress, he was appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He was a political rival of Bo Xilai before the 18th National Congress of the CPC and presided over the opening ceremony of the 20th National Congress. During his tenure as Premier, he promoted the 'Belt and Road' initiative during visits to Asia and Europe, and also sent a letter of congratulations after Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize. When asked about 'Under the Dome' at a press conference, he avoided a direct comment.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国政府于2013年倡议并主导的国际经济合作倡议（由习近平提出），旨在加强区域互联互通，并形成跨国经济带。

zh-cn: 亚洲基础设施投资银行

description.zh-cn: 一个由中国倡议设立的多边开发银行，为“一带一路”等亚洲基建项目提供资金。
由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）所引发的全球大流行疫情。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

description.zh-cn: 一个横跨东欧和北亚的联邦共和国，是与中国接壤的北邻国家，也是苏联的主要继承国，继承了其航天能力。该国是金砖国家创始成员国，与北约东扩存在持续紧张关系，并于2022年2月24日全面入侵乌克兰。
description.en: A federal republic spanning Eastern Europe and Northern Asia, it is a northern neighbor bordering China and the main successor of the Soviet Union, having inherited its space capabilities. The country is a founding member of BRICS, experiences persistent tensions with NATO expansion, and launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine on February 24, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国，实行总统制。作为世界主要大国，它是第二次世界大战同盟国主要成员，也是二战期间苏联的盟国之一。它对日本使用原子弹并主导了战后的占领。作为苏联在冷战时期的主要对手，它在朝鲜战争中领导联合国军，是停战谈判和《朝鲜停战协定》的主要参与方。苏联解体后，它成为世界唯一超级大国，也是世界上第二个实现载人航天的国家。它与中国有复杂的竞合关系：在军阀割据时期，为维护在华利益，与英国一同支持直系军阀；在第二次国共内战期间支持中国国民党，并在越南战争期间支持南越。它对“一带一路”倡议持批评态度，指责其为“债务陷阱外交”并推出竞争性基建计划。同时，它还是乌克兰的主要军事援助国之一。此外，李洪志于1998年起定居于此，第四代仓颉输入法也于1985年在此发表。
description.en: A federal republic in North America that operates under a presidential system. As a major world power, it was a principal member of the Allied powers in World War II, and one of the Soviet Union's allies during the war. It used atomic bombs against Japan and led the subsequent occupation. As the Soviet Union's main rival during the Cold War, it led the United Nations Command in the Korean War and was a principal party in the armistice negotiations and the resulting agreement. After the collapse of the Soviet Union, it became the world's sole superpower and is also the second country to achieve human spaceflight. It has a complex competitive-cooperative relationship with China: During the Warlord Era, it supported the Zhili clique along with the United Kingdom to protect its interests in China; it supported the Kuomintang during the Chinese Civil War, and South Vietnam during the Vietnam War. It is one of the main providers of military assistance to Ukraine. Additionally, it is the country where Li Hongzhi has resided since 1998, criticizing the "Belt and Road" initiative as "debt trap diplomacy" and launching competing infrastructure plans, and where the fourth generation of the Cangjie input method was released in 1985.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
中华人民共和国宪法（八二宪法）
en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China (1982)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第四部宪法，也被称为“八二宪法”，是现行宪法。该宪法的颁行加强了民族区域自治制度的建设，其第三十一条规定了设立特别行政区的法律依据。它还规定了国家主席等领导职务的任期制，正式从法律上废除了领导干部职务终身制，并规定实行初等义务教育。
description.en: The fourth constitution of the People's Republic of China, also known as the '82 Constitution', is the current constitution. It stipulated term limits for leading positions such as the President, formally abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres in law, and also stipulates the implementation of compulsory primary education.

en: Constituent departments of the State Council
Constituent Department of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 国务院组成部门是中华人民共和国国务院的组成机构类别，承担国务院的基本行政管理职能。
曾任国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军开国上将，中共八大元老之一。曾担任中华人民共和国副主席，接替乌兰夫。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Ulanhu as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人口福利基金会会长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the president of the China Population Welfare Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，曾任中央文革小组副组长、国务院副总理、全国政协副主席。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国原正国级领导人，中共八大元老之一，中共党内改革派代表人物。他在改革开放初期在安徽推行农村改革，曾任国务院副总理、全国人大常委会委员长，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，周恩来义子。曾任国务院总理、全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央政治局常委。他曾于六四事件期间宣布戒严令，被认为是中共党内保守派的代表人物。他也是育才学校校友。阎明复任民政部副部长期间，李鹏是时任总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, foster son of Zhou Enlai. He served as the fourth Premier of the People's Republic of China and the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He declared martial law during the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989 and was considered a representative figure of the conservative faction within the CCP. He was also an alumnus of Yucai School. Li Peng was the incumbent Premier when Yan Mingfu served as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。
中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委、上海市市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 李维汉与金维映之子，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物、军事领导人，中国人民解放军上将（1988年授予），曾任中华人民共和国国防部部长。秦天与秦卫江之父。
description.en: A political figure and military leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a General of the People's Liberation Army (awarded in 1988), former Minister of National Defense of the PRC. Father of Qin Tian and Qin Weijiang.

description.zh-cn: 原中共北京市委书记，后因贪腐案下台。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、对外贸易经济合作部部长、天津市副市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a former national-level principal leader, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and Vice Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、上海市委书记，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China and a former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将，曾任国防部部长，时任解放军总参谋长，参与指挥戒严部队。
中国维吾尔族政治人物。
description.en: Chinese politician of Uyghur ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记、国务院副总理、中共中央政治局常委。其患病离职为中纪委调查上海社保案提供了契机。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo. His illness and departure from office provided an opportunity for the CCDI to investigate the Shanghai social security case.

description.zh-cn: 回族，中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共安徽省委书记。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。他因腐败问题在反腐运动中落马，被判无期徒刑。在本案中，曾作出批示，要求正确引导舆论，被指意图掩盖政府干预司法的事实。
description.en: Former Politburo Standing Committee member and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission. He fell during the anti-corruption campaign due to corruption and was sentenced to life imprisonment. In a specific case, he issued an instruction to 'correctly guide public opinion,' which was seen as an attempt to cover up government interference in the judiciary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院副总理，并在薄熙来被免职后接任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、北京市市长、中共中央纪律检查委员会书记，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly a national-level leader, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Mayor of Beijing, and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC. He was also appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会，通称中央军事委员会，简称中央军委、军委，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国武装力量最高军事领导机构的总称，包括中国共产党中央军事委员会、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会两个机构。受中国共产党中央委员会和全国人民代表大会领导。在土地革命战争后期、抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期，它是中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。——机构沿革：1926年11月上旬，为准备上海工人武装起义，中共中央决定将中央军事部改为中央军事委员会兼上海区军事委员会，周恩来任书记。1927年5月25日召开的中共中央政治局常委会将中央军事委员会改称中央军人部（仍习惯性称中央军事部）。1930年2月，军事部与军委合二为一。1931年11月25日，设中华苏维埃共和国中央革命军事委员会、负责红军作战和建设。仍设中央军事委员会。1937年7月，中革军委与中央军委改组中共中央革命军事委员会。1945年8月，新成立中央军事委员会。1949年，改称中国人民革命军事委员会，作为中华人民共和国成立初期的最高军事领导机构。1954年9月28日，通过首部宪法，设中共中央军事委员会。1982年12月4日，通过八二宪法，成立中华人民共和国中央军事委员会。此后，中共中央军委和国家中央军委的组成人员基本相同，实际上是“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: The supreme military leading body in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

发生在越南民主共和国（北越）与越南共和国（南越）及其盟友之间的一场长期战争。这场战争发生于20世纪中叶，期间北越军队曾因疟疾问题向中国求助，促成了523项目的启动，并引发了伯克利学生的大规模反战运动。
description.en: A prolonged war fought between the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) and the Republic of Vietnam (South Vietnam) and their respective allies. This conflict, which occurred in the mid-20th century, saw North Vietnamese forces seek Chinese assistance for their malaria problem, leading to the initiation of Project 523, and also prompted large-scale anti-war movements by Berkeley students.

1936年12月12日，张学良、杨虎城在西安发动“兵谏”（亦称军事政变），扣留了时任国民政府军事委员会委员长的蒋中正，要求停止内战、一致抗日。此次事件促成了第二次国共合作，并结束了第一次国共内战。
description.en: On December 12, 1936, Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng launched a 'remonstrance by military force' (also known as a military coup) in Xi'an, detaining Chiang Kai-shek, the head of the Nationalist government's Military Affairs Commission. They demanded an end to the civil war and a united front against Japan. This event led to the Second United Front and ended the First Chinese Civil War.

description.en: The theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics, primarily founded by Xi Jinping (then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee), serves as the guiding ideology of the Communist Party of China. Its core content is summarized as 'Ten Clarifications,' 'Fourteen Adherences,' and 'Thirteen Aspects of Achievements'. It was written into the Party Constitution at the 19th Party Congress in 2017, and into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China in 2018.

中国共产党内的理论家和政治家，曾任毛泽东秘书、中共中央政治局委员。

zh-cn: 第六届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
全国人民代表大会专门委员会
en: Special Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人大下设的常设性工作机构
中国政治人物、法学家
中国政治人物
中国政治人物
中国政治人物
中国政治人物，曾任江西省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族。曾任中共上海市委常委、中共湖南省委书记、湖南省人民政府省长、中共黑龙江省委副书记等职。现任第十四届全国人民代表大会农业与农村委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity. He has served as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee, Governor of Hunan Province, and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee. He is currently the Chairman of the Agriculture and Rural Affairs Committee of the 14th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委常委。
中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国共产党与中国工农红军主要领导者之一，中共五大书记之一。他曾与萧克率领红六军团西征，李达时任参谋长。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China. He, along with Xiao Ke, led the Red Sixth Army Corps on the Westward Expedition, during which Li Da served as Chief of Staff.

description.zh-cn: 任弼时曾就读的中学。
中国近现代思想家、政治家、革命家，新文化运动的主要开创人和领袖之一，中国共产党主要创始人之一，并曾担任中国共产党首任总书记。他也是民国初年反对将孔教立为国教的主要力量之一。在其任期内，于四一二事件中被南京国民政府列为首要通缉犯。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, a key figure and one of the initiators of the New Culture Movement. He was a main founder and the first General Secretary of the Communist Party of China. He was also one of the leading opponents of establishing Confucianism as the state religion in the early Republic of China. During his tenure, he was listed as a primary wanted criminal by the Nanjing Nationalist Government following the April 12th Incident.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Chinese Communist Party
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the CCP
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 东北军将领。
苏联军事学院，是苏联武装力量培养诸兵种合成军队军官的最高军事学府。刘伯承曾在此学习。
description.en: A high-level military educational institution of the Soviet Armed Forces, where Liu Bocheng once studied.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承与汪荣华之子，曾任装甲兵部队作战部副部长，少将。
description.en: Son of Liu Bocheng and Wang Ronghua, former deputy director of the Operations Department of the Armored Forces, Major General.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo of the Communist Party of China
Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的重要领导机构之一，是其常设机构。在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间，行使中央委员会的职权。其组成人员是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的党和国家领导人。该机构曾作出对陈良宇立案调查的决定。
description.en: One of the central leadership bodies and a standing institution of the Chinese Communist Party. It exercises the functions and powers of the Central Committee when the plenary session of the Central Committee is not in session. Its members are party and state leaders of the CCP and the People's Republic of China. This body once made the decision to investigate Chen Liangyu.

en: West Route Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 1936年10月由中国工农红军红四方面军主力2.18万人，在甘肃靖远西渡黄河后，称河西部队，后改称西路军。
description.en: Formed in October 1936 by the main force of the Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army after crossing the Yellow River, it was tasked with establishing a base in Hexi and opening a route to the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西南地区的派出机构。
民国时期四川地方军队的称谓，朱德曾在此进行动员工作

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝河南省陈州府项城县袁张营
birth_place.en: Yuanzhangying, Xiangcheng, Chenzhou, Henan, Qing dynasty

description.zh-cn: 中国清末民初的军事家、政治家，北洋军的创始者与领导者，也是北洋军阀的奠基人。曾逼迫清帝溥仪退位，后任中华民国临时大总统及第一任正式大总统，并意图建立中华帝国但未能正式登基。在山东巡抚任上，他上奏创办山东大学堂。他被广泛认为是刺杀宋教仁的幕后主使。
description.en: A Chinese military and government official during the late Qing dynasty and the early Republic of China. He was the founder and leader of the Beiyang Army, served as the Provisional and Formal President of the Republic of China, and later attempted to establish the Empire of China, although he was never formally enthroned. He was widely considered to be the mastermind behind the assassination of Song Jiaoren.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，北洋军阀直系首领之一，也是直系的代表人物，以其军事才能闻名，是直系军阀的实际军事领导者，为北伐战争的讨伐对象。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China, one of the leaders and a representative figure of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang Warlords, known for his military skills and as the de facto military leader of the clique, who was an object of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将和政治人物，奉系军阀领袖张作霖长子，东北军将领，西安事变发动者之一。继承其父统治东北，后宣布东北易帜归顺国民政府。他曾指挥东北军在中东路事件中与苏联作战。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China who controlled Northeast China, leader of the Northeastern Army, and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident. He commanded the Northeastern Army against the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，二十八个半布尔什维克成员，曾任张闻天的前任（中共中央总书记），是第五次反围剿期间的实际领导者之一，后在黑茶山空难中遇难。
共产国际派往中国的苏联军事顾问，曾在中国工农红军中担任指挥职务。
彝族沽基族首领
中华民国军事及政治人物，晋系军阀首领，长期统治山西省。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, representative of the Jin clique.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争中八路军发动的一次大规模战役
中国反帝国主义的群众运动。
刘少奇与王前的儿子。
刘少奇与王前的女儿。
刘少奇与王光美的二女儿。
华国锋长女
中国人民解放军将领。
中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、北京市委第一书记、北京市市长，也曾任中共北京市委第二书记，并参与策划粉碎四人帮事件。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, First Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee, and Mayor of Beijing. He also served as the Second Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee and participated in planning the smashing of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗巴列维王朝的最后一位国王。
文化大革命期间湖南省的权力机构。
文化大革命期间国务院的办事机构。
叶剑英次子。
由中国共产党领导的针对中国国民党的武装起义。
中华民国时期军事及政治人物，粤系军阀的代表人物。他曾炮轰总统府，也曾与孙中山合作但之后反目。
description.en: A military and political figure in the Republic of China era, representative of the Yue clique. He once cooperated with Sun Yat-sen but later became his opponent.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派领袖、革命家，曾任黄埔军校党代表。
description.en: A revolutionary of the Kuomintang, served as the Party Representative of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国全国人大常委会告台湾同胞书》是由全国人民代表大会常务委员会发表的文件，标志着中华人民共和国对台政策的转变，并宣告停止对金门等岛屿的炮击。
description.en: A document issued by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, marking a shift in the PRC's policy towards Taiwan and announcing the cessation of shelling of islands like Kinmen.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将。原国民党华北剿匪总司令，在平津战役中率部接受和平改编，促成北平和平解放。中国军事家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国水利部、水利电力部部长。
description.en: General (Second Class) of the Republic of China Army. He was the former Commander-in-Chief of the Kuomintang's North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters and led his troops to accept peaceful reorganization during the Pingjin Campaign, facilitating the peaceful liberation of Beiping. A Chinese military strategist and politician, he later served as Minister of Water Resources and Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的省会、副省级市和首批沿海开放城市。
周恩来胞弟
位于中国天津市的一所著名综合性研究型大学，由教育家严修、张伯苓创办。周恩来、姚依林、孟凡利等曾就读于此。
description.en: A famous comprehensive research university located in Tianjin, China, and Meng Fanli's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，林立果、林立衡之母，曾任中共第九届中央政治局委员，林彪反革命集团案主犯之一，在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Wife of Lin Biao, mother of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，革命烈士，在四一二事件后的搜捕中被杀害。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China, who was killed in the roundups following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国副总统及第37任总统。他于1973年与田中角荣在白宫会面。
description.en: An American politician who served as Vice President and the 37th President of the United States. He met with Kakuei Tanaka at the White House in 1973.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀的第二任妻子。
彭德怀的侄女。
晚清时期由曾国藩组建的湖南地方武装，其活动延续至民国初年，是清朝镇压太平天国的主要军事力量。
湖南督军。中华民国军事将领。
中国共产党党员，对彭德怀早期思想有影响。
国民革命军第18师师长。
中华民国将领，国军整编第29军军长，在宜川战役中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China who was killed in action during the Yichuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，青海王。
原新疆警备总司令。
朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人，被尊为“共和国永远的主席”，曾任朝鲜总理。在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: Founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军元帅，中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国领导人之一。曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任、中央人民政府最高人民检察署检察长。
时任中共湖南省委第一书记，因在庐山会议支持彭德怀被打成反党集团成员。

zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·拉祖瓦耶夫
弗拉基米尔·尼古拉耶维奇·拉祖瓦耶夫

birth_place.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国库尔斯克省阿列克谢耶夫卡村

description.zh-cn: 苏联军事将领、外交官，陆军中将军衔。曾参与俄国内战、苏芬战争、第二次世界大战和朝鲜战争。苏德战争期间历任多个方面军及集团军要职，朝鲜战争期间任苏联驻朝鲜特命全权大使兼朝鲜人民军总顾问。
description.en: Soviet military leader and diplomat with the rank of Lieutenant General. Participated in the Russian Civil War, Winter War, World War II, and the Korean War. Held key positions in various fronts and armies during the Soviet-German War, and served as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the USSR to North Korea and Chief Military Advisor to the Korean People's Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领及政治人物，西北军领袖，民国军阀，因其部队被称为“基督将军”。曾发动北京政变将溥仪逐出紫禁城，并创办了西北军第二军官学校。他曾应邀到育才学校演讲。
description.en: A warlord in the Republic of China, leader of the Guominjun, known as the 'Christian General'. He also founded the Northwest Army Second Military Officers' School and was responsible for expelling Puyi from the Forbidden City during the Beijing Coup. He was also invited to give a speech at Yucai School.

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第四方面军
en: Fourth Front Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，徐向前是其主要军事领导人，长征时期由张国焘领导。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. Xu Xiangqian was one of its main military leaders, and it was led by Zhang Guotao during the Long March.

en: Alumni Association of Huangpu Military Academy

description.zh-cn: 由黄埔军校校友组成的联谊组织，宋希濂曾任副会长。
description.en: An organization composed of alumni of the Whampoa Military Academy, where Song Xilian served as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 朱德的第五位妻子
推翻清朝统治、建立中华民国的全国性资产阶级民主革命。此革命始于1911年清朝武昌起义爆发，共和派革命军成功使清宣统帝退位。北洋军初期虽奉命镇压，但袁世凯后利用其军事实力逼迫清帝退位，并攫取了革命果实。在此期间，载沣顺应潮流辞去摄政王之职。
description.en: A nationwide revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China. The Beiyang Army was initially ordered to suppress it, but Yuan Shikai later used its military power to force the Qing emperor's abdication and seize the fruits of the revolution. During this period, Zaifeng also resigned from his position as Prince-Regent in response to the changing times.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派领导人
建国初期中国共产党在党政机关和工商界开展的政治运动
清末民初著名军事家，护国运动的主要组织者和领导者，曾遭遇袁世凯派遣的刺客暗杀但幸免于难。
description.en: A famous military strategist of the late Qing and early Republic of China periods, a key organizer and leader of the National Protection War, who survived an assassination attempt by assassins sent by Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的前妻。
越南民主共和国国防部长。

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师

description.zh-cn: 八路军的三个主力师之一。
抗日战争期间八路军首次集中较大兵力对日军的一次成功伏击战。
特指文革期间对毛泽东的个人崇拜。
毛泽东的第二任妻子，毛岸英之母，毛新宇的祖母。
毛泽东与杨开慧的次子，中国共产党党员，翻译家，毛新宇之父。
description.en: Second son of Mao Zedong, member of the Chinese Communist Party, and translator.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家和教育家，毛泽东在湖南省立第一师范学校的教员，被誉为“延安五老”之一。
中国共产主义的先驱，中国共产党的主要创始人之一、早期主要领导人，曾安排毛泽东在北京大学图书馆工作。1927年4月28日在北京被张作霖下令绞刑处决。
description.en: A pioneer of Chinese communism and one of the main founders of the Chinese Communist Party. He was executed by hanging in Beijing on April 28, 1927, under the orders of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，新四军的创建人和主要领导人之一，曾任新四军副军长兼政委，中共苏区中央分局书记。他曾安排护送瞿秋白转移，并在战略问题上与叶挺存在分歧。
毛泽东的哲学著作。
中国人民解放军开国上将，罗荣桓的亲家。
中国人民解放军开国上将，空军首任政治委员。
中华民国军事将领。
聂荣臻女婿，中国人民解放军上将，中国工程院院士，曾任国防科工委主任。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, former Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 位于西北欧的联邦君主立宪制国家，欧盟和北约的创始成员国之一。该国也是富通集团总部所在地。
description.en: A federal constitutional monarchy in Northwest Europe, it is one of the founding members of the EU and NATO. It is also home to the Fortis Group headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 由蒋中正在上海发动的针对中国共产党的武力清党行动，导致国共两党正式决裂，并成为第一次国共内战的导火索之一。
description.en: A violent purge of Chinese Communist Party members in Shanghai, initiated by Chiang Kai-shek, which led to the formal split between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party, and served as one of the catalysts for the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军中将，在黄土岭战斗中被击毙
中国空气动力学家和系统科学家，工程控制论创始人之一，中国载人航天奠基人，“两弹一星”功勋奖章获得者，被誉为“中国航天之父”、“中国导弹之父”。张纯如为其撰写了传记《中国导弹之父——钱学森之谜》。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamicist and systems scientist, one of the founders of engineering cybernetics, and a founding figure of China's manned space program, known as the 'Father of Chinese Missiles', 'Father of Chinese Aerospace', and 'Father of Chinese rocketry'. He was awarded the 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' Meritorious Award. Iris Chang wrote his biography 'Thread of the Silkworm'.

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将
中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，中国文联原党组成员、书记处书记，第十届、第十一届全国政协委员，董必武与何连芝之女。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, former party group member and secretary of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles, a member of the 10th and 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, and the daughter of Dong Biwu.

description.zh-cn: 清末由孙中山在日本东京成立的革命政党，由华兴会等多个革命团体合并而成，是中国近代第一个全国性的革命政党。
description.en: A revolutionary party founded by Sun Yat-sen in Tokyo, Japan, formed by the merger of several revolutionary groups including the Huaxinghui.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人之一，中共一大代表。他也是中国共产党早期领导人，曾与毛泽民一同在新疆工作并最终被杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and one of its founders, a delegate to the First National Congress of the CCP. He worked with Mao Zemin in Xinjiang and was killed alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪20年代在苏联莫斯科创办的、以孙中山名字命名的大学。邓小平、王稼祥、杨尚昆、董必武曾在此就读。
description.en: A Soviet school for training cadres for the Chinese revolution.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会党校
en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的机构，是中国共产党培养党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。薄一波曾在此学习。
description.en: An institution under the direct authority of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, serving as the highest academy for training high- and middle-ranking party officials and Marxist theorists. Bo Yibo once studied here.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的基本大法。
董必武儿媳之父
宋庆龄之弟，中华民国政治家、外交家、金融家，曾任财政部长。
description.en: Chinese statesman, diplomat, and financier who served as Minister of Finance.

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军第120师

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军（八路军）的三个主力师之一
邓小平的长子。中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国政协副主席，残疾人权益倡导者。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second son.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国计划生育

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的人口控制政策。
美国政治家，第39任美国总统。
美国政治家，曾任美国总统。
陈云长子，国家开发银行前董事长
时任广西自治区主席、广西壮族自治区革命委员会主任，被认为是广西大屠杀的主要组织者。
中国共产党高级理论家，曾任中央文革小组成员。

zh-cn: 首都中学红卫兵联合行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期北京的一个红卫兵组织，主要由高干子弟组成，后因反对中央文革小组被打压。魏京生是其成员之一。
description.en: A Red Guard organization in Beijing during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, of which Wei Jingsheng was a member.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会
en: 11th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1977年至1982年间的中央领导机构，其第五次全体会议于1980年2月决定重新设立中央书记处。在此期间，其第十一届中央委员会第六次全体会议通过了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China from 1977 to 1982. Its Fifth Plenary Session in February 1980 decided to re-establish the Central Secretariat. During this period, its Sixth Plenary Session (the Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee) adopted the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，文革期间任副总参谋长。
民国时期湖南省省长。
文化大革命时期北京红卫兵“五大领袖”之一。
康生第二任妻子，曾任康生办公室主任，第四、五届全国人大常委会委员，中共九、十、十一届中央委员。
康生与陈宜之子，曾任中共杭州市委书记。

en: East China Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会的上级机构。
description.en: The superior body of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 一所以人文社会科学为主的综合性研究型全国重点大学，直属于中华人民共和国教育部。
中国共产党早期领导人。后叛变，曾指控康生叛变，最终被康生下令枪决。
中共情报工作者。
毛泽东晚年英文翻译。
中国文艺理论家、文学翻译家、文艺活动家。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的部门，负责制定和管理国民经济计划的宏观调控部门。该机构存在于1952年至1998年间，其中自1954年起作为国务院组成部门。
description.en: A former department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national economic planning.

description.zh-cn: 曾是中山大学的前身，现为位于中国广州市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: Formerly the predecessor of Sun Yat-sen University, it is now a major research university in Guangzhou, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属事业单位，是《人民日报》的出版单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and the publisher of the People's Daily.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任铁道部副部长。
description.en: An admiral in the People's Liberation Army of China, formerly served as Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，张又侠之父。
时任中共云南省委第一书记。他因不同意小说《刘志丹》出版，并向康生报告，成为引发此案的关键人物之一。
description.en: Then First Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Committee. He became one of the key figures in triggering the case by disagreeing with the publication of the novel 'Liu Zhidan' and reporting it to Kang Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，曾任中共上海市委第一书记
中国共产党早期领导人、工人运动领袖。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and a leader of the labor movement.

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第二方面军

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一
中国共产党和中华人民共和国正国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处排名第一的书记、中共中央办公厅主任。曾任中共三明市委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, a secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. Former Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1921年中共一大前在中国各地及海外成立的共产主义小组
由列宁领导的布尔什维克发动的革命，推翻了俄国临时政府。
description.en: A revolution led by Lenin's Bolsheviks that overthrew the Russian Provisional Government.

zh-cn: 有中国特色的社会主义

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党根据本国国情，将马克思主义基本原理与中国具体实际相结合而形成的政治经济理论，也是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的官方意识形态及国策。
description.en: A political and economic theory formulated by the Communist Party of China by adapting the basic principles of Marxism to the specific conditions of China.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的执政党，将列宁主义纳入其官方学说。
description.en: The ruling political party of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party
Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee
Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Organization Department of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门之一，负责党组织建设、干部队伍建设和人才工作。该部门于1979年递交报告，为小说《刘志丹》案平反。自2018年起，统一管理中央机构编制委员会办公室。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for party organization construction, cadre team construction, and talent work. In 1979, this department submitted a report to rehabilitate the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case. Since 2018, it has centrally managed the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会政策研究室
国务院农村发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共中央书记处书记、中共中央统战部部长、全国政协副主席等职。因在六四事件中的表现被撤职，后复出任民政部副部长，并长期从事慈善事业。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a former deputy state leader. He served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC and head of the United Front Work Department. He was dismissed for his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, later returned to politics as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs, and was long involved in philanthropy.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆胞弟，解放军上将。曾任中共中央军委秘书长。在担任解放军总政治部主任期间，参与指挥戒严部队。
中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 王刚 (中国全国政协原副主席)

description.zh-cn: 原中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中共中央书记处书记、全国政协副主席、中央统战部部长，是胡锦涛的首席助理。被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一，在反腐运动中落马。
description.en: Former director of the CCP General Office and chief aide to Hu Jintao, who fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。涉及胡锦涛二十大离场事件。
中华人民共和国政治人物、力学工程师及航天领域专家，中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委书记。曾任中国航天科技集团公司总经理，出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一
中国政治人物及环境科学家。曾任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长（在《穹顶之下》发布后曾对其公开表示赞赏）、北京市市长。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician and environmental scientist. He served as Minister of Environmental Protection (publicly praising 'Under the Dome' upon its release) and Mayor of Beijing. He is currently a member of the 20th CPC Central Committee Politburo and Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，天津市委书记。此前曾任中共重庆市委书记，在唐良智担任重庆市市长期间，是袁家军的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician. While Tang Liangzhi served as Mayor of Chongqing, Chen Min'er was the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党全国代表大会
en: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机关，每五年举行一次。
在政党内部实行民主原则和制度，是现代政党制度的重要组成部分。此原则由列宁提出，后被斯大林进一步发展，并成为中国共产党的根本组织原则。
description.en: Refers to the implementation of democratic principles and systems within a political party, an important component of modern political party systems. This principle was proposed by Lenin, later further developed by Stalin, and became the fundamental organizational principle of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 原副国级领导人，曾任中共第十六届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委书记、上海市市长。因陈良宇事件被查处下台并判刑。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the 16th Politburo of the CCP, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee, and Mayor of Shanghai. He was dismissed and sentenced due to his involvement in the Chen Liangyu incident.

zh-cn: 陈良宇受贿、滥用职权案
陈良宇同志严重违纪问题

description.zh-cn: 指在2006年上海市部分政府官员被中央指控违规动用社会保障基金进行投资活动而遭中央惩处的事件。该事件牵扯出大量政治、经济和法律问题，涉及贪污腐败案件，导致时任上海市委书记陈良宇被停止政治局委员职务。
description.en: Refers to the 2006 incident where some Shanghai government officials were accused by the central government of illegally using social security funds for investment activities and were subsequently punished. This event triggered numerous political, economic, and legal issues, involving corruption cases and leading to the suspension of Chen Liangyu, then-Shanghai Party Secretary, from his Politburo membership.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的二子。中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任大连市市长、辽宁省省长、中华人民共和国商务部部长、中共重庆市委书记、中共中央政治局委员。2013年因受贿、贪污、滥用职权罪被判处无期徒刑。他被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一，亦是习近平的政治对手。他曾是谷开来之夫，其前妻为李雪峰之女。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second son. A former Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party, Party Secretary of Chongqing, Minister of Commerce, Governor of Liaoning, and Mayor of Dalian. In 2013, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, corruption, and abuse of power. He is considered a political rival of Xi Jinping. He was the husband of Gu Kailai, and his ex-wife is the daughter of Li Xuefeng.

description.zh-cn: 因王立军事件引发的，导致原中共中央政治局委员薄熙来被免职、调查、判刑等一系列政治事件。
中国共产党早期重要领导人之一，瞿秋白的同学，他介绍了瞿秋白加入中国共产党，并出席了共产国际第三次代表大会，同时也是广州起义的主要领导人。
description.en: One of the early important leaders of the Chinese Communist Party; he was a classmate of Qu Qiubai, introduced Qu Qiubai to the Chinese Communist Party, attended the 3rd World Congress of the Comintern, and was a main leader of the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人
中国共产党早期领导人
中国共产党早期领导人
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市市长、市委书记、全国政协主席，原正国级领导人，是李瑞环的全国政协主席职务继任者。
曾任中央文明委主任
黄敬与范瑾的三子，俞强声之弟，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人。曾任中国共产党第十八届中央政治局常委、中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席、中共上海市委书记、中共湖北省委书记、建设部部长等职务。
description.en: Third son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin, younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng, a former national-level leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as a member of the 18th Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China, Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC, Secretary of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the CPC, and Minister of Construction.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派的杰出代表，妇女运动的领袖。
文化大革命期间在上海市成立的短暂地方政权组织，是当时上海市的权力机构。
姚文元的妻子。
中国作家协会的机关报。
中国诗人、文艺理论家。
中国文艺理论家、翻译家。
中国作家、编辑家。
中国作家、文学翻译家和学者。
中国文艺评论家。
中国共产党上海市委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家。
中国作家。
中国文艺理论家。
中国新闻工作者、作家。
中国作家。
文化大革命期间北京的红卫兵“五大领袖”之一。
宋嘉树的妻子，宋氏三姐妹的母亲，于凤至的干娘。
description.en: Wife of Song Jiashu, mother of the Soong sisters, and godmother to Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在第一次国共合作期间，于1927年至1928年间发起的一场旨在清除其党内中国共产党党员及左派势力的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement initiated by the Kuomintang between 1927 and 1928 aimed at eliminating Chinese Communist Party members and left-wing elements from within its ranks.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的社会活动家、对外工作领导人。在被提名为国家副主席候选人后突然逝世。
description.en: A social activist and leader in foreign affairs of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Died suddenly after being nominated as a candidate for Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 中央研究院副院长兼总干事，中国民权保障同盟执行委员兼秘书长，被军统特务刺杀。
一个中国国民党内部的秘密政治团体，由黄埔军校毕业生组成，又称蓝衣社。
description.en: A secret political group within the Kuomintang, formed by graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, also known as the Blue Shirts Society.

description.zh-cn: 对林彪及其部分追随者的官方称谓。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 李先念的幼女，曾任中国对外友好协会会长。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 主管中华人民共和国财政工作的国务院组成部门。
中国人民解放军上将，作家，曾任国防大学政治委员，李先念女婿。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, author, and former Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 江青在济南学戏时的老同学，曾在上海帮助过她。
中国剧作家，曾帮助过江青。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的部门，曾主管文化艺术事务。该机构于1985年特批巩俐进入中央戏剧学院，后重组为文化和旅游部。
description.en: A department under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, formerly in charge of cultural and artistic affairs. The ministry granted special approval for Gong Li's admission to the Central Academy of Drama in 1985, and was later reorganized into the Ministry of Culture and Tourism.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的侄子，毛泽民与朱旦华之子，在毛泽东晚年期间曾任中共中央政治局联络员。他是文化大革命时期的重要人物，作为江青的政治盟友和四人帮的支持者，后一同被捕。
description.en: Mao Zedong's nephew and son of Mao Zemin and Zhu Danhua, who served as his liaison during Mao's later years.

description.zh-cn: 上海工人革命造反总司令部创始人之一。
林彪集团成员，林立果的心腹，曾任中国人民解放军空军第四军政委，被王洪文和许世友诱捕。
原上海市委书记，四人帮在上海的亲信。
1929年，中华民国与苏联因中东铁路问题爆发军事冲突，源于中华民国东北当局试图收回中东铁路。
description.en: A military conflict in 1929 between the Republic of China and the Soviet Union over the Chinese Eastern Railway.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在长沙批评“四人帮”的一系列谈话。
曾任中共云南省委书记。
与战争、军队等相关的事务
中国共产党革命家、军事家和外交家，中国人民解放军高级将领。
description.en: A Chinese Communist revolutionary, military officer, and diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，在黑茶山空难中遇难。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共元老习仲勋的第二任妻子，中共中央总书记习近平的母亲，习明泽的祖母。
description.en: Mother of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中共元老习仲勋与齐心的长女，习近平胞姊，北京中民信房地产开发有限公司董事长，邓家贵的妻子。
description.en: Sister of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人，曾在陕北肃反中逮捕习仲勋。
文化大革命时期广东省的政权机关。

en: Leader of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在特定历史时期的最高领导人职务称谓，特指中国共产党中央委员会的最高领导人。1956-1967年及1980-1982年的中央委员会总书记不属于此范畴。
description.en: The title of the supreme leader of the Communist Party of China during a specific historical period, specifically referring to the supreme leader of its Central Committee. The General Secretary of the Central Committee during 1956-1967 and 1980-1982 did not fall into this category.

description.zh-cn: 彭真次子
中华人民共和国北京市的省级行政机关，也是其最高地方国家行政机关。北京体育大学曾由其与国家体委双重领导。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ and provincial-level administrative body for Beijing, People's Republic of China. Beijing Sport University was once under its dual leadership with the State Sports Commission.

en: Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中国共产党驻共产国际代表团
中华人民共和国劳动部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门。
李维汉与吴景之之子，中国政治人物，曾任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省常德府桃源县仙瑞乡上坊村湘冲
birth_place.en: Xiangchong, Shangfang Village, Xianrui Township, Taoyuan County, Changde Prefecture, Hunan Province

death_place.zh-cn: 江苏省沪海道上海县闸北区沪宁铁路医院
death_place.en: Huning Railway Hospital, Zhabei District, Shanghai County, Huhai Dao, Jiangsu Province

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中华民国初期第一位倡导责任内阁制的政治家，华兴会和同盟会的主要领导人，国民党的主要筹建人及代理理事长。他于1913年3月20日在上海北站遇刺，并于22日不治身亡。此事件是二次革命的直接导火索。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, the first politician to advocate for a cabinet responsibility system in the early Republic of China, a key leader of the Huaxinghui and the Tongmenghui, and a principal founder and acting chairman of the Kuomintang. On March 20, 1913, he was assassinated at Shanghai North Railway Station and died on the 22nd. This event was the direct trigger for the Second Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 林伯渠堂兄。
中华民国建国初期，以京兆地方（北京）为首都的中央政府。始于1912年袁世凯就任临时大总统。在袁世凯去世后，该政府实际由北洋军阀各派系所控制，因大总统和国务总理主要由北洋军阀出身而得名。其于1914年设立了绥远特别区。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China in its early days, with its capital in Jingzhao (Beijing). It began with Yuan Shikai's inauguration as Provisional President in 1912. After Yuan Shikai's death, it was effectively controlled by various factions of the Beiyang Warlords, who predominantly held the positions of President and Premier. It established the Suiyuan Special Administrative Region in 1914.

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会农民运动讲习所

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期培养农民运动干部的机构。
description.en: An early institution of the Communist Party of China for training cadres for the peasant movement.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕的妻子。
中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国最高人民检察院检察长。
中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府内政部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三野战军的前身
中华民国国军高级将领，济南战役中被俘。
薄一波的长女。

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的三女。

description.zh-cn: 1986年底由中国大陆各地高校学生发起的一场大规模学生示威游行，旨在争取民主选举、新闻自由等权利。该运动是中华人民共和国民主运动的一部分，对后续的政治事件产生了深远影响，并成为导致胡耀邦下台的导火索。
description.en: A large-scale student movement initiated by university students across mainland China at the end of 1986, aiming to demand rights such as democratic elections and freedom of the press. It was part of the Chinese democracy movement, had a profound impact on subsequent political events, and became the catalyst for Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，一二·九运动的领导者和发动人之一，谷开来之父。
description.en: A major general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, one of the initiators of the December 9th Movement, and the father of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的最高国家行政机关。

description.zh-cn: 邓颖超的父亲，清朝武官。

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国理工科排名前列的公立研究型大学，隶属于中国科学院。该校位于安徽合肥，是八六学潮的策源地，其学生曾因不满地方人大代表选举问题而率先发起游行。
description.en: A top-tier public research university in science and engineering in the People's Republic of China, affiliated with the Chinese Academy of Sciences. Located in Hefei, Anhui, the university was also the origin of the 1986 student demonstrations, with its students being the first to march in protest against issues with the local People's Congress deputy elections.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人、官员，号称“诗仙”，与杜甫并称“李杜”。
唐代伟大的现实主义诗人，世称“诗圣”、“诗史”，与李白齐名，并称为“李杜”。其作品对白居易的讽谕诗创作有重要影响。
description.en: A great realist poet of the Tang dynasty, known as the 'Poet-Sage' and 'Poet-Historian', whose works significantly influenced Bai Juyi's satirical poetry.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，在四一二事件后的搜捕中被杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who was killed in the roundups following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个帝制王朝，由满族建立。其正式行政区划名称为布政使司，但“省”成为习惯性代称并最终获官方认可。在甲午战争后开始编练包括北洋军前身在内的新军。它是第二次鸦片战争中的主要参战方。日俄战争在其领土（中国东北地区）上进行，战后受其影响开启了立宪运动。载沣是其最后的实际统治者之一。该王朝在福泽谕吉的《脱亚论》中被视为应与之“绝交”的“恶友”。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history, established by the Manchu people. Its official administrative division name was 'Buzheng Shisi' (布政使司), but 'province' became a habitual designation and was eventually officially recognized. It began to train the New Army, including the predecessor of the Beiyang Army, after the First Sino-Japanese War. It was a major combatant in the Second Opium War. The Russo-Japanese War was fought on its territory (Northeast China), and influenced the start of the Constitutional Movement after the war. Zaifeng was one of its last de facto rulers. This dynasty was also regarded by Fukuzawa Yukichi in 'Datsu-A Ron' as a 'bad friend' with whom Japan should break ties.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳的妻子。

description.en: Second son of Zhao Ziyang.

指胡耀邦在1987年1月16日中共中央政治局扩大会议上辞去中共中央总书记职务的事件。该事件是八六学潮最直接的政治后果。
description.en: Refers to the event on January 16, 1987, when Hu Yaobang resigned from his position as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee at an enlarged Politburo meeting. This event was the most direct political consequence of the 1986 student demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记胡耀邦因心脏病逝世，引发了大规模的悼念活动，成为六四事件的导火索。

description.zh-cn: 瞿秋白的二弟
中国共产党早期领导人
中华民国陆军中将，蒋介石嫡系重要将领，抗日名将，黄埔军校第一期毕业。曾任第十一集团军总司令等职。他曾是瞿秋白在上海大学的学生，后负责羁押并执行对瞿秋白的枪决。1949年在国共内战中被俘，1959年获特赦。晚年移居美国，致力于中国和平统一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army, a key general loyal to Chiang Kai-shek, a famous anti-Japanese war hero, and a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy. He served as the commander of the 11th Army Group. He was a student of Qu Qiubai at Shanghai University and later responsible for detaining and executing Qu Qiubai. He was captured in the Chinese Civil War in 1949 and was granted amnesty in 1959. In his later years, he moved to the United States and dedicated himself to the peaceful reunification of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀的第二任妻子

description.zh-cn: 2008年5月12日发生于中国四川的特大地震，是中华人民共和国成立以来破坏力最大的地震，也是唐山大地震后伤亡最惨重的一次。此次地震对都江堰及二王庙造成了损害，并因大量校舍倒塌引发社会广泛质疑，促使艾未未发起了公民调查活动。
description.en: A catastrophic earthquake occurred in Sichuan, China, on May 12, 2008. It was the most destructive and casualty-ridden earthquake since the Tangshan earthquake and the founding of the People's Republic of China. The event caused damage to Dujiangyan and the Erwang Temple, and the collapse of numerous school buildings led to widespread public questioning, prompting Ai Weiwei to initiate a citizens' investigation.

description.en: Son of Wen Jiabao, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who founded Unihub Global Network and New Horizon Capital, and formerly served as the chairman of China Satcom.

description.en: Daughter of Wen Jiabao and Zhang Peili, and sister of Wen Yunsong. She has worked at Lehman Brothers and Credit Suisse First Boston.

description.en: President of Russia, who on February 24, 2022, ordered a "special military operation" against Ukraine, launching the invasion. Wei Jingsheng agreed with his justification of 'protecting his people from ethnic cleansing'.

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主运动领袖、政治家，韩国第14任总统，也是韩国民主化后的首位文人总统。他曾是韩国国会历史上任期最长的议员之一，也是最年轻当选的议员。在执政期间致力于消除腐败，并将两位前总统推上法庭，但其任期后期因亚洲金融危机和亲属腐败丑聞而备受争议。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and politician, the 14th President of South Korea, and the first civilian president after democratization. He was one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly and the youngest member ever elected. During his tenure, he focused on eradicating corruption and brought two former presidents to justice, but his later term was marred by the Asian financial crisis and family corruption scandals.

It is a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, and also a key construction university of 'Double First-Class A', 'Project 985', and 'Project 211'.

description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique and a mentor to Zhang Xueliang. He rebelled against the Fengtian clique due to being sidelined by Yang Yuting and other reasons, and was executed after his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 该部队作为大日本帝国陆军的组成部分，于1919年至1945年驻扎在中国东北地区。期间，它策划并执行了皇姑屯事件、九一八事变，扶植满洲国，最终在苏联发动的“八月风暴”攻势下投降。
description.en: A general army of the Imperial Japanese Army from 1919 to 1945, stationed in the northeastern region of China. It planned the Huanggutun Incident and the Mukden Incident, established the puppet state of Manchukuo, and ultimately surrendered following the Soviet 'August Storm' offensive.

description.zh-cn: 张学良领导的军事力量。
北洋军阀的主要派系之一，由张作霖领导，根据地在东北，并受日本支持。
description.en: One of the main factions of the Beiyang Warlords, led by Zhang Zuolin, based in Northeast China, and supported by Japan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由清政府部分官员推动的自强运动，以“师夷长技以制夷”为口号，旨在引进西方军事装备、机器生产和科学技术。该运动是清朝晚期的一场现代化运动，第二次鸦片战争的失败是其直接诱因之一。
description.en: A modernization movement in the late Qing dynasty promoted by some government officials under the slogan 'Learn the barbarians' superior technology in order to control them.' The defeat in the Second Opium War was one of its direct triggers.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家，大连万达集团股份有限公司的创始人兼董事长，中国大陆前首富。

description.en: A public university in Palmerston North, New Zealand, with campuses in Wellington and Auckland. It is named in memory of former New Zealand Prime Minister William Ferguson Massey.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第二代最高领导人，金日成的长子，金平一的同父异母兄。曾任朝鲜劳动党总书记，被追封为“朝鲜劳动党永远的总书记”。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the eldest son of Kim Il-sung, and the half-brother of Kim Pyong-il.

description.en: The central leading body elected by the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任及第七任首相，被称为“马来西亚现代化之父”。他曾是安华的政治导师，后成为其主要政治对手，在1998年将其革职；两人后来在2018年结盟推翻国阵政府，但联盟因2020年政治危机而破裂。其对“一带一路”的态度从初期的批评和重新谈判转变为后期的支持。
description.en: Fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, known as the "Father of Modernization of Malaysia". He was once Anwar's political mentor before becoming his main political rival, dismissing him in 1998; the two later allied in 2018 to overthrow the Barisan Nasional government, but the alliance collapsed during the 2020 political crisis. His stance on the 'Belt and Road' initiative evolved from initial criticism and renegotiation to later support.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军将领、海军上将，曾任中共中央军事委员会委员、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员、中央军委政治工作部主任。2024年起因涉嫌严重违纪违法被调查，后被开除党籍军籍。
description.en: Former general and admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, who served as a member of the Central Military Commission and Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law starting in 2024, and was later expelled from the Party and the military.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领。曾任中共上海市委常委。

中华民国政治人物、法学学者、教授与律师。曾任中华民国总统（第14－15任）、行政院大陆委员会主任委员、民主进步党主席等职务。在陈明通担任国家安全局局长、大陆委员会主任委员和副主任委员期间，是其上司。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), who served as the President of the Republic of China and was a former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council. She was also Chen Ming-tong's superior during his tenures as Director-General of the National Security Bureau, Minister and Deputy Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末期政治人物，光绪帝异母弟，宣统帝溥仪生父。宣统年间，他担任监国摄政王，此职位是清朝末年为辅佐幼帝宣统帝而设立的。他也是清朝最后的实际统治者之一。
description.en: A political figure in the late Qing dynasty, half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor, and father of the Xuantong Emperor (Puyi). During the Xuantong era, he served as the Prince-Regent, a position established in the late Qing dynasty to assist the young Xuantong Emperor. He was also one of the last de facto rulers of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 指1868年至1947年间的日本。作为抗日战争（第二次中日战争）时期的日本政府及军队，它也是中国抗日战争的主要参战方之一，对中国发动侵略，其关东军部署在中国东北。它还是1932年至1945年间满洲国的宗主国，其军队对毛福梅的死亡负有直接责任。在第二次世界大战期间，它还占领了新加坡。此外，它也是日俄战争的参战国之一，并最终取得胜利。
description.en: Refers to Japan from 1868 to 1947. As the Japanese government and army during the Anti-Japanese War (Second Sino-Japanese War), it was one of the major combatants, invading China. Its Kwantung Army was deployed in Northeast China. It was also the suzerain of Manchukuo from 1932 to 1945, and its military was directly responsible for Mao Fumei's death. During World War II, it occupied Singapore. Furthermore, it was one of the combatants in the Russo-Japanese War, ultimately emerging victorious.

description.zh-cn: 汪兆铭的追随者，后脱离汪组织并揭发其与日本的密约

日本第124代天皇。他是大日本帝国在二战期间的国家元首与军队最高统帅，并在战争末期做出接受《波茨坦宣言》、结束战争的最终决定，通过“玉音放送”向全国宣布投降。他也是田中角荣担任首相时的在位天皇。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan. He reigned as the head of state and supreme commander of the military of the Empire of Japan during World War II, making the final decision to accept the Potsdam Declaration and end the war, and announcing the surrender to the nation via the Gyokuon-hōsō. He also reigned during Kakuei Tanaka's tenure as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国全面抗日战争的开始。
