description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始成员国。

zh-cn: 外高加索社会主义联邦苏维埃共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始成员国。
苏联政治家，勃列日涅夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
苏共党内保守派为防止戈尔巴乔夫下放权力导致国家解体而发动的未遂政变。
英国政治家，曾任英国首相。她曾与邓小平就香港前途问题进行谈判；马尔康·芮夫金曾在其内阁中担任苏格兰事务大臣。
description.en: British stateswoman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. She negotiated with Deng Xiaoping on the future of Hong Kong; Malcolm Rifkind served as Secretary of State for Scotland in her cabinet.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军合成第一一六旅
en: 116th Mechanized Infantry Division (People's Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国大连市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Dalian City, People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 由时任重庆市委书记薄熙来主导，在重庆发起的一场大规模打击有组织犯罪和腐败的运动。该运动在提升治安的同时，也因其法律程序问题而备受争议。
description.en: A large-scale campaign against organized crime and corruption led by then-Chongqing Party Secretary Bo Xilai. While it improved public security, the campaign was controversial due to its legal process issues.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家、政治家，大韩民国首任总统、首任国会议长。他曾因反对以三八线为界停战而拒绝在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and politician, the first President of the Republic of Korea and the first Speaker of the National Assembly. He refused to sign the Korean Armistice Agreement due to his opposition to a ceasefire along the 38th parallel.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统，罗斯福的最后一任副总统，在其逝世后接任总统。他批准对日本使用原子弹，并接受了日本的投降。
description.en: 33rd President of the United States, Roosevelt's final Vice President who succeeded him as President upon his death. He authorized the use of atomic bombs against Japan and accepted its surrender.

description.zh-cn: 接替沃尔顿·沃克任美国第八集团军司令，后接替道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟任联合国军总司令。
朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，是朝鲜战争的主要参战方和《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a main belligerent in the Korean War and a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军最高司令官及中国人民志愿军司令员一方与联合国军总司令另一方关于朝鲜军事停战的协定
en: Agreement Between the Commander-in-Chief, United Nations Command, on the One Hand, and the Supreme Commander of the Korean People’s Army and the Commander of the Chinese People’s Volunteers, on the Other Hand, Concerning a Military Armistice in Korea

description.zh-cn: 一份旨在停止朝鲜战争交战双方敌对军事行为的军事文件，于1953年7月27日在板门店签署。该协定建立了朝韩非军事区，并至今仍是维持朝鲜半岛停火状态的唯一法律依据。
description.en: A military document signed on July 27, 1953, in Panmunjom, aimed at ceasing hostile military actions between the belligerents of the Korean War. The agreement established the Korean Demilitarized Zone and remains the sole legal basis for maintaining the ceasefire on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的战区之一，地理范围包括东亚、东南亚、太平洋、印度洋和大洋洲。它是二战地理上规模最大的战场。
description.en: One of the theaters of World War II, with a geographical scope including East Asia, Southeast Asia, the Pacific Ocean, the Indian Ocean, and Oceania. It was the largest theater of war geographically in WWII.

description.zh-cn: 冀东防共自治政府委员长。
蒙古军政府总裁。
由陈嘉庚创立，参与中国抗日战争的海外华侨组织。
中、美、英三国元首发表，要求日本归还窃取于中国的领土。

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师、美国天主教大学访问学者

en: Supreme Soviet of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的最高国家权力机关。
戴笠的继任者，先后掌管军统局、保密局、情报局。
上海市参议会会长，被军统特务刺杀。
中华民国海军二级上将，曾任国防部情报局局长，因江南案下台并被捕入狱。
description.en: An admiral in the Republic of China Navy, former director of the Military Intelligence Bureau, who was arrested and imprisoned, and subsequently stepped down due to the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 中日战争期间军统局与美国情报体系合作成立的机构。
中国共产党领导的资产阶级民主革命。井冈山革命根据地的建立开辟了“农村包围城市，武装夺取政权”的道路。
description.en: The bourgeois-democratic revolution led by the Communist Party of China. The establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base opened up the path of 'encircling the cities from the countryside and seizing power by armed force'.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区下辖的陆军部分

en: 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军的前身之一
中国人民解放军在解放战争时期于东北地区组建的武装力量，曾镇压通化事件。
description.en: The PLA forces in Northeast China during the Chinese Civil War, established by the Communist Party of China, which suppressed the Tonghua Incident.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家元首列表
en: List of state representatives of the People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中国民主建国会中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省梅州市的市辖区，徐发淦的籍贯地。
description.en: A district of Meizhou City, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China, Xu Fagan's ancestral home.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国审计署

description.zh-cn: 中国少年儿童的群众组织，中国共产党领导下的儿童组织。
description.en: A mass organization for Chinese children, led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体报导的事件，法轮功方面指其为政府导演的伪案，是镇压宣传战的转折点。
由大纪元时报发表的系列社论，批判共产主义和中国共产党。
一家总部位于美国的中国古典舞和传统音乐艺术团。
description.en: A US-based performing arts and entertainment company known for classical Chinese dance and traditional music.

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师
传说中日本的初代天皇
镰仓幕府首任征夷大将军
由成吉思汗建立的横跨欧亚大陆的帝国，元朝的前身，后灭亡金朝与南宋。蒙哥是其第四位大汗。
description.en: An empire founded by Genghis Khan, of which Möngke was the fourth Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 江户幕府首任征夷大将军
日本历史上的最后一个武家政权，也是最后一个封建军事政府。它在戊辰战争后被推翻。福泽谕吉曾受雇于幕府从事翻译工作，并随其使节团出访欧美。
description.en: The last feudal military government of Japan, which was overthrown after the Boshin War. Fukuzawa Yukichi was employed by the shogunate as a translator and accompanied its missions to the United States and Europe.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军准将，率领黑船舰队迫使日本开港

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛、辽东半岛、山东、威海、黄海、澎湖

description.zh-cn: 1894年至1895年间清朝与大日本帝国之间因朝鲜问题爆发的一场大规模战争，以清朝惨败告终。中国的惨败极大地刺激了中国的知识分子，促使他们更积极、全面地向西方学习。福泽谕吉曾将其描述为“文野之战”并支持日本开战。战争赔款被用作建立京都帝国大学（京都大学前身）的资金来源之一。
description.en: A major war between the Qing dynasty of China and the Empire of Japan, primarily over the issue of Korea, which ended in a decisive defeat for the Qing. China's defeat was a major catalyst for Chinese intellectuals to more actively and comprehensively learn from the West. Fukuzawa Yukichi described it as a 'war between civilization and barbarism' and supported Japan's engagement in it. The war indemnity was used as one of the funding sources for the establishment of Kyoto Imperial University (the predecessor of Kyoto University).

description.zh-cn: 位于日本京都的国立综合性研究型大学，前身是1897年成立的日本第二所旧制帝国大学——京都帝国大学。作为日本最高学府之一，京大以‘自由的学风’著称，是京都学派的发祥地，被誉为‘科学家的摇篮’。汤川秀树曾在此学习和工作多年。
description.en: A national comprehensive research university located in Kyoto, Japan. Its predecessor was Kyoto Imperial University, established in 1897 as the second Imperial University in Japan. As one of Japan's top academic institutions, it is known for its 'spirit of freedom', is the birthplace of the Kyoto School, and is regarded as a 'cradle of scientists'. Hideki Yukawa studied and worked here for many years.

description.zh-cn: 物理学家，原子序第113号新元素鉨的发现者
日本众议院议员等

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 代表中华人民共和国国务院对中国移动通信集团有限公司履行出资人职责
中国移动通信集团有限公司董事长
俄罗斯政治家，曾任俄罗斯总统、前俄罗斯总理。
description.en: Russian politician, former President of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国沙皇，俄罗斯帝国皇帝
日本化学家，2019年诺贝尔化学奖得主。
指与广东省有任职背景或与习仲勋主政广东有关联的官员群体。亦可指民国时期的军阀派系，主要势力范围在广东地区，受苏联支持。
description.en: Refers to a group of officials with a background in Guangdong or connected to Xi Zhongxun's governance in Guangdong. It can also refer to a warlord clique during the Republican era, with its main sphere of influence in the Guangdong region, supported by the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院检察长。曾任中共上海市委副书记。
清末民初政治家，袁世凯的盟友。
晚清维新派政治家，戊戌六君子之一。
description.en: A reformist politician in the late Qing dynasty, one of the 'Six Gentlemen of the Wuxu Reform'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家，北洋军阀皖系首领，曾是袁世凯手下重要将领。历任参谋总长、国务总理、临时执政等职。因在要求清帝退位、抵制洪宪帝制和讨伐张勋复辟中的作用，有“三造共和”之美誉。
description.en: A Chinese politician and warlord, leader of the Anhui clique. He served as Premier and Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China. He is known for his role in forcing the Qing emperor's abdication, resisting the Hongxian Monarchy, and suppressing the Manchu Restoration, earning him the moniker 'the three-time creator of the Republic'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责外汇管理的机构。
description.en: The agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign exchange administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省省会；曾是南宋都城，亦是岳飞遇害及安葬地。
空气动力学权威，钱学森的博士生导师。
德国火箭科学家。
美国海军部次长。
香港武侠小说作家、《明报》创办人，与倪匡、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。在其封笔后，曾亲自为旗下的《明报》向古龙邀稿《陆小凤系列》。
description.en: A Hong Kong wuxia novelist and founder of Ming Pao. He is known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong' along with Ni Kuang, James Wong and Chua Lam. After he stopped writing novels, he personally invited Gu Long to write the 'Lu Xiaofeng Series' for his newspaper, Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅的祖父。
中国现代作家、学者、翻译家、语言学家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, scholar, translator, and linguist.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1930年代在中国上海领导创建的文学组织。
description.en: A literary organization founded in Shanghai, China, in the 1930s under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的女儿。

zh-cn: 浙江清华长三角研究院
en: Zhejiang Yangtze Delta Institute of Tsinghua University

description.zh-cn: 浙江省与清华大学共建的研究机构。
中华人民共和国民政部部长。
中国历史上继元朝之后的大一统王朝，也是最后一个由汉族统治的帝制王朝。其间改行中书省为承宣布政使司，俗称“行省”。
由忽必烈建立的中国历史上由蒙古族建立的大一统王朝，追尊蒙哥为宪宗桓肃皇帝。其设立行中书省作为一级地方行政区划，官场上使用空印文书的习惯做法被明朝沿用，并最终引发了空印案。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Kublai Khan, and established by the Mongols, which posthumously honored Möngke as Emperor Xianzong Huansu. The bureaucratic practice of using empty-sealed documents, inherited from the Yuan, led to the Empty Seal Case in the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的皇后，郭子兴的养女，朱高煦之祖母。
description.en: The empress of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang, and the grandmother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝最后一任中书省丞相，胡惟庸案的核心人物。
description.en: The last Chancellor of the Ming Dynasty and the central figure in the Case of Hu Weiyong.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋嫡长子，建文帝朱允炆之父，明朝开国皇太子。
description.en: The eldest son and heir apparent of Zhu Yuanzhang, the first crown prince of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋之父，追尊为仁祖淳皇帝
明初中央行政机构，后被废除
明太祖朱元璋第四子，明朝第三位皇帝，明成祖。原为燕王，通过靖难之役从其侄建文帝手中夺取皇位，年号永乐。他下令编纂《永乐大典》。他是朱高煦之父。
description.en: The third Emperor of the Ming Dynasty, known as the Yongle Emperor, and the fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor. He seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, through the Jingnan Campaign. He commissioned the compilation of the Yongle Encyclopedia, and was the father of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国将领，德庆侯
明朝开国将领，颖国公

zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央外事工作委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责处理台湾事务的机构，与中共中央台湾工作办公室为“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: An administrative agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Taiwan-related affairs. It shares the same office with the Taiwan Work Office of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央台湾工作办公室主任。
中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的政教合一伊斯兰共和国，于2024年加入金砖国家的成员国。该国被指控向俄罗斯提供无人机和弹道导弹。
description.en: Accused of supplying drones and ballistic missiles to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟外交与安全政策高级代表。
毛泽民的第三任妻子。
description.en: Third wife of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。
description.en: Chinese politician.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性全国重点大学，双一流、985工程重点建设大学。
唐朝第9任皇帝，亦是在位时间最长的皇帝。在位前期开创开元盛世，后期因怠政导致安史之乱爆发。他曾征召李白入京任翰林供奉，并追封庄周为南华真人。其与杨贵妃的爱情故事是《长恨歌》的主题。
description.en: The 9th and longest-reigning emperor of the Tang Dynasty. He posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren, and his love story with Yang Guifei is the subject of the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗之子，永王。安史之乱时起兵，招揽李白入幕，后兵败。
唐玄宗的贵妃，中国古代四大美女之一，《长恨歌》的主角之一。据说因高力士中伤而排斥李白。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang, one of the Four Beauties of ancient China, and a main character in the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 东晋政治家，李白终身仰慕的历史人物之一。
中国商人。
位于中国南京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Nanjing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属综合性全国重点研究型大学，慎海雄的母校之一。
位于中国北京市的公立大学，是中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属的全国重点大学，亦是'双一流A类'、原'985工程'、原'211工程'重点建设大学。
description.en: A public university located in Beijing, China, and a national key university directly under the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学。温云松在此获得工科学位；项昌乐在此获得学士、硕士和博士学位，并曾担任党委常务副书记等职务。
description.en: A public university in Beijing, China. Wen Yunsong obtained his engineering degree here; Xiang Changle obtained his bachelor's, master's, and doctoral degrees here, and previously served as Executive Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 作为东南大学的前身，其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学。现为中央直管、教育部直属的研究型综合性大学。

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省青岛市

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的中国副部级研究型综合大学，“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

en: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省成都市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属重点大学，双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学。
位于中国重庆市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Chongqing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西的著名高等学府，其前身由于右任筹备创建并任首任校长。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning in Shaanxi, whose predecessor was founded by Yu Youren, who also served as its first president.

description.zh-cn: 由SARS-CoV-2病毒引起的疾病。
湖北省中西医结合医院医生，最早发现和上报新冠肺炎疫情。
美国联邦政府的主要情报机构之一。张纯如在遗书中声称自己被该组织盯上。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence agencies of the United States federal government. Iris Chang claimed in her suicide note that she was being targeted by this organization.

description.zh-cn: 企业家和商业巨头，SpaceX、特斯拉公司CEO及首席设计师，PayPal创始人，Solarcity主席，美国政府效率部负责人。宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Entrepreneur and business magnate, CEO and Chief Designer of SpaceX, CEO and Product Architect of Tesla, Inc., founder of PayPal, chairman of SolarCity, and Head of the US Government Efficiency Department. An alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 一种针对COVID-19的mRNA疫苗。

zh-cn: 美国食品药品监督管理局

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等院校，后更名为北京外国语大学。
description.en: An institution of higher education in Beijing, China, later renamed Beijing Foreign Studies University.

description.zh-cn: 中国高等院校
位于中国辽宁省沈阳市的一所公立综合性大学。
description.en: A public comprehensive university located in Shenyang, Liaoning, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在东北地区创建的第一所综合性大学
民国时期位于上海的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Shanghai during the Republican era.

en: Nanjing University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 前身为中国人民解放军炮兵工程学院。

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省郑州市

description.en: Hong Kong politician and current Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC. He was elected as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong in the 2012 election, and previously served as the Convenor of the Non-official Members of the Executive Council of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物
中国政治人物
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。曾任中共中央组织部常务副部长，现任第十四届全国政协副主席。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a deputy national leader. He formerly served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee and is currently a Vice Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物
中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任全国政协副主席、民盟中央常务副主席。同时担任清华大学土木水利学院水利水电工程系博士生导师，以及华东师范大学河口海岸学国家重点实验室学术委员会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a national leader. He currently serves as the Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and the Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League. He is also a doctoral supervisor in the Department of Hydraulic and Hydroelectric Engineering, School of Civil and Hydraulic Engineering, Tsinghua University, and the Chairman of the Academic Committee of the State Key Laboratory of Estuarine and Coastal Research at East China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物
中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总装备部部长、中国载人航天工程总指挥，并宣布了神舟五号的发射成功与任务圆满成功。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间，他被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army. He served as Director of the PLA General Armaments Department and Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, announcing the successful launch and completion of the Shenzhou 5 mission. During the 11th National People's Congress, he was appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。

description.zh-cn: 前中国人民解放军海军司令员。
中国军事人物
由女真首领努尔哈赤建立的政权，是清朝的前身。在其存续期间，与明朝在辽东地区展开了长期的军事对抗。
description.en: A regime established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci, and the predecessor to the Qing Dynasty. During its existence, it engaged in long-term military conflict with the Ming Dynasty in the Liaodong region.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙年间，由吴三桂、耿精忠、尚之信发动的大规模反清叛乱。
description.en: A large-scale rebellion against the Qing dynasty during the reign of the Kangxi Emperor, launched by Wu Sangui, Geng Jingzhong, and Shang Zhixin.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第五位皇帝，清世宗，年号雍正。他是康熙帝第四子，乾隆帝之父，孝圣宪皇后的丈夫。因中国礼仪之争引发的矛盾，他在位期间实行禁教政策，中断了明末清初的西学东渐进程。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty and the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor. During his reign, he implemented a policy of prohibiting Christianity due to the Chinese Rites controversy, which interrupted the process of West-to-East knowledge transfer in the late Ming and early Qing.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第六位皇帝，年号乾隆，清高宗，雍正帝第四子，孝圣宪皇后之子。他实际掌握中国最高权力长达六十三年零四个月，是中国历史上实际执掌国家最高权力时间最长的皇帝。在位期间，下令开四库馆并从《永乐大典》中辑佚。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, who held supreme power in China for 63 years and four months, making him the longest-reigning de facto ruler in Chinese history. During his reign, he ordered the establishment of the Siku Quanshu project and the recovery of lost texts from the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 第一次鸦片战争后清政府与英国签订的条约，是中国近代史上第一个不平等条约。条约内容包括割让香港岛、开放五个通商口岸及赔款。
description.en: The treaty signed between the Qing government and Great Britain after the First Opium War, and the first of the unequal treaties in modern Chinese history. Its terms included the cession of Hong Kong Island, the opening of five treaty ports, and payment of reparations.

description.zh-cn: 清末宗教组织拜上帝会创始人、太平天国运动的民变领袖以及太平天国的建立者。
中国清朝晚期女性皇室成员、政治人物，同治、光绪年间的实际最高统治者，光绪帝名义上的母亲。她指定溥仪继位并任命载沣为摄政王。
description.en: The de facto ruler of the late Qing dynasty who appointed Puyi as the successor to the throne and Zaifeng as the Prince-Regent.

description.en: A Chinese Miao female singer, former head of the Song and Dance Troupe of the Political Work Department of the People's Liberation Army Navy, and former vice-chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州古丈县岩头寨镇

description.zh-cn: 法国议会上议院
欧洲联盟，欧洲多国共同建立的政治、经济及司法的超主权实体，总部设在布鲁塞尔。该组织与北约有紧密合作关系。
法国波旁王朝国王，在法国大革命中被处决。

location.zh-cn: 欧洲、亚洲、非洲、大西洋、太平洋

description.zh-cn: 一场1914年至1918年发生的全球性军事冲突，始于欧洲，萨拉热窝事件是其直接导火索。美国在伍德罗·威尔逊总统的领导下于1917年参战。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe, directly triggered by the Sarajevo incident. Woodrow Wilson led the United States to enter the war in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟创始成员国之一。其国家主导的工业发展模式和强权政策成为明治日本效仿的对象。
description.en: Its state-led industrial development model and strong-arm policies became a model for Meiji Japan.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事将领、政治家及法国元帅。第一次世界大战中因凡尔登战役的胜利而成为民族英雄，但在第二次世界大战期间领导与纳粹德国合作的维希法国政府，战后被判叛国罪。
description.en: A French general, politician, and Marshal of France. He became a national hero for his victory at the Battle of Verdun in World War I, but led the collaborationist Vichy France regime with Nazi Germany during World War II, for which he was convicted of treason.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，在法国未被德军占领的南部地区成立的政府，由菲利普·贝当担任国家元首，与纳粹德国合作。
description.en: The government established in the southern, unoccupied zone of France during World War II, headed by Philippe Pétain, which collaborated with Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 由2个北美国家及30个欧洲国家组成的国际军事联盟。俄罗斯对其东扩的担忧是发动战争的宣称理由之一。
description.en: A military alliance between European and North American countries. Russia's concerns about its eastward expansion were one of the stated reasons for the war.

description.zh-cn: 法国前总统，任内推动法国重返北约军事指挥结构。
美国及其盟友以伊拉克拥有大规模杀伤性武器为由发动的军事行动，推翻了萨达姆政权。
description.en: A military operation launched by the United States and its allies, citing Iraq's possession of weapons of mass destruction, which overthrew the regime of Saddam Hussein.

description.zh-cn: 1952年院系调整中，其文理院系与中山大学合并。
2001年与中山大学合并。
位于中国广东省广州市的一所高等农业院校，是华南农业大学的前身之一。
description.en: An institution of higher agricultural education located in Guangzhou, Guangdong, China, one of the predecessors of South China Agricultural University.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、教育家，曾在国民参政会上揭发孔祥熙贪腐。
description.en: Chinese historian and educator who exposed H. H. Kung's corruption at the People's Political Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家
病毒学与微生物学家
中国诗人
动力机械工程专家，中国工程院院士。
中国儒家经典之一。
中国教育家，华东师范大学首任校长。
中国教育家、哲学家，文化大革命后华东师范大学首位校长。
中国共产党党员，中华人民共和国水利和水电专家及政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共第十至第十四届中央委员，第七、八、九届全国政协副主席，中华人民共和国水利部及水利电力部部长，第六届中国红十字会会长。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, an expert in water conservancy and hydropower, and a political figure in the People's Republic of China. She was a former national-level deputy leader, having served as a member of the 10th to 14th Central Committees of the CCP, Vice Chairperson of the 7th, 8th, and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC, Minister of Water Resources and Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, and the 6th President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代启蒙思想家、翻译家，曾任京师大学堂译书局总办、北京大学校署理校长。他翻译了《天演论》等西方学术名著，系统地将进化论、自由主义等西方思想引入中国。
description.en: A Chinese scholar and translator of the late Qing period, most famous for introducing Western ideas, including Darwin's 'survival of the fittest', to China in the late 19th century.

description.zh-cn: 原北京大学哲学系党总支书记，因贴出“全国第一张马列主义的大字报”而成为文革时期的风云人物。
中国药物化学家，中国中医科学院终身研究员兼首席研究员，青蒿素和双氢青蒿素的发现者，北京大学医学院校友。因其在抗疟药方面的贡献，于2015年获得诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: A Chinese pharmaceutical chemist, lifetime researcher and chief researcher at the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences, and the discoverer of artemisinin and dihydroartemisinin. An alumna of Peking University Medical School. She was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 2015 for her contributions to antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，1957年诺贝尔物理学奖得主，国立西南联合大学校友，中国科学院院士。
南京大学前校长。
音乐家、美术教育家、书法家、戏剧活动家。
直系军阀将领，曾任北洋政府教育总长、交通部长。
文学家、小说家、散文家和考古学专家。
散文家、学者、文学批评家、翻译家。
核物理学家，中国科学院院士。
上海市人民政府组成部门，与上海市文化和旅游局实行一个机构两块牌子。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人力资源和社会保障部
人力资源和社会保障部
en: Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security
Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security of the People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新闻出版总署
en: General Administration of Press and Publication

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责新闻出版事业的直属机构。
description.en: Formerly a direct subordinate agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for press and publication affairs.

zh-cn: 中共中央对外宣传办公室

location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区朝阳门内大街225号
location.en: 225 Chaoyangmen Inner Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的办事机构，是中共中央宣传部对外加挂的牌子。该机构由中央对外宣传小组于1993年改组而来，并对外使用“国务院新闻办公室”名称，负责对外新闻发布和国际传播工作。其于2014年并入中共中央宣传部。
description.en: An agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which was reorganized from the Central Leading Group for Foreign Propaganda in 1993. It externally used the name 'State Council Information Office' and also served as the external name for the Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for foreign-related press releases and international communication. The agency was merged into the Publicity Department of the CPC Central Committee in 2014.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国自然资源部
中华人民共和国生态环境部

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、政治经济学家、社会学家、政治学家、革命理论家、历史学者、经济学家、新闻从业员、革命社会主义者，马克思主义的创始人之一。
description.en: Philosopher, economist, historian, and political theorist, founder of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、社会科学家、记者、商人和政治思想家，与马克思共同发展出共产主义理论。
由弗拉基米尔·列宁提出的一种政治经济理论，主张建立由革命先锋队领导的无产阶级专政。
一种以生产资料私有制为基础的社会经济体系，是列宁主义革命和马克思异化论所批判的对象。
description.en: A socioeconomic system based on private ownership of the means of production, which is the object of Leninist revolution and critique in Marx's theory of alienation.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林统治下苏联的政治经济理论和实践，被一些人认为与列宁本人的思想有本质区别。
老布尔什维克革命家，将“列宁主义”一词用于表示“先锋队革命”，共产国际的第一任主席。
description.en: Old Bolshevik revolutionary and the first head of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 俄国马克思主义革命家、政治理论家，共产国际的创始人之一，“不断革命论”的主要倡导者。
description.en: Russian Marxist revolutionary and theorist, one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 法国工运人士
法国革命马克思主义社会主义者，卡尔·马克思的女婿。
朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的官方意识形态，由金日成创立。
description.en: The official state ideology of North Korea, developed by Kim Il-sung.

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的中央行政机关。
香港特别行政区政府负责教育事务的部门。
description.en: The department responsible for educational affairs in the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港记者、香港中文大学历史系兼任教授，曾对习近平思想作出评价。
description.en: Hong Kong journalist and adjunct professor in the History Department of the Chinese University of Hong Kong, who has commented on Xi Jinping Thought.

description.zh-cn: 国民党理论家

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会的简称，是中国人民政治协商会议在北京市的地方组织。
description.en: The abbreviation for the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 1856年至1860年间，大英帝国与法兰西第二帝国以亚罗号事件及广西西林教案为借口，联合入侵大清国的战争，被视为第一次鸦片战争的延续。
description.en: A war from 1856 to 1860, in which the British Empire and the Second French Empire, using the Arrow Incident and the Xilin teaching case as pretexts, jointly invaded the Qing dynasty. It is considered a continuation of the First Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京西北郊的清代大型皇家园林，被誉为“万园之园”，咸丰帝出生地，在第二次鸦片战争中被英法联军抢掠并焚毁。
description.en: A large imperial garden complex of the Qing Dynasty in the northwestern suburbs of Beijing, known as the 'Garden of Gardens,' the birthplace of the Xianfeng Emperor, which was looted and burned down by Anglo-French forces during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 自元大都、明清北京城以来北京城东西对称布局建筑物的对称轴。
此地曾是元朝的首都，北京城的前身之一。之后也曾作为明朝的首都，并是明宣宗的出生地。

zh-cn: 台湾省 (中华人民共和国)
en: Taiwan Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国法理上的省级行政区
天主教的主要修会之一，在明末清初的西学东渐中扮演了关键角色，派遣了利玛窦等传教士来华。
description.en: A religious order of the Catholic Church. Its members, called Jesuits, played a key role in the first phase of West-to-East knowledge transfer by sending missionaries like Matteo Ricci to China.

description.zh-cn: 战国四公子之一。
上海公共租界的行政管理机关。

birth_place.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区托克托县

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党长春市委员会书记
招商局集团原常务副董事长，蛇口工业区和招商银行、平安保险等企业的创办者，是深圳经济特区早期的重要开拓者。
description.en: Former executive vice chairman of China Merchants Group, founder of Shekou Industrial Zone and enterprises like China Merchants Bank and Ping An Insurance, and a key pioneer in the early days of the Shenzhen Special Economic Zone.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家完全由企业法人持股的股份制商业银行。
description.en: The first joint-stock commercial bank in the People's Republic of China wholly owned by corporate legal entities.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构，也是中国第一家股份制保险企业，同时也是一个中国综合金融服务集团。郑建源曾通过其控股公司持有该公司大量股份。
description.en: The first commercial insurance institution in the People's Republic of China established by an enterprise, and also the first joint-stock insurance company in China. It is an integrated financial services group, in which Zheng Jianyuan once held a large number of shares through his holding companies.

description.zh-cn: 由杨坚建立的中国朝代，历史上承南北朝、下启唐朝，结束了长期的分裂局面，重新统一了中国。该朝代开始将“省”用于中央政府的一级行政机关。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Yang Jian, succeeding the Northern and Southern dynasties and preceding the Tang dynasty. It ended a long period of division, reunifying China, and notably began using 'province' as a first-level administrative division of the central government.

description.zh-cn: 元朝设立的一级地方行政区划，省制的前身。
中华民国北洋政府时期的行政区划，位于省与县之间，后被国民政府废除。
法国大革命后设立的行政单位，取代了旧的行省。
商朝帝王
商周时期的方国
秦朝将军
中国历史上的一个重要朝代，承五代十国、下启元朝，分为北宋与南宋。
description.en: An important era in Chinese history that followed the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, preceded the Yuan dynasty, and was divided into Northern Song and Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 与北宋同时期由党项族建立的政权，是宋神宗时期北宋在西部的主要军事对手。该政权后被蒙古所灭。
description.en: A state established by the Tangut people, coexisting with the Northern Song dynasty. It was the primary military adversary of the Northern Song in the west during Emperor Shenzong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任第六届香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: The current Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 最后一任香港总督。
美国政治人物，曾任美国国务卿，并在2004年美国总统选举中作为民主党候选人与乔治·沃克·布什竞争。
description.en: American politician, former Secretary of State, who ran as the Democratic candidate against George W. Bush in the 2004 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院院士、化学家、中国医学院药物研究所研究员。
工程师、清华大学教授、香港大学教授。
钢琴家。
香港演员、全国政协委员。
已故一代资深女艺人。
社会教育家。
驻爱尔兰大使、中国外交部国际司副司长。
中华人民共和国外交官，中国外交部首任新闻司司长，乔冠华的原配妻子。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, the first wife of Qiao Guanhua.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府行政院长兼财政部长，亦是银行家及富商，孔子第75代孙。
description.en: A Chinese banker and politician in the Republic of China, he served as Premier and Minister of Finance of the Executive Yuan. He was the 75th generation descendant of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 人大代表、人大常委、政协委员、常务委员。
张孝骞长期工作和任教的医学院，曾担任副校长等职务。
description.en: The medical school where Zhang Xiaoqian worked and taught for a long time, holding positions such as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将。

zh-cn: 第六届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第六届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The sixth session of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 第八届全国人民代表大会
第九届全国人民代表大会
第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国汉朝第六位皇帝，汉武帝之父。
中国汉朝（西汉）第七位皇帝，庙号“世宗”，谥号“孝武皇帝”。他的“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”的政策使儒家思想成为官方意识形态。在位期间，他还征服了多个百越王国。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty, whose policy of 'dismissing the hundred schools of thought and exclusively revering Confucianism' established Confucianism as the state ideology. During his reign, he also conquered several Baiyue kingdoms.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央特别行动科

description.zh-cn: 隋朝创立的中国古代通过考试选拔官员的制度，由隋文帝开创先河，打破了世族对官职的垄断，对后世选官制度影响深远。
description.en: A system for selecting officials through examinations, pioneered by Emperor Wen of Sui in the Sui dynasty, which broke the aristocratic monopoly on official positions and had a profound impact on later official selection systems.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝之母。
汉武帝的第二任皇后。
西汉儒家学者，建议“罢黜百家，表彰六经”。
汉武帝晚年发生的重大政治事件，导致太子刘据、皇后卫子夫等人死亡。
汉武帝为削弱诸侯王势力而颁布的法令。
汉武帝晚年反省其军事和经济政策的诏书。
准噶尔汗国首领
德国耶稣会传教士，与顺治帝建立了私人友谊。
清朝将领
源于孔子思想，由其创立的学术派别，是一个包含哲学、伦理、政治的中国思想体系。它以《论语》为核心经典之一，庄子曾对其部分主张持批评态度。
description.en: Originating from Confucius's thought, and founded by him as an academic school, it is a Chinese system of philosophical, ethical, and political thought. The Analects is one of its core classic texts, and some of its tenets were criticized by Zhuangzi.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇贵妃，雍正帝生母。
description.en: An Imperial Noble Consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the birth mother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学
en: People's Liberation Army National Defense University

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军济南军区

description.zh-cn: 曾为中国人民解放军七大军区之一
原中国人民解放军总后勤部副部长。
美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内接替拉姆斯菲尔德担任国防部长。
description.en: American politician who succeeded Donald Rumsfeld as Secretary of Defense during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会活动家及政治犯，因在西单民主墙发表大字报批评邓小平独裁而长期入狱，后流亡美国。
description.en: A Chinese social activist and political prisoner, imprisoned for a long time for criticizing Deng Xiaoping's dictatorship on the Xidan Democracy Wall, and later exiled to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 杨振宁的第二任妻子。
由杨振宁和李政道提出的关于弱相互作用中宇称不守恒的理论。
中国物理学家。
明朝第四位皇帝，明成祖朱棣长子，明宣宗之父，朱高煦之兄。
description.en: The fourth Emperor of the Ming dynasty, eldest son of the Yongle Emperor, and elder brother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的特务与秘密警察机构，由宦官掌管。魏忠贤在天启年间总督东厂，大肆缉捕迫害异己。
description.en: A spy agency of the Ming dynasty, controlled by eunuchs. Wei Zhongxian commanded the Eastern Depot during the Tianqi era, using it to arrest and persecute his opponents.

description.zh-cn: 明代学者、官员，建文帝时期翰林院侍讲、文学家。在其著作《叶郑传》和《先府君行状》中记载了空印案的相关情况。靖难之变后因拒绝为朱棣草拟即位诏书而被杀。
description.en: A Ming dynasty scholar, official, and literary figure, who served as a Hanlin Academy lecturer during the Jianwen Emperor's reign. He recorded details about the Empty Seal Case in his works 'Biography of Ye and Zheng' and 'Conduct of My Late Father'. After the Jingnan Campaign, he was executed for refusing to draft the enthronement edict for Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣李文忠之子，袭封曹国公。明初将领，在靖难之役中初期任建文帝方主帅，屡战屡败，后开金川门投降燕王朱棣。永乐年间被削爵圈禁。
description.en: Li Jinglong, son of the Ming dynasty's founding Duke Li Wenzhong, inherited his father's title as Duke of Cao. He was a Ming general who initially served as the chief commander of the Jianwen Emperor's forces during the Jingnan campaign. Despite his position, he suffered repeated defeats and eventually opened the Jinchuan Gate to surrender to Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan. In the Yongle era, he was stripped of his title and placed under house arrest.

zh-cn: 交趾等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 明朝在安南（越南）设立的行政机构和行政区划，后废弃。
中国政治人物。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府主席。
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任深圳市市长。

zh-cn: 卡瑟姆若马尔特·托卡耶夫

description.zh-cn: 哈萨克斯坦总统。

en: State Administration of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense

description.zh-cn: 清朝第十位皇帝，孝钦显皇后与咸丰帝的独子，光绪帝的堂兄。
慈禧太后联合恭亲王奕䜣发动的宫廷政变，夺取了实际统治权。
康熙帝第九子，雍正帝的政治对手。
description.en: The ninth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a political rival of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十子。
清朝将领，雍正时期重臣，后被雍正帝赐死。
description.en: An important official during the Yongzheng era of the Qing Dynasty, later forced to commit suicide by the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙、雍正两朝重臣，佟国维之子，康熙帝表弟，孝懿仁皇后之弟，雍正帝舅舅。
description.en: An important official during the Kangxi and Yongzheng eras of the Qing Dynasty, son of Tung-gowei, cousin of the Kangxi Emperor, younger brother of Empress Xiaoyiren, and uncle of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 雍正时期首席军机大臣，大学士，雍正帝遗命的辅政大臣之一。
唐朝皇帝，唐高宗李治和武则天幼子，唐玄宗李隆基之父，李显之弟，曾两次登基、两次禅位，是唐朝第五位和第九位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth and ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 武周皇帝，唐玄宗的祖母，中国历史上唯一获正史承认的女性皇帝。
description.en: Empress of the Wu Zhou dynasty, the only female emperor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗统治前期出现的治世，为唐朝的极盛时期。
description.en: The golden age during the early reign of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗李治与武则天的小女儿，唐玄宗的姑姑，曾与李隆基发生政治斗争。
唐中宗李显的第二任皇后，曾临朝称制，后在唐隆政变中被杀。
唐玄宗第二子，曾为太子，后被武惠妃谗言所害。
卡尔·马克思的妻子。
卡尔·马克思的长女。

zh-cn: 路德维希·冯·威斯特华伦

description.zh-cn: 燕妮·马克思的父亲，卡尔·马克思的岳父。

zh-cn: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，德国古典哲学的集大成者。他对《论语》持批评态度，认为其内容是常识道德，并无出色之处。
description.en: A German philosopher and a major figure in German idealism. He was critical of the Analects, considering its content to be common-sense morality with nothing outstanding.

description.zh-cn: 德国社会活动家。
张献忠建立的政权，定都成都。
张献忠养子。
明末将领。
明朝监军兵备副使。
清朝肃亲王，皇太极长子，曾与多尔衮争夺皇位。
description.en: The eldest son of Hong Taiji, who contended with Dorgon for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举候选人。曾任香港特别行政区政务司司长、财政司司长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, candidate in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election. He previously served as Chief Secretary for Administration and Financial Secretary of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒人
苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

description.zh-cn: 溥仪的堂侄与嗣子。

en: United States Department of Foreign Affairs

location.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿特区哈里·S·杜鲁门大楼
location.en: Harry S. Truman Building, Washington, D.C., United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门，等同于世界各国的“外交部”。其前身是美国第一个联邦外交机构，成立于1789年7月21日，至同年9月15日被国务院取代。该部门曾邀请张孝骞赴美考察讲学。
description.en: The federal executive department of the United States responsible for foreign policy and international relations, equivalent to the foreign ministry of other countries. Its predecessor was the first federal foreign affairs agency of the United States, established on July 21, 1789, and superseded by the Department of State on September 15, 1789. This department also invited Zhang Xiaoqian to the United States for an academic tour.

description.zh-cn: 香港作家、编剧、评论家、演员，与金庸、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。他还是亦舒的胞兄，也是古龙的莫逆之交，曾为《明报》邀请古龙撰写《绝代双骄》，并在古龙去世后，在其棺材里放入XO酒陪葬。
description.en: Hong Kong writer, screenwriter, critic, and actor, known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong'. He is also the elder brother of Yi Shu and a very close friend of Gu Long, having invited him to write 'Juedai Shuangjiao' for Ming Pao daily and placed bottles of XO cognac in Gu Long's coffin for his burial.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.zh-cn: 孔子的儿子。
description.en: Son of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 道家学派的创始人，被道教奉为道祖、教主，其思想对庄周产生了深远影响。
description.en: Founder of the Taoist school of thought, whose ideas profoundly influenced Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 齐国相国。
鲁国大夫，传说被孔子诛杀。
孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一。
description.en: A famous disciple of Confucius, one of the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 李锐之女，传记作家、机械工程师，斯坦福大学胡佛研究所客座研究员。
description.en: Daughter of Li Rui, a biographer, mechanical engineer, and visiting fellow at the Hoover Institution, Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 东北抗日义勇军将领。
源自美国的全球最大视频分享网站，于2006年被Google收购，现为Google子公司。
description.en: The world's largest video-sharing website, acquired by Google in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 《体坛周报》记者及篮球评论员
俄罗斯国防部长。

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会
en: Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝逝世地。
清朝皇帝，乾隆帝第十五子。他是中国清朝的第七位皇帝，也是清军入关后的第五位皇帝。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, the 15th son of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 大学士，雍正帝遗命的辅政大臣之一。
清朝中期名将、重臣。
乾隆帝皇长子。
中华人民共和国政治人物，时任中共重庆市委副书记、重庆市市长。
时任中共重庆市委常委兼政法委书记
一种货币制度，其僵化被认为是导致大萧条蔓延的原因之一。
美国的中央银行系统，在威尔逊总统任内通过《联邦储备法案》而建立。
description.en: The central banking system of the United States, created during the presidency of Woodrow Wilson with the enactment of the Federal Reserve Act.

description.zh-cn: 英国经济学家，凯恩斯主义的创始人。
奥地利裔德国政治人物，纳粹党领袖，1933年至1945年间担任德国总理和元首。他是第二次世界大战的发动者，其崛起与大萧条密切相关，并是墨索里尼在二战中的主要盟友。
description.en: Austrian-born German politician, leader of the Nazi Party, who was Chancellor and Führer of Germany from 1933 to 1945. He was the initiator of World War II and Mussolini's main ally during the war.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，提出了债务紧缩理论。
路易十六的王后，奥地利皇帝的妹妹。
由普选产生的法国立法机构，取代了国民立法议会。
法国大革命时期政治家，雅各宾派成员，后被罗伯斯庇尔处决。
推翻罗伯斯庇尔和雅各宾专政的政变。
拿破仑·波拿巴发动的政变，结束了督政府的统治，标志着法国大革命的结束。
中国共产党内部对改革开放持保留或反对态度的政治派别。在八六学潮后，该派系将学潮归咎于胡耀邦的纵容，并成功施压使其下台。
description.en: A political faction within the Communist Party of China. After the 1986 student demonstrations, this faction blamed the protests on Hu Yaobang's leniency and successfully pressured him into resigning.

description.zh-cn: 意大利政治家、记者，国家法西斯党领袖，法西斯主义创始人。他于1922年至1943年担任意大利王国首相，期间代表意大利王国签署了《拉特兰条约》，并于1943年至1945年担任意大利社会共和国的国家元首。
description.en: Italian politician and journalist who founded and led the National Fascist Party. He was Prime Minister of Italy from 1922 to 1943, during which he signed the Lateran Treaty on behalf of Italy, and Duce of the Italian Social Republic from 1943 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 德国与苏联签署的互不侵犯条约，秘密划分了在东欧的势力范围。
由协约国与德国签订，正式结束第一次世界大战的和平条约。条约内容不仅包含建立国际联盟和对德国施加的严厉条款，其中关于山东问题的条款也引发了中国的五四运动。
description.en: The most important peace treaty signed between the Allied Powers and Germany that officially brought World War I to an end. It included the covenant for the League of Nations, and its clauses concerning the Shandong Problem also triggered the May Fourth Movement in China.

description.zh-cn: 德国、意大利和日本签署的军事同盟条约。
西班牙国民军领袖，后成为西班牙独裁者。
1918年至1992年间存在的中欧国家。
description.en: A Central European country that existed from 1918 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 因中巴经济走廊穿越其主权争议地区而多次反对“一带一路”倡议，并且是金砖国家创始成员国。
微软公司创始人，曾任董事长，“一带一路”计划的明确支持者，并将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为2015年的好消息之一。
description.en: Founder and former chairman of Microsoft Corporation, a clear supporter of the 'Belt and Road' initiative, who listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of the good news stories of 2015.

description.zh-cn: 四川总督
清朝末年由满清宗室贵族组成的政治团体，反对共和。
一个存在于1867年至1918年间的中欧二元君主国。弗朗茨·斐迪南是其皇储。
description.en: A dual monarchy in Central Europe from 1867 to 1918. Franz Ferdinand was its heir presumptive.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国皇储
1962年冷战时期在美国、苏联与古巴之间爆发的一场极其严重的政治、军事危机。肯尼迪总统曾就此咨询艾森豪威尔。
description.en: A major confrontation in 1962 that brought the United States and the Soviet Union close to war over the presence of Soviet nuclear-armed missiles in Cuba. President Kennedy consulted Eisenhower during the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 美国第35任总统。
description.en: 35th President of the United States.

zh-cn: 美国空军中国航空航天研究所

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任空军司令员。
中国人民解放军陆军上将，曾任火箭军政治委员。
汶川地震形成的最危险的堰塞湖。
时任四川省省长，于2012年宣布灾后重建完成。
朝鲜半岛历史上的一个王朝，统治时间为1392年至1897年。它当时是朝鲜半岛的统治政权，名义上为清朝的藩属国，是战争爆发的核心争端地区，并在征韩论时期采取锁国政策。在福泽谕吉的《脱亚论》中被视为应与之“绝交”的“恶友”。
description.en: A Korean dynastic kingdom that ruled the Korean Peninsula from 1392 to 1897. It was the ruling power on the Korean peninsula at that time, nominally a vassal state of the Qing dynasty, and a core disputed area for the outbreak of war. During the Seikanron debate, it adopted a policy of isolationism. It was also regarded by Fukuzawa Yukichi in 'Datsu-A Ron' as a 'bad friend' with whom Japan should break ties.

description.zh-cn: 日本近代政治家，明治维新元老，曾四次担任日本内阁总理大臣（亦是首任），甲午战争期间曾任日本首相，并任首任统监府统监。
description.en: Japanese politician, Meiji Restoration elder, served four terms as Prime Minister of Japan, and was the first Resident-General of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 清朝户部尚书，曾奏准暂停海军购买外洋枪炮船只。
蔡英文政府首任行政院院长，其内阁上任后撤回对126名占领行政院行动者的刑事告诉。
太平天国早期核心领袖，被封为西王。
洪秀全族弟，太平天国后期重要领导人，被封为干王、军师。
大韩民国前总统，韩国民主运动领袖，金泳三的继任总统。他曾推行“阳光政策”，并与金泳三、金钟泌并称为“三金”，在韩国政坛上既是竞争对手也是合作伙伴。其三个儿子也曾担任国会议员。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and Kim Young-sam's successor as president of the Republic of Korea. He implemented the 'Sunshine Policy'. Along with Kim Young-sam and Kim Jong-pil, he was one of the 'Three Kims,' who were both rivals and partners in South Korean politics. His three sons also served as members of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国史上首位女性总统，后遭弹劾下台。
韩国共同民主党党代表，强烈反对2024年戒严令，并呼吁民众保护国会。他本人也在尹锡悦的计划逮捕名单上。
description.en: Leader of the Democratic Party of Korea, who strongly opposed the 2024 martial law, called on citizens to protect the National Assembly, and was on Yoon Suk Yeol's planned arrest list.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第三代最高领导人，金正日之子。现任朝鲜劳动党总书记和国务委员会委员长，并于2018年与文在寅共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: The third supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, son of Kim Jong-il. He is currently serving as the General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and Chairman of the State Affairs Commission, and co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Moon Jae-in in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，现任韩国国会议长。2024年戒严期间，他召集国会会议，并宣布废除戒严令的决议获通过。
description.en: South Korean politician and current Speaker of the National Assembly. During the 2024 martial law, he convened a session of the National Assembly and announced the passage of the resolution to nullify it.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国大法院院长。
大韩民国最高司法机构。

zh-cn: 弗兰克-瓦尔特·施泰因迈尔

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，现任德国联邦总统。
普鲁士国王及首任德意志皇帝。
description.en: King of Prussia and the first German Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 罗马公教会。
西德首任联邦总理。
中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长兼秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman and concurrently Secretary-General of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞曾就读的中学。
description.en: The middle school that Zhang Xiaoqian attended.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的妃嫔。
王洪文的妻子，上海棉纺织十七厂工人。
中国共产党成都市委员会书记
三国时期蜀汉开国皇帝，刘禅之父。他被张松视为可以取代刘璋的明主，并在张松的协助下进入益州，最终夺取了该地。
description.en: Founding emperor of Shu Han, father of Liu Shan. He was seen by Zhang Song as a worthy ruler to replace Liu Zhang, and with Zhang Song's assistance, he entered Yi Province and eventually seized control of it.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期西南方的政权之一，由刘备建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Liu Bei.

zh-cn: 联合国教育、科学及文化组织

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构之一，旨在通过教育、科学和文化促进国际合作。巩俐于2000年被任命为该组织的“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations aimed at promoting international cooperation through education, science, and culture. Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，唐良智的继任重庆市市长，并曾任重庆市副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly Deputy Secretary of Chongqing, and Tang Liangzhi's successor as Mayor of Chongqing.

zh-cn: 重庆市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 南宋皇帝
战国时期秦国政治家
文化大革命期间在重庆发生的保皇派与造反派之间的大规模武装冲突。
description.en: Large-scale armed conflicts between the Royalist and Rebel factions in Chongqing during the Cultural Revolution.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议广东省委员会
en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 战国时期秦国君主，秦朝开国皇帝，中国历史上首位完成华夏大一统的政治人物，也是中国首位称皇帝的君主。他下令实施“焚书坑儒”，导致《论语》等经典几近失传。
description.en: The first political figure to complete the unification of China, and the first monarch in China to be titled 'Emperor'. He also ordered the 'Burning of books and burying of scholars', which nearly led to the loss of classics like the Analects.

description.zh-cn: 由秦朝将领赵佗在岭南地区建立的政权，领有今日广东、广西、海南及越南北部。
description.en: A kingdom founded by the Qin general Zhao Tuo in the Lingnan region, covering present-day Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, and northern Vietnam.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党于1986年开始推行的经济改革政策，旨在建立社会主义市场经济。
description.en: An economic reform policy initiated by the Communist Party of Vietnam in 1986, aimed at establishing a socialist-oriented market economy.

description.zh-cn: 前越南共产党中央委员会总书记、越南社会主义共和国主席。
蒙古帝国的创建者及首任皇帝（大汗），后被元朝追尊为元太祖，是蒙哥的祖父。
description.en: The founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, and the grandfather of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝的南迁政权，是中国南方的汉人政权，是宋朝的后半期，由宋高宗赵构建立。蒙哥在位期间曾对其发动大规模进攻，最终被元朝所灭。
description.en: A Han Chinese dynasty in southern China, which was subjected to a large-scale invasion during Möngke's reign.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗的第四子，蒙哥、元世祖忽必烈、旭烈兀、阿里不哥的父亲。
description.en: The fourth son of Genghis Khan, and the father of Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 元军与南宋军队的最后决战，元朝在此战中彻底消灭南宋流亡政权，标志着南宋的灭亡。
太平道的开创者之一。
东汉末年的道教派别，由张角、于吉等人创立。

en: Way of the Five Pecks of Rice

description.zh-cn: 早期道教组织，由张道陵创立。
中国历史上的一个朝代，是三国的前身。其末期许贡与孙策等人物活跃，周瑜名义上为其臣子，曹昂在此期间生活并被举为孝廉。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty, the predecessor of the Three Kingdoms. During its late period, figures like Xu Gong and Sun Ce were active. Zhou Yu was nominally its subject, and Cao Ang lived during this period and was nominated as Xiaolian.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北方王朝
中国历史上三次由帝王发动的的灭佛事件。
元代曹洞宗高僧，少林寺住持。
西晋天师道祭酒，撰写《老子化胡经》。
description.en: A Celestial Master libationer of the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国中期思想家、哲学家、文学家，道家学派的代表人物，被道教奉为祖师，其著作《南华经》为重要经典。
description.en: A representative figure of Taoism during the Warring States period in China.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏的著名诗人和文学家，曹操与卞氏嫡出之第三子。在其作品《辩道论》中批驳道教神仙说。
description.en: A famous poet and writer of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period, the third son of Cao Cao and Lady Bian.

en: Jim O'Neill, Baron O'Neill of Gatley

description.zh-cn: 高盛公司首席经济师，于2001年首次提出“金砖四国”概念。
于2011年加入金砖国家的成员国。
于2024年加入金砖国家的成员国。
于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
由金砖国家成立的国际开发银行。
梵蒂冈城国国家元首（教宗）。
梵蒂冈城国政府主席。
欧洲联盟的前身之一。
比利时第六任国王，于2013年退位。
欧盟的行政及执行机构。
乌克兰总统，在俄罗斯全面入侵后领导乌克兰进行抵抗。
description.en: President of Ukraine, who has led the country's resistance following the full-scale Russian invasion.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟成员国
2014年4月在乌克兰顿巴斯地区爆发的武装冲突，由俄罗斯支持的分裂分子与乌克兰政府军交战。
description.en: An armed conflict that began in April 2014 in the Donbas region of Ukraine, fought between Russia-backed separatists and Ukrainian government forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期，由段祺瑞领导的北洋军阀主要派系之一，受日本支持。
description.en: One of the main warlord factions during the Beiyang government era of the Republic of China, led by Duan Qirui and supported by Japan.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城
birth_place.en: Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城
death_place.en: Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明朝第六位和第八位皇帝，明宣宗长子，景泰帝的异母兄长，年号正统和天顺。其在位期间，经历土木堡之变被俘，后发动“夺门之变”复辟，并最终废除了宫妃殉葬制度。
description.en: The Zhengtong and Tianshun Emperor (personal name Zhu Qizhen) was the sixth and eighth emperor of the Ming dynasty, and the elder half-brother of the Jingtai Emperor. During his reign, he was captured in the Tumu Crisis, later restored to the throne through the Duomen Coup, and eventually abolished the system of concubine burial.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古族的一支，在土木堡之变中俘虏了明英宗。
description.en: A group of Mongol tribes that captured Emperor Yingzong during the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 明朝名臣，官至兵部尚书、太子太傅。在土木堡之变后拥立朱祁钰（景泰帝）为帝，并领导北京保卫战取得胜利。后在夺门之变后被明英宗以谋逆罪杀害。
description.en: A famous official of the Ming dynasty, serving as Minister of War and Grand Tutor to the Crown Prince. He supported Zhu Qiyu (the Jingtai Emperor)'s ascension to the throne after the Tumu Crisis and led the Defense of Beijing to victory. He was later executed for treason by Emperor Yingzong after the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第七位皇帝（1449年-1457年在位），明宣宗朱瞻基次子，明英宗朱祁镇异母弟。因土木堡之变中兄长被俘而即位，后在夺门之变中被复辟的兄长废黜。
description.en: The Jingtai Emperor (personal name Zhu Qiyu) was the seventh emperor of the Ming dynasty, reigning from 1449 to 1457. He was the second son of the Xuande Emperor and the younger half-brother of the Zhengtong Emperor. He ascended the throne after his brother was captured in the Tumu Crisis, and was later deposed by his brother in the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明代宗景泰八年（1457年），由曹吉祥、石亨、徐有贞等人趁景泰帝病重发动，拥立被软禁的太上皇明英宗复辟的宫廷军事政变，导致景泰帝被废。
description.en: A military and palace coup launched by Cao Jixiang, Shi Heng, Xu Youzhen, and others, who took advantage of the Jingtai Emperor's illness to restore the imprisoned Emperor Emeritus Yingzong to the throne, leading to the deposition of the Jingtai Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗第三子，明朝第十三位皇帝，明代在位时间最长的皇帝，明光宗之父。
明朝末年的一个士大夫政治集团，主张开放言路、澄清吏治，在天启年间遭到阉党的残酷打击。
description.en: A political faction of scholar-officials in the late Ming dynasty who advocated for open criticism and clean governance. They were brutally suppressed by the Eunuch Party during the Tianqi era.

description.zh-cn: 罗马教宗

zh-cn: 亨利四世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝，叙任权斗争中的关键人物。
结束三十年战争的一系列和约，确立了神圣罗马帝国内诸侯的主权。
统治伊朗的最后一个王朝。
巴列维王朝的创始人。
曾任伊朗民选首相，后被政变推翻。
伊拉克共和国。
以色列国。在军事上与新加坡关系紧密，曾派遣军官指导新加坡军队的建立。
description.en: Has close military ties with Singapore and once sent military officers to guide the establishment of the Singaporean army.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军中将，九一八事变策划者之一。
伊斯兰教的主要教派之一，在沙乌地阿拉伯为少数派并受到压制。
伊斯兰教的核心宗教文本，被视为沙乌地阿拉伯的最高宪法。
原中共中央军委办公室主任。
原中共中央警卫局局长。
五代十国时期最后一个朝代。
北宋初年重要将领，在“杯酒释兵权”中被解除兵权。
北宋第二位皇帝，宋太祖赵匡胤之弟。
description.en: The second emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, younger brother of Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 金朝攻破北宋首都东京开封府，俘虏宋徽宗、宋钦宗二帝，导致北宋灭亡的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event in which the Jin dynasty conquered the Northern Song capital, Tokyo, and captured Emperors Huizong and Qinzong, leading to the fall of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋政治家、改革家，在宋神宗支持下推行新法，主导熙宁变法。
description.en: A politician and reformer of the Northern Song dynasty who, with the support of Emperor Shenzong, implemented the New Policies, leading the Xining Reforms.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的主要机构之一，曾通过决议授权北约采取军事行动，并通过第84号决议授权组建了联合国军。
description.en: One of the principal organs of the United Nations, which authorized the formation of the United Nations Command through Resolution 84.

description.zh-cn: 利比亚前领导人，其政权是2011年北约军事干预的目标。
Google于2015年重组后成立的控股母公司，总部位于美国。
description.en: The holding parent company established after Google's restructuring in 2015, headquartered in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 一款由Google主导开发并持续更新的移动设备操作系统，于2005年被Google公司收购。
description.en: A mobile operating system primarily developed and continuously updated by Google, acquired by Google in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府在其管辖互联网内部建立的互联网审查系统，常被称为“互联网边界审查系统”，导致“温云松”等词成为网络搜索的敏感词。
description.en: The common term for the Internet censorship system of the Chinese government, which has made terms like 'Wen Yunsong' sensitive for web searches.

description.zh-cn: 中央音乐学院教授、音乐教育系首任系主任。
明朝末年将领，督师。
明世宗第三子，明朝第十三位皇帝
description.en: Third son of the Jiajing Emperor, the 13th emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅、明穆宗顾命大臣。在明神宗即位之初被冯保和张居正排挤。此外，他还曾被任命为《永乐大典》重录工作的总校官。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty and a regent appointed by Emperor Muzong. He was later pushed out by Feng Bao and Zhang Juzheng at the beginning of Emperor Shenzong's reign. Additionally, he was appointed as the general proofreader for the project to create a duplicate copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 日本战国时代末期至安土桃山时代的武将、天下人，发动了侵略朝鲜的战争。
拖雷的正妻，蒙哥、忽必烈、旭烈兀、阿里不哥的母亲，在推举蒙哥称汗的过程中起到了关键作用。
description.en: The chief wife of Tolui, mother of Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke, who played a key role in the enthronement of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年权相。
香港女星，倪匡的儿媳，亦舒的侄媳，倪震的妻子。
description.en: Hong Kong celebrity, daughter-in-law of Ni Kuang, niece-in-law of Yi Shu, and wife of Joe Nieh.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡和亦舒的胞兄，中国化工专家。
description.en: Elder brother of Ni Kuang and Yi Shu, a Chinese chemical engineering expert.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的胞妹，华裔加拿大籍香港文艺小说作家，原籍浙江镇海。其作品的女主角多为自爱自强的都市女性，影响了众多中文读者。
description.en: Younger sister of Ni Kuang, a Chinese-Canadian Hong Kong romance novelist, with ancestral roots in Zhenhai, Zhejiang. The heroines in her works are mostly self-respecting and strong-willed urban women, influencing numerous Chinese readers.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡和亦舒的胞弟，新加坡工程领域专家。
description.en: Younger brother of Ni Kuang and Yi Shu, an engineering expert in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名音乐人、词曲作家、作家，与倪匡、金庸、蔡澜并称“香港四大才子”。他曾在黎明走音事件后公开表示其为可造之才。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong musician, songwriter, and writer, known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong' along with Ni Kuang, Jin Yong and Chua Lam. He publicly stated that Leon Lai had great potential after an incident where Lai sang off-key.

description.zh-cn: 金庸的武侠小说。
description.en: Wuxia novel by Jin Yong.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年宰相。
description.en: A chancellor in the early Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南唐末代君主，中国历史上首屈一指的词人，后人誉为“千古词帝”。他是小周后与大周后的丈夫。他被北宋俘虏后，曾获封第一个封号。宋太宗即位后改封给李煜的爵位。
description.en: The last ruler of the Southern Tang, a famous poet, and the husband of Lesser Empress Zhou and Great Empress Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 曾任浙江省副书记兼省长
中国政治人物，曾任浙江省委书记、省长、省人大常委会主任。他是夏宝龙担任浙江省委书记时的副手及继任者，也是袁家军的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, Governor of Zhejiang, and Director of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress Standing Committee. He was Xia Baolong's deputy and successor as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, and also Yuan Jiajun's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任浙江省委书记、省人大常委会主任，以及江西省人民政府省长。此前，他接替袁家军担任浙江省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, who formerly served as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress, and Governor of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Government. He previously succeeded Yuan Jiajun as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee.

en: Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress
zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 袁家军的继任浙江省常务副省长
出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一
中国影视公司
李讷与徐宁的儿子。
成吉思汗的父亲，蒙古乞颜部首领。
成吉思汗的安答（结拜兄弟）和后来的主要对手。
克烈部首领，成吉思汗早期的保护者和盟友，后成为对手。
位于中亚的突厥-波斯王朝，后被蒙古所灭。
南宋初期湖东路乱匪首领
法轮功总部，李洪志的居住地。
description.en: Headquarters of Falun Gong and residence of Li Hongzhi.

description.zh-cn: 2019冠状病毒病在中国大陆的流行情况。
description.en: The outbreak of COVID-19 in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、医师，台湾民众党创党主席，曾任台北市市长，柯美兰的胞兄。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, founding chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, former Mayor of Taipei, and the elder brother of Ko Mei-lan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，傅兆林之子。现任立法委员、中国国民党立法院党团总召集人，并担任中国国民党中央委员会政策委员会执行长。曾任花莲县县长。他是大罢免运动中罢免泛蓝阵营的指标性人物之一，也是徐榛蔚的丈夫。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, son of Fu Zhaolin. He is a KMT legislator and currently serves as the caucus convener for the KMT in the Legislative Yuan, and also as the Executive Director of the KMT Policy Committee. He previously served as Hualien County Magistrate. He was one of the iconic targets of the recall effort against the Pan-Blue camp during the Great Recall movement, and is the husband of Hsu Chen-wei.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第五位皇帝，明仁宗朱高炽长子，明英宗和景泰帝的父亲，朱高煦之侄。他平定了叔父朱高煦的叛乱，并非常器重于谦。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, eldest son of the Hongxi Emperor Zhu Gaochi, father of Emperor Yingzong and the Jingtai Emperor, and nephew of Zhu Gaoxu. He suppressed the rebellion of his uncle Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝重臣，历仕建文、永乐、洪熙、宣德四朝。
description.en: An important official of the Ming dynasty, serving four emperors.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第七位皇帝，宋神宗的第六子和继任者，宋徽宗之兄。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, the sixth son and successor of Emperor Shenzong, and elder brother of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宰相，曾反对宋徽宗继位。
description.en: A chancellor of the Northern Song dynasty who opposed Emperor Huizong's succession.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宰相，宋徽宗时期“六贼”之一，被认为是导致北宋灭亡的奸臣。
description.en: A chancellor of the Northern Song dynasty, one of the "Six Traitors" during Emperor Huizong's reign, considered a corrupt official who contributed to the fall of the dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由契丹族建立的统治中国北方的封建王朝，与北宋长期对峙。
description.en: A feudal dynasty established by the Khitan people that ruled northern China and was a long-term rival of the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 北宋著名词人，传说与宋徽宗为李师师争风吃醋。
description.en: A famous poet of the Northern Song dynasty, rumored to have been a rival of Emperor Huizong for the affection of Li Shishi.

birth_place.en: Yangdu County, Langya Commandery, Eastern Han

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相，刘备的主要辅佐大臣，受刘备托孤辅佐刘禅。他也是诸葛瑾之弟，诸葛乔的养父。他是一位杰出的政治家、军事家、发明家及散文家，曾于228年征集兵丁守护都江堰，并设立专职堰官进行管理。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, he served as regent for Liu Shan on Liu Bei's request. He was the younger brother of Zhuge Jin and the adoptive father of Zhuge Qiao. An outstanding statesman, military strategist, inventor, and writer, he also conscripted soldiers in 228 to guard Dujiangyan and established specialized weir officials for its management.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉名将，刘备的义弟，刘禅的岳父，五虎上将之一。
description.en: A military general serving under the warlord Liu Bei in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period of China, and the father-in-law of Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉将领，曾在长坂坡保护刘禅。
description.en: A general of Shu Han who protected Liu Shan at Changban.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏政权的奠基者。他是曹昂、曹丕之父，曹叡的祖父。许贡在上表中曾提及孙策对他构成威胁。张松曾奉命出使见他，但因其态度傲慢，未能招揽张松，反而使张松心生怨恨。
description.en: A warlord and the penultimate grand chancellor of the Eastern Han dynasty who rose to great power in the final years of the dynasty. He laid the foundation for the state of Cao Wei, was the father of Cao Ang and Cao Pi, and the grandfather of Cao Rui. Xu Gong mentioned in his memorial that Sun Ce posed a threat to him. When Zhang Song was sent as an envoy, his arrogant attitude failed to win him over and instead earned his resentment.

description.zh-cn: 孙策之弟，三国时期孙吴开国皇帝，六朝开拓者之首。
description.en: Younger brother of Sun Ce, and founder of the state of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名将及割据军阀。
东汉末年军阀，袁熙之父。
东汉末年军阀
原为刘璋的部下，与张松关系良好。后与张松一同策划并协助刘备夺取益州，成为刘备的谋士。在取益州和汉中时多有贡献。
description.en: Originally a subordinate of Liu Zhang and an associate of Zhang Song. He later conspired with Zhang Song to assist Liu Bei in taking control of Yi Province, after which he became Liu Bei's strategist. He made significant contributions during the campaigns to take Yi Province and Hanzhong.

description.zh-cn: 刘璋的属下，后献图于刘备，促成刘备入蜀。
唐高宗李治第五子，武则天长子。
武则天的男宠。
唐中宗第七女。
唐朝、武周时期的著名宰相。
description.en: A famous chancellor of the Tang and Wu Zhou dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 武则天之侄。
description.en: Nephew of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 清朝后期政治家、思想家、文学家和学者，以在广东发起的禁烟运动及虎门销烟而闻名，是第一次鸦片战争中的关键人物。他主张了解和学习西方技术，被认为是中国近代“开眼看世界的第一人”。
description.en: A prominent Chinese scholar and official of the late Qing dynasty, best known for his role in the First Opium War and the destruction of opium at Humen. He was a proponent of learning from Western technology and is considered the 'first person to open his eyes to the world' in modern China.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝开国皇帝，唐太宗李世民之父。隋末时于晋阳起兵，攻入长安，废隋恭帝杨侑后称帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Tang dynasty and the father of Emperor Taizong, Li Shimin. He rebelled in Jinyang during the late Sui, captured Chang'an, and proclaimed himself emperor after deposing Emperor Gong Yang You.

description.zh-cn: 唐高祖李渊的皇后，唐太宗李世民之母。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Gaozu of Tang and mother of Emperor Taizong, Li Shimin.

description.zh-cn: 由李世民发动的宫廷政变，通过杀死兄长李建成和四弟李元吉，确立了其皇位继承权。
description.en: A palace coup launched by Li Shimin, securing his succession to the throne by killing his elder brother Li Jiancheng and younger brother Li Yuanji.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的皇后，李泰的母亲，以贤德著称。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Taizong of Tang, mother of Li Tai, known for her virtue and wisdom.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝作为中亚和北亚各民族的国际同盟之主的称号，始于唐太宗。
description.en: A title for the Tang emperor as the head of an international alliance of various peoples in Central and North Asia, starting with Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗时期的主要谋士和宰相，与房玄龄并称“房谋杜断”。
description.en: A key advisor and chancellor to Emperor Taizong, known for his decisive judgment.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜半岛北部的古代王国，曾与隋朝和唐朝发生多次大规模战争，亦与新朝关系恶化。
description.en: An ancient kingdom on the Korean Peninsula that engaged in prolonged warfare with the Tang and Sui dynasties, and also had deteriorating relations with the Xin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗第四子，深得宠爱，与太子李承干争夺储位，后被贬。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Taizong, highly favored by his father, who vied for the crown prince position with Li Chengqian and was later demoted.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆帝的原配妻子和第一任皇后。
毛泽东嫡孙，毛岸青与邵华之子。中国军事研究员，中国人民解放军少将。
毛岸英之妻刘思齐和毛岸青之妻邵华的母亲，毛新宇的外祖母。
中国软件公司。
description.en: A Chinese software company.

description.zh-cn: 金山软件创始人之一，雷军在金山软件的同事。
description.en: One of the founders of Kingsoft, colleague of Lei Jun at Kingsoft.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任吉林省省长。
北京市下的一个行政区，此处指其政府机构。
曾任重庆市公安局局长。
清朝末期满洲贵族、大臣。在鸦片战争期间持主和态度，与林则徐政见不合，后接替林则徐任两广总督，与英方签订《穿鼻草约》。
description.en: A Manchu nobleman and minister of the late Qing dynasty. He held a pro-peace stance during the Opium War, clashing with Lin Zexu. He later succeeded Lin as the Governor-General of Liangguang and signed the Convention of Chuanbi with the British.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗的护卫将军，在土木堡之变中杀死王振后战死。
description.en: Emperor Yingzong's guard general, who killed Wang Zhen during the Tumu Crisis and died in battle.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，夺门之变主谋之一。复辟后把持朝政，后因图谋叛乱被清算。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty general and one of the masterminds of the Duomen Coup. After the restoration, he controlled the court but was later purged for plotting a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，夺门之变主谋之一。力主杀害于谦，后被清算流放。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty official and one of the masterminds of the Duomen Coup. He strongly advocated for the execution of Yu Qian and was later purged and exiled.

description.zh-cn: 战国末年秦国人物，秦始皇之母赵姬的面首。后因发动叛乱失败被车裂处死。
description.en: Lover of Queen Dowager Zhao, later executed for rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇长子，原定的皇位继承人。
description.en: The eldest son and original heir of Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相，文学家、书法家，法家代表人物，韩非的同学。
description.en: Chancellor of the Qin dynasty, a key Legalist figure, and a fellow student of Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 秦国将领，秦灭六国战争中的主要将领之一。
description.en: A leading general of the state of Qin during the wars of unification.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期韩国法家思想家，法家思想的代表人物与集大成者。他曾多次上书韩桓惠王，要求推行法治以图富强。后为李斯的同学，但最终被李斯所害。
description.en: A Legalist philosopher from the State of Han during the late Warring States period, he was a representative and synthesizer of the Legalist school. He repeatedly submitted memorials to King Huanhui of Han, advocating for the implementation of the rule of law to strengthen the state. He was a fellow student of Li Si and was later executed by him.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国功臣，出身于韩国贵族，其祖父与父亲曾五代相韩。曾策划博浪沙行刺秦始皇，后为汉初三杰之一。汉初，曾作为大臣为吕后出谋划策，保住太子刘盈的地位。
description.en: A founding father of the Han Dynasty, who came from the nobility of the State of Han, and whose grandfather and father served as chancellors to five generations of Han rulers. He plotted an assassination attempt on Qin Shi Huang at Bolangsha and later became a key strategist for the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 燕王喜的太子，派遣荆轲刺杀秦王。
description.en: Crown Prince of Yan who dispatched Jing Ke to assassinate the King of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的诸侯国，战国七雄之一，最终统一六国并建立秦朝。在战国时期，李冰曾担任蜀郡郡守。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou Dynasty in China, and one of the Seven Warring States. It eventually unified the other six states and established the Qin dynasty. During the Warring States period, Li Bing served as the governor of Shu Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一。
description.en: One of the seven major states of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 古代中国南方和越南北部的各部落的统称。
description.en: A collective term for various tribes inhabiting Southern China and Northern Vietnam in ancient times.

description.zh-cn: 为抵御北方游牧民族而修筑的军事防御工程。
description.en: A series of fortifications built for military defense against northern nomadic peoples.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇的陵墓，位于今陕西省西安市临潼区。
description.en: The mausoleum of Qin Shi Huang, located in Lintong District, Xi'an, Shaanxi province.

description.zh-cn: 国际非政府组织，致力于倡导新闻自由。
description.en: An international non-governmental organization that advocates for freedom of the press.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯雄之女。
中国工程院院士，被认为是防火长城的首要设计师。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, considered to be the principal designer of the Great Firewall.

description.zh-cn: 美国科技公司，曾是中盈优创的合作伙伴。
description.en: An American technology company that was a partner of Unihub.

en: Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences
zh-cn: 中国科学院信息工程研究所

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》旗下的报纸，在艾未未被捕后发表多篇社评对其进行批评。
description.en: A newspaper under the People's Daily that published multiple editorials criticizing Ai Weiwei after his arrest.

description.zh-cn: Google提供的电子邮件服务。
description.en: Email service provided by Google.

description.zh-cn: 一种用于匿名通信的自由及开放源代码软件。
description.en: Free and open-source software for enabling anonymous communication.

description.zh-cn: 发生于台东泰源监狱的政治犯武装起义事件，参与者多为台湾独立运动人士。
description.en: An armed uprising of political prisoners at Taiyuan Prison in Taitung, primarily involving Taiwan independence movement activists.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国国务卿。
description.en: U.S. Secretary of State at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Armed Forces and Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 世界女子职业网球的管理组织。在此事件中，该组织公开声援彭帅，并暂停了在中国的赛事。
description.en: The governing body of women's professional tennis. In this incident, the organization publicly supported Peng Shuai and suspended its tournaments in China.

description.zh-cn: 该组织在此事件中与彭帅进行视频通话，并称其安全无虞，但其做法被外界批评为帮助中国政府掩盖真相。
description.en: In this incident, the organization held video calls with Peng Shuai and claimed she was safe, but its actions were criticized by outsiders for helping the Chinese government cover up the truth.

description.zh-cn: 德国军事顾问团团长，为国军提供作战指导。
国军团附，率领八百壮士坚守四行仓库。
上海租界青帮大老、商人、政治人物，与黄金荣、张啸林并称“上海滩三大亨”。作为青帮头目及上海地方领袖，他在四一二事件中组织力量协助国民党清党，并利用其关系配合国军作战计划，在闸北秘密修建掩体。
description.en: Du Yuesheng was a prominent Green Gang boss, businessman, and political figure in the Shanghai International Settlement, known as one of "Shanghai's Big Three" alongside Huang Jinrong and Zhang Xiaolin. As a Green Gang leader and local Shanghai figure, he organized forces to assist the Kuomintang (KMT) in the party purge during the April 12th Incident, and also utilized his connections to cooperate with KMT military plans, secretly constructing bunkers in Zhabei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期存在多支武装力量。其中一支由杨虎城领导，主体为国民革命军第十七路军；另有由冯玉祥领导的军阀派系，受苏联支持。
description.en: During the Republican era, there were multiple armed forces. One was led by Yang Hucheng, primarily the 17th Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army; another was a warlord clique led by Feng Yuxiang, supported by the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任福建省委书记、福建省人大常委会主任，曾任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Party Secretary and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Fujian, and former Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 闽越国宗室、繇王
description.en: A member of the Minyue royal family, King Yao

description.zh-cn: 晚清洋务运动时期创办的近代军事工业
description.en: A modern military industry founded during the Self-Strengthening Movement in the late Qing dynasty

description.zh-cn: 南梁王朝的建立者，大力扶持佛教发展，并推动汉传佛教素食传统。
汉传佛教的一个主要宗派，由菩提达摩传入中国。
汉朝的开国皇帝，史称汉高祖。在楚汉相争中击败项羽，统一中国。
description.en: The founder and first emperor of the Han dynasty, known as Emperor Gaozu of Han. He defeated Xiang Yu in the Chu–Han Contention and unified China.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的开国皇帝。他是曹操与卞氏的嫡长子，也是曹昂的异母弟。他接受汉献帝禅让，结束东汉，并在称帝后追尊曹昂为王。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Cao Wei. He was the eldest son of Cao Cao and Lady Bian, and also the half-brother of Cao Ang. After ascending to the throne, he posthumously honored Cao Ang as a king.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝灭亡后，项羽与刘邦之间为争夺统治权而进行的战争。
description.en: A war for supremacy over China between Xiang Yu and Liu Bang following the collapse of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 楚汉战争的决定性战役，刘邦击败项羽。
汉高祖刘邦的皇后，汉惠帝刘盈的母亲。刘邦死后，她临朝称制，掌握汉朝实权。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang). After Liu Bang's death, she ruled as empress dowager and regent, holding de facto power over the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第二位皇帝，刘邦与吕后之子。
西汉开国功臣，与张良、萧何并称“汉初三杰”，与彭越、英布并称“汉初三大名将”，被后人誉为“兵仙”、“国士无双”。军事才能卓著，后被刘邦用陈平之计擒获。
description.en: A founding general of the Western Han dynasty, one of the 'Three Heroes of the early Han dynasty'. He was an outstanding military commander who was later captured by Liu Bang using Chen Ping's strategy.

description.zh-cn: 西汉政治家，建议削藩，引发七国之乱。
连接古代东西方的商道。

en: Ministry of Radio, Film, and Television of the People's Republic of China
zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责广播、电影、电视等方面工作的组成部门。

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省湖州市吴兴区

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、记者。

zh-cn: 国家广播电影电视总局

description.zh-cn: 中国政治学者、民运人士。
description.en: Chinese political scientist and pro-democracy activist.

description.zh-cn: 指1967-68年间因大规模武斗导致中国大陆进入的“全面内战”状态。

zh-cn: 清华大学附属中学红卫兵

description.zh-cn: 中国最早的红卫兵组织之一。
莫斯科大公和首位俄罗斯沙皇。
description.en: Grand Prince of Moscow and the first Tsar of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 北京师范大学女子附属中学党总支书记兼副校长。在北京“红八月”期间被该校红卫兵批斗致死，是北京市首位在文革中被打死的教育工作者。
description.en: Party Branch Secretary and Vice Principal of the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School. She was beaten to death by Red Guards during the 'Red August,' becoming the first educator killed in Beijing during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期工人运动领袖，时任上海总工会委员长，在四一二事件中被杀害。
description.en: The chairman of the Shanghai General Labor Union at the time, who was killed during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 京剧老生演员，杜月笙五房太太，曾与梅兰芳有过一段未获家族承认的婚姻关系。
description.en: A Peking Opera Laosheng actress, Du Yuesheng's fifth wife, who had a relationship with Mei Lanfang that was not recognized by his family.

description.zh-cn: 李光耀的妻子，李显龙的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Lee Kuan Yew, mother of Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 李显龙的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 李显龙的妹妹。
description.en: Sister of Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡第二任总理。
description.en: Second Prime Minister of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨首相。
description.en: Prime Minister of Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 明代蒙古部落，曾骚扰明朝边疆。
明宣宗元配皇后，后被废。
英国工党政治家，曾任丘吉尔的副首相，后接替其成为首相。
description.en: British Labour politician who served as Churchill's Deputy Prime Minister and later succeeded him as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由曹丕建立，后接受了刘禅的投降。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi, and later accepted Liu Shan's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 刘备重要谋士，与诸葛亮齐名，号称“凤雏”。
description.en: An important advisor to Liu Bei, as famous as Zhuge Liang, known as the 'Fledgling Phoenix'.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮为实现“兴复汉室，还于旧都”的目标而对曹魏发动的五次军事行动。
description.en: A series of five military campaigns launched by Zhuge Liang against the state of Cao Wei in order to restore the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉官员，因在街亭之战中失利而被诸葛亮处斩。
description.en: An official of Shu Han, executed by Zhuge Liang after his defeat at the Battle of Jieting.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏的太傅、政治家、军事家、权臣，西晋的奠基人。诸葛亮北伐时的主要对手，高平陵之变后掌控曹魏大权。
description.en: A strategist, politician, and regent of the state of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period of China, and the founder of the Jin dynasty. He was also the primary adversary of Zhuge Liang during the Northern Expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初期的皇宫，顺治帝出生地。

en: People's Public Security University of China

description.zh-cn: 中国公安系统最高学府
中国政治人物，原河南省公安厅厅长
中华人民共和国人民警察警衔体系的最高等级
中国政治人物，时任河南省省长
军统总务处处长
贺子珍之兄。
贺子珍之妹，毛泽覃之妻。
美国女记者。
中国历史上继西周之后的朝代。
description.en: The second half of the Zhou dynasty of ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期函谷关关令，请老子著《道德经》。
description.en: The guardian of the Hangu Pass during the Spring and Autumn period who asked Laozi to write the Tao Te Ching.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国初期思想家。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher during the early Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 老子之母。
description.en: Laozi's mother.

description.zh-cn: 道教的最高神祇。
description.en: The highest deities in the Taoist pantheon.

description.zh-cn: 毛新宇的第一任妻子。
罗斯福的第三任副总统，曾任农业部长。
description.en: Roosevelt's third-term Vice President and former Secretary of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 富兰克林·罗斯福的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Franklin D. Roosevelt.

description.zh-cn: 允许美国向盟国提供军事物资的法案。
description.en: A program under which the United States supplied Allied nations with war material.

description.zh-cn: 明朝分封于各地的宗室亲王，拥有私人军队。
明太祖朱元璋第五子，明朝藩王，周王。建文帝时期被废为庶人。
description.en: The fifth son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第十三子，建文帝时期被废为庶人。
台湾商人及前公务员。曾任台湾省政府建设厅工程师及住宅及都市发展局处长，后从商担任凯聚集团、茂凯公司董事长，亦曾任德发慈善基金董事长。其子为政治人物傅崐萁。曾因在1997年亚洲金融风暴期间违反公司法，于2010年被判处缓刑。
description.en: Taiwanese businessman and former civil servant. He served as an engineer in the Department of Construction and a director of the Housing and Urban Development Bureau of the Taiwan Provincial Government. He later entered business as the chairman of Kai Chu Group and Mao Kai Company, and also served as chairman of the De Fa Charitable Foundation. His son is the politician Fu Kun-chi. He received a suspended sentence in 2010 for violating company law during the 1997 Asian financial crisis.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任基隆市市长。
指控傅崐萁性骚扰的媒体人。
科普作家，以学术打假著称。他撰文批评《穹顶之下》，质疑其数据和叙事手法的真实性。
description.en: A popular science writer known for exposing academic misconduct. He wrote an article criticizing 'Under the Dome', questioning the authenticity of its data and narrative.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演
中国作家、编剧
原快鹿集团主席，因集资诈骗案被通缉

zh-cn: 中国东方航空5735号班机空难

description.zh-cn: 西汉初年异姓王，汉初三大名将之一。
西汉初年丞相，汉高祖刘邦的谋臣。
金日成之父。
金日成的第三任妻子，金平一的母亲。
description.en: The third wife of Kim Il-sung and the mother of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松的妻子，美国第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of Richard Nixon and First Lady of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国副总统，在1968年总统选举中被理查德·尼克松击败。
description.en: Vice President of the United States, defeated by Richard Nixon in the 1968 presidential election.

en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府行政分支中位阶第二高的官员，理查德·尼克松曾担任此职。
description.en: The second-highest officer in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government, an office held by Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职的重大政治丑闻。
description.en: A major political scandal that led to the resignation of President Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，并州刺史，吕布的早期主君。
东汉末年权臣、军阀，官至太师，其乱政导致许靖等人逃离京城，后被吕布所杀。
description.en: A powerful minister and warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty, who served as Grand Tutor. His tyrannical rule caused figures like Xu Jing to flee the capital, and he was later killed by Lü Bu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，官至司徒，与吕布合谋诛杀董卓。
董卓旧部，在董卓死后击败吕布，占据长安。
董卓旧部，在董卓死后与李傕一同击败吕布，占据长安。
唐高宗长子。
台湾政治人物，现任卓荣泰内阁劳动部部长。
description.en: Minister of Labor in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物及军事评论员。
台湾政治人物、政治幕僚、政治评论人、节目主持人。
周慧敏的丈夫，亦舒的侄子，作家倪匡之子。
description.en: Yi Shu's nephew, son of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟的父亲，美国陆军中将
description.en: Father of Douglas MacArthur, United States Army lieutenant general

description.zh-cn: 美国远征军司令
description.en: Commander of the American Expeditionary Forces

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗的宠妃，比宪宗年长17岁。
description.en: The favorite consort of the Chenghua Emperor, 17 years his senior.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的一名中官，善于以诙谐幽默的方式进谏。
description.en: A court official during the Chenghua era, skilled in offering remonstrance through humor.

description.zh-cn: 郧阳民变首领之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Yunyang refugee rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗第四子，明世宗生父，被追尊为皇帝
description.en: Biological father of the Jiajing Emperor, posthumously honored as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏时期创立的，并成为魏晋南北朝时期主要的官员选拔制度，后被隋文帝废除。
description.en: An official selection system established during the Cao Wei period, which became the primary system for selecting officials during the Wei, Jin, Northern and Southern dynasties, and was later abolished by Emperor Wen of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室名将，托孤大臣之一。
曹魏将领。
曹操与卞氏的幼子。
description.en: The youngest son of Cao Cao and Lady Bian.

description.zh-cn: 曹昂的同母弟，早逝。
description.en: The full younger brother of Cao Ang, who died young.

description.zh-cn: 魏凤和的继任中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队参谋长。
曹操从弟，曹魏重要将领。
曹魏将领。
蜀汉将领，后投降东吴。
孙吴重要战略家、外交家。
秦宜禄前妻，后为曹操所纳。
