description.en: Cai Xia publicly and severely criticized CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping, calling him a 'mafia boss', which led to her expulsion from the party.

description.zh-cn: 中美贸易战对习近平任内的中美关系和经济造成冲击。
description.en: The China-U.S. trade war impacted Sino-U.S. relations and the economy during Xi Jinping's term.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在武则天时期担任宰相。
description.en: Di Renjie served as chancellor during the reign of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 武承嗣勾结来俊臣诬陷狄仁杰谋反，使其下狱。
description.en: Wu Chengsi colluded with Lai Junchen to falsely accuse Di Renjie of rebellion, leading to his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在武则天时代的贡献为后来的开元盛世奠定了基础。
description.en: Di Renjie's contributions during the Wu Zetian era laid the foundation for the subsequent Kaiyuan Flourishing Age.

description.zh-cn: 举荐了姚崇等数十位干练的官员。
description.en: Recommended dozens of capable officials, including Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 追封狄仁杰为梁国公。
description.en: Posthumously ennobled Di Renjie as the Duke of Liang.

description.zh-cn: 上谏劝阻武则天停止建造耗资巨大的浮屠大像。
description.en: Advised Wu Zetian to stop the costly construction of a giant Buddha statue.

description.zh-cn: 曹操率军攻破袁绍的根据地邺城。
曹操率军攻破邺城，导致袁熙与妻子甄氏分离。
写信以“武王伐纣，以妲己赐周公”的故事讽刺曹操将甄氏赐予其子曹丕的行为。
庄子的思想继承和发展了老子的思想，其学说要本归于老子之言。
description.en: Zhuangzi's thought inherited and developed Laozi's thought; his doctrine is fundamentally based on Laozi's words.

description.zh-cn: 于天宝初年下诏，追封庄周为南华真人。
description.en: In the early Tianbao era, he issued an edict to posthumously honor Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 批评儒家的“仁义”违背人性，反对其等级观念和礼法治国。
description.en: Criticized Confucian concepts of 'benevolence and righteousness' as being against human nature, and opposed its hierarchical concepts and rule by rites.

description.zh-cn: 反对法家以法律治国的主张。
description.en: Opposed the Legalist proposition of governing by law.

description.zh-cn: 借盗跖之口批评孔子是“鲁之巧伪人”。
description.en: Through the voice of the character Robber Zhi, criticized Confucius as a 'cunning and hypocritical man of Lu'.

description.zh-cn: 跟随毛泽东参加秋收起义。
在长征途中举荐起用张宗逊。
在大同集宁战役中，张宗逊率部与傅作义部交战后惨败。
毛泽东向黄永胜询问张宗逊去向，促使其被任命为济南军区副司令员。
吕布袭取下邳，与刘备、张飞交战。
在长坂坡之战中，张飞率二十骑据水断桥，阻挡了曹操的追兵。
在胡先翁担任首相期间，马哈迪是其副手。
description.en: Mahathir was Hussein Onn's deputy during his premiership.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪退休后，开始批评他亲自挑选的继任者阿都拉·巴达威的政策。
description.en: After retiring, Mahathir began to criticize the policies of his handpicked successor, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 因一个马来西亚发展有限公司丑闻（1MDB）而成为纳吉的激烈批评者，并领导反对派推翻其政府。
description.en: Became a fierce critic of Najib over the 1MDB scandal and led the opposition to overthrow his government.

description.zh-cn: 在被土著团结党开除党籍后，马哈迪于2020年8月宣布成立新政党“祖国斗士党”。
description.en: After being expelled from Bersatu, Mahathir announced the formation of a new party, Pejuang, in August 2020.

description.zh-cn: 习近平与马哈迪通话，马哈迪对新冠肺炎疫情表示慰问，习近平称马哈迪为“中国人民的老朋友”。
description.en: Xi Jinping and Mahathir had a phone call where Mahathir expressed sympathy regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, and Xi referred to Mahathir as an "old friend of the Chinese people".

description.zh-cn: 明世宗深居西苑后，将政令皆交由严嵩父子打理，使其专权近二十年。
description.en: After retreating to the West Park, the Jiajing Emperor delegated all government affairs to Yan Song and his son, allowing them to monopolize power for nearly 20 years.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间多次率领蒙古鞑靼部落寇边。
description.en: Led Mongol Tatar tribes to raid the border multiple times during the Jiajing era.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间侵扰中国东南沿海，造成严重破坏。
description.en: Raided the southeastern coast of China during the Jiajing era, causing severe destruction.

description.zh-cn: 联邦调查局指控钱学森在入籍申请中隐瞒其共产党外围组织活动，导致其机密工作许可被吊销。
description.en: The FBI accused Qian Xuesen of concealing his activities in communist front organizations on his naturalization application, leading to the revocation of his security clearance.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森是加州理工学院喷气推进实验室的主要创建者之一，为美国的火箭和航天计划做出了重大贡献。
description.en: Qian Xuesen was one of the main founders of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory at Caltech and made significant contributions to the U.S. rocket and space programs.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间保护了钱学森，使其免受冲击。
description.en: Protected Qian Xuesen from persecution during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 江泽慧是江绵恒的姑姑。
陪同曾庆红参观上海韩天衡美术馆。
description.en: Accompanied Zeng Qinghong on a visit to the Han Tianheng Art Museum in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陪同吴邦国视察上海工博会中国科学院展区。
description.en: Accompanied Wu Bangguo to inspect the Chinese Academy of Sciences exhibition area at the Shanghai Industry Fair.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，两人关系密切。
description.en: Reportedly had a close relationship.

description.zh-cn: 是甲午中日战争的主要策划和发动者。
description.en: Was a main planner and instigator of the First Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 上《谏逐客书》成功说服秦王政废除驱逐客卿的命令。
李斯因嫉妒韩非的才华，向秦王政进谗言，导致韩非下狱，并最终在狱中将其毒死。
description.en: Out of jealousy of Han Fei's talent, Li Si slandered him to King Zheng of Qin, leading to Han Fei's imprisonment and eventual death by poison in jail.

description.zh-cn: 李斯与赵高合谋，伪造遗诏，以不孝罪名赐死扶苏。
李斯因《谏逐客书》被秦王政赏识后，官至廷尉。
为替韩国复仇，在博浪沙伏击行刺秦始皇，但未成功。
在鸿门宴事件中，通过项伯斡旋并召来樊哙，帮助刘邦化解了被项羽攻击的危机；此外，建议刘邦首先封赏其最痛恨的雍齿，以此安定群臣之心，化解了潜在的造反危机；并与陈平一同主张撕毁鸿沟条约，立即攻击项羽，最终取得楚汉相争的胜利。
设计并联合吕布诛杀了董卓。
董卓死后，率兵攻入长安，杀害了王允。
董卓死后，与李傕一同率兵攻入长安，杀害了王允。
在共同把持朝政后，为争夺权力而互相火拼。
起兵追击董卓，但在荥阳被徐荣击败。
董卓掌控朝政后自封的最高官职。
李渊于晋阳起兵反隋，最终取代隋朝。

position.zh-cn: 尚书令、丞相、太原郡留守

description.zh-cn: 在起兵前，李渊曾担任隋朝的多个重要官职。
玄武门之变后，李渊被迫将皇位禅让给李世民，退居太上皇。
禅位给李世民后，退位为太上皇。
孙志刚在陈敏尔担任贵州省委书记期间任副书记兼省长。
接替赵克志出任中共贵州省委书记。
陈敏尔担任贵州省省长期间，赵克志为省委书记。
陈敏尔担任浙江省委宣传部长时，张德江为省委书记。
陈敏尔任贵州省委副书记时，栗战书为省委书记。
袁世凯在天津小站练兵时，段祺瑞主管砲兵。
description.en: When Yuan Shikai was training the New Army at Xiaozhan, Tianjin, Duan Qirui was in charge of the artillery.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥发动甲子政变后，邀请段祺瑞出山，出任中华民国临时政府的临时执政。
description.en: After launching the Beijing Coup, Feng Yuxiang invited Duan Qirui to come out of retirement and serve as the Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1983年就读辽宁大学党政专修班，1986年毕业获得经济管理专业的学位。
description.en: He attended the Party and Government Cadre training class at Liaoning University from 1983, graduating in 1986 with a degree in Economic Management.

description.zh-cn: 由于冠状病毒大流行，王健林的房地产和影视事业都急剧下降，导致其财富缩水并跌出富豪榜前列。
description.en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Wang Jianlin's real estate and film businesses declined sharply, causing his wealth to shrink and drop him from the top ranks of the rich list.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是薄一波的次子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the second son of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 王立军与薄熙来决裂后，进入美国领事馆，揭露了薄家的内幕，成为薄熙来的主要政治对手。
description.en: After breaking with Bo Xilai, Wang Lijun entered the U.S. consulate and exposed the Bo family's secrets, becoming Bo's primary political adversary.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，薄熙来在重庆发起窃听行动，其监控对象包括时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛。
description.en: Bo Xilai reportedly initiated an eavesdropping operation in Chongqing, with targets including then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后在临终前发布懿旨，授载沣为摄政王，监国辅佐幼帝。
description.en: Before her death, Empress Dowager Cixi issued an edict appointing Zaifeng as the Prince-Regent to govern and assist the young emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在辛亥革命的浪潮中，载沣被迫辞去监国摄政王的职务。
description.en: In the tide of the Xinhai Revolution, Zaifeng was forced to resign from his position as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 庚子事变后，载沣被授为头等专使，赴德国为德国公使被杀一事道歉。
description.en: After the Boxer Rebellion, Zaifeng was appointed as a first-class special envoy to Germany to apologize for the killing of the German minister.

description.zh-cn: 载沣是清朝皇族成员，并担任过军机大臣、监国摄政王等要职。
description.en: Zaifeng was a member of the Qing imperial family and held important positions such as Grand Councilor and Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 向毛泽东报告了张国焘要求武力解决分歧的密电，促使毛泽东率领中央纵队先行北上。
description.en: Reported to Mao Zedong about Zhang Guotao's secret cable demanding a forceful resolution of their differences, which prompted Mao to lead the central column north ahead of schedule.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政十年（前237年），秦始皇下令调查并平定了嫪毐发动的叛乱，并将其诛杀。
description.en: In the tenth year of his reign (-237), Qin Shi Huang ordered an investigation and suppressed the rebellion launched by Lao Ai, subsequently having him executed.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦出生于浙江宁波。
description.en: Tu Youyou was born in Ningbo, Zhejiang.

position.zh-cn: 终身研究员兼首席研究员、中药研究所青蒿素研究中心主任、博士研究生导师
position.en: Lifetime Researcher and Chief Researcher, Director of the Artemisinin Research Center at the Institute of Chinese Materia Medica, Doctoral Supervisor

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦自1955年毕业后被分配至中医研究院（中国中医科学院前身）工作至今。
description.en: Since graduating in 1955, Tu Youyou has been assigned to work at the Institute of Traditional Chinese Medicine (the predecessor of the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences).

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于2025年当选为美国国家科学院外籍院士。
description.en: Tu Youyou was elected as a foreign associate of the U.S. National Academy of Sciences in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席习近平于2019年9月17日授予屠呦呦共和国勋章。
description.en: On September 17, 2019, President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping awarded Tu Youyou the Medal of the Republic.

description.zh-cn: 在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后，时任国务院总理李克强致函表示祝贺，推动了对她的认可。
description.en: After Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize, then-Premier Li Keqiang sent a congratulatory letter, promoting her recognition.

description.zh-cn: 微软创始人比尔·盖茨将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为“2015年6大好消息”之一，提升了其国际声誉。
description.en: Microsoft founder Bill Gates listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of 'The Top 6 Good-News Stories of 2015', enhancing her international reputation.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝是清朝的第六位皇帝，于1735年即位。1796年禅位后作为太上皇继续执政至1799年驾崩。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor was the sixth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, ascending the throne in 1735. After abdicating in 1796, he continued to rule as Emperor Emeritus until his death in 1799.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆六十年九月三日，乾隆帝立十五子永琰（即嘉庆帝）为皇太子，并宣布次年禅让皇位。
description.en: On the third day of the ninth month of the 60th year of the Qianlong reign, the Qianlong Emperor appointed his 15th son, Yongyan (the future Jiaqing Emperor), as Crown Prince and announced his abdication for the following year.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝（弘历）是雍正帝的庶子。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor (Hongli) was a son of the Yongzheng Emperor by a concubine.

description.zh-cn: 琦善与林则徐政见长期不合，在鸦片战争期间，他与穆彰阿等人向道光帝诬告林则徐，将战争责任归咎于他，并废除了林则徐的防务政策。
description.en: Qishan had long-standing political disagreements with Lin Zexu. During the Opium War, he, along with Mujaangga and others, falsely accused Lin Zexu to the Daoguang Emperor, blaming him for the war and dismantling his defense policies.

description.zh-cn: 在2011台北小巨蛋个人演唱会上与周华健同台演出。
description.en: Performed on the same stage with Wakin Chau at her 2011 solo concert at the Taipei Arena.

description.zh-cn: 义和团运动期间，孔祥熙及其家人因运动导致的暴力而被迫依靠乡亲收容才得以脱险。
description.en: During the Boxer Rebellion, H. H. Kung and his family were forced to rely on fellow villagers for shelter to escape the violence caused by the movement.

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年在国民参政会上揭发孔祥熙贪污舞弊，不久后孔被免去财政部长职位。
description.en: Fu Ssu-nien exposed H. H. Kung's corruption at the People's Political Council, leading to Kung's dismissal from the post of Minister of Finance shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 在明英宗被俘后，联合其他大臣拥立郕王朱祁钰为皇帝。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was captured, he, along with other ministers, supported the enthronement of the Prince of Cheng, Zhu Qiyu, as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 景泰帝即位后，任命于谦为兵部尚书，领导京师保卫战。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Jingtai Emperor appointed Yu Qian as the Minister of War to lead the Defense of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是杨开慧的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是毛泽东的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 苗华于1969年12月参军，2025年10月17日被开除军籍。
description.en: Miao Hua joined the army in December 1969 and was expelled from the military on October 17, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 苗华接替刘晓江，担任中国人民解放军海军政治委员。
description.en: Miao Hua succeeded Liu Xiaojiang as Political Commissar of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 正式免除苗华的中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员职务。
description.en: Formally removed Miao Hua from his position as a member of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 开除苗华军籍。
description.en: Expelled Miao Hua from the military.

description.zh-cn: 张自忠改投冯玉祥的部队，并在其麾下任职多年。
description.en: Zhang Zizhong joined Feng Yuxiang's troops and served under his command for many years.

description.zh-cn: 张自忠在宋哲元担任军长的第二十九军中任师长。
description.en: Zhang Zizhong served as a division commander in the 29th Army, which was commanded by Song Zheyuan.

description.zh-cn: 在延安各界举行的追悼大会上，毛泽东为张自忠送上“尽忠报国”的挽词。
description.en: At a memorial service held in Yan'an, Mao Zedong sent a eulogy for Zhang Zizhong with the words 'Loyally serving the country'.

description.zh-cn: 在纪念抗战胜利69周年座谈会上，习近平将张自忠列为中国人民不畏强暴、以身殉国的杰出代表。
description.en: At a symposium commemorating the 69th anniversary of the victory of the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, Xi Jinping listed Zhang Zizhong as an outstanding representative of the Chinese people who defied brute force and sacrificed their lives for the country.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠接替常万全出任中国人民解放军总装备部部长。
description.en: Zhang Youxia succeeded Chang Wanquan as Minister of the PLA General Armament Department.

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年就读于清华大学热能工程系空调专业。
description.en: Studied in the Air Conditioning major of the Department of Thermal Engineering at Tsinghua University from 1988 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛曾坚决反对女儿胡海清出国留学，并在其擅自前往比利时后，勒令其回国。
description.en: Hu Jintao strongly opposed his daughter Hu Haiqing's plan to study abroad and ordered her to return to China after she went to Belgium without his permission.

description.zh-cn: 移居美国后，胡海清与丈夫茅道临拒绝了父亲胡锦涛多次要求他们回国的请求。
description.en: After moving to the United States, Hu Haiqing and her husband Mao Daolin refused her father Hu Jintao's repeated requests for them to return to China.

position.zh-cn: 晋军军官、第二战区北路军总司令
position.en: Jin Army Officer, Commander of the Northern Route Army of the Second War Area

description.zh-cn: 傅作义毕业后加入阎锡山领导的晋军，长期在其麾下任职，直至1938年12月出任第八战区副司令长官后摆脱其控制。
description.en: After graduation, Fu Zuoyi joined the Jin Army led by Yan Xishan and served under him for a long time, until he broke free from his control after being appointed Deputy Commander of the Eighth War Area in December 1938.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬是傅作义的长女。
description.en: Fu Dong is Fu Zuoyi's eldest daughter.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬作为中共地下党员，在其父傅作义身边工作，不断进行劝说，为促成北平和平解放起了重要作用。
description.en: As an underground member of the CCP, Fu Dong worked alongside her father Fu Zuoyi and continuously persuaded him, playing a crucial role in bringing about the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

position.zh-cn: 水利部/水利电力部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources / Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，傅作义长期担任水利部及后来的水利电力部部长，是时任国务院总理周恩来的下属。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Fu Zuoyi served for a long time as the Minister of Water Resources and later the Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, subordinate to then-Premier Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发之初，周恩来将傅作义列入应予保护的干部名单中，对其进行保护。
description.en: At the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, Zhou Enlai included Fu Zuoyi in a list of cadres to be protected, thereby protecting him.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，傅作义作为国民党高级将领，与毛泽东领导的共产党军队为敌，并曾发表致毛泽东的公开电进行谴责。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Fu Zuoyi, as a high-ranking Nationalist general, was an enemy of the Communist forces led by Mao Zedong and once issued a public telegram condemning him.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是孔祥熙的妻弟。
description.en: T. V. Soong was H. H. Kung's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文与张学良是好友，曾在西安事变中出面调解。
description.en: T. V. Soong and Zhang Xueliang were friends, and Soong mediated during the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，宋子文赴苏联同斯大林会谈，并签订《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: In 1945, T. V. Soong went to the Soviet Union to meet with Stalin and sign the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 据称杜鲁门曾大骂宋家为“贼”，但此说法的真实性存疑。
description.en: Truman allegedly called the Soong family 'thieves,' although the authenticity of this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是武则天的女儿。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the daughter of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是李弘的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Li Hong.

description.zh-cn: 安乐公主曾试图诬陷太平公主，两人敌对关系明显白热化。
description.en: Princess Anle once attempted to frame Princess Taiping, and their adversarial relationship became overtly intense.

description.zh-cn: 史书记载太平公主与崔湜有私交。
description.en: Historical records indicate that Princess Taiping had an intimate relationship with Cui Shi.

description.zh-cn: 在七国之乱爆发后，汉景帝为平息叛乱，采纳袁盎等人的建议，将晁错腰斩于东市。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Rebellion of the Seven States, Emperor Jing, in an attempt to quell the rebellion, adopted the advice of Yuan Ang and others and had Chao Cuo executed by waist-chop at the East Market.

description.zh-cn: 栗姬是汉景帝的妃嫔。
description.en: Consort Li was a consort of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻是汉景帝的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Wu (Liu Che) was the son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻的生母是汉景帝的王皇后。
description.en: The birth mother of Emperor Wu (Liu Che) was Empress Wang of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 前150年四月，汉景帝立王氏为皇后。
description.en: In the fourth month of 150 BCE, Emperor Jing installed Lady Wang as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 薄皇后是汉景帝的第一位皇后，于前151年被废。
description.en: Empress Bo was the first empress of Emperor Jing and was deposed in 151 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 晁错在汉景帝时期担任御史大夫。
description.en: Chao Cuo served as Grandee Secretary during the reign of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁与黄兴、刘揆一、陈天华、章士钊等人共同成立华兴会。
description.en: Song Jiaoren co-founded the Huaxinghui with Huang Xing, Liu Kuiyi, Chen Tianhua, Zhang Shizhao, and others.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁支持孙中山成立中国同盟会，并担任司法部检事长。
description.en: Song Jiaoren supported Sun Yat-sen in establishing the Tongmenghui and served as the Procurator of its Judicial Department.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁倡导的责任内阁制威胁到袁世凯的统治地位。时人普遍认为，袁世凯授意或幕后策划了对国民党领袖宋教仁的暗杀，以阻止其组阁。
description.en: The cabinet responsibility system advocated by Song Jiaoren threatened Yuan Shikai's ruling position. It was widely believed at the time that Yuan Shikai ordered or masterminded the assassination of Kuomintang leader Song Jiaoren to prevent him from forming a cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 在公开斥责袁世凯刺宋后，林述庆在袁世凯秘书长梁士诒的宴席上被毒死。
description.en: After publicly denouncing Yuan Shikai for assassinating Song, Lin Shuqing was poisoned at a banquet hosted by Yuan's chief secretary Liang Shiyi.

description.zh-cn: 倪亦方是亦舒的胞兄。
description.en: Ni Yifang is Yi Shu's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 倪亦靖是亦舒的胞弟。
description.en: Ni Yijing is Yi Shu's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 倪震是亦舒的侄子。
description.en: Joe Nieh is Yi Shu's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏是亦舒的侄媳。
description.en: Vivian Chow is Yi Shu's niece-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 亦舒的科幻作品不时会看到兄长倪匡作品的角色客串出现。
description.en: Characters from her elder brother Ni Kuang's works occasionally make guest appearances in Yi Shu's science fiction works.

description.zh-cn: 《南京条约》使中国丧失了领土主权（割让香港岛），并被迫开放通商口岸和支付巨额赔款，损害了清朝的国家利益。
description.en: The Treaty of Nanking led to China's loss of territorial sovereignty (cession of Hong Kong Island) and forced the opening of treaty ports and payment of large indemnities, harming the national interests of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 战争的惨败使清朝统治集团部分官员认识到与西方的差距，从而推动了以“师夷长技以制夷”为目标的洋务运动。
description.en: The disastrous defeat in the war made some officials in the Qing ruling clique realize the gap with the West, thereby promoting the Self-Strengthening Movement with the goal of 'learning from the barbarians to counter the barbarians'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共早期，斯大林不信任毛泽东，支持“二十八个半布尔什维克”等苏联路线的领导人，并将毛泽东排除在中央委员会之外。
description.en: In the early days of the CCP, Stalin distrusted Mao Zedong, supported leaders who followed the Soviet line, such as the "28 Bolsheviks," and excluded Mao from the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放带来的思想解放、对西方民主观念的接触以及对政治体制改革的讨论，为八六学潮的发生提供了重要的社会和思想背景。
description.en: The intellectual liberation, exposure to Western democratic concepts, and discussions on political system reform brought by the Reform and Opening-up provided a significant social and ideological background for the 1986 student demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国作家协会副主席刘宾雁与方励之一同前往上海多所高校发表演讲，对学生思想产生影响，推动了学潮的酝酿。
description.en: Then-Vice Chairman of the Chinese Writers Association, Liu Binyan, delivered speeches at several universities in Shanghai along with Fang Lizhi, influencing student thought and contributing to the fomentation of the demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 中共保守派将学潮的爆发归咎于胡耀邦对资产阶级自由化的纵容，并向邓小平等核心领导人施压，最终促使其下台。
description.en: CCP conservatives blamed the outbreak of the student movement on Hu Yaobang's tolerance of bourgeois liberalization and pressured paramount leader Deng Xiaoping and others, ultimately leading to his ousting.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在与胡耀邦等人的谈话中严厉批评其应对学潮不力，并主持了决定胡耀邦辞职的中央政治局扩大会议，起到了决定性作用。
description.en: In a talk with Hu Yaobang and others, Deng Xiaoping severely criticized his ineffective response to the student unrest and presided over the enlarged Politburo meeting that decided Hu's resignation, playing a decisive role.

description.zh-cn: 在1987年1月16日的中共中央政治局扩大会议上，胡耀邦辞去中共中央总书记职务。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the CCP Politburo on January 16, 1987, Hu Yaobang resigned from his position as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦辞职后，赵紫阳被一致推选为代理中共中央总书记。
description.en: Following Hu Yaobang's resignation, Zhao Ziyang was unanimously elected as the acting General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 八六学潮为1989年的六四事件埋下伏笔，部分学潮的参与者后来也成为六四事件的发起人和组织者。
description.en: The 1986 student demonstrations set the stage for the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, and some of its participants later became initiators and organizers of the 1989 events.

description.zh-cn: 据路透社报道，在执行宽松防疫措施后，习近平希望放缓开放，但李强反驳了习近平的要求，并继续推动放宽政策。
description.en: According to Reuters, after implementing relaxed epidemic measures, Xi Jinping wished to slow down the reopening, but Li Qiang rebutted his request and continued to push for policy relaxation.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后因仇视外国势力，从默许纵容转向公开支持义和团，并最终决定向十一国宣战，将义和团运动推向高潮。
description.en: Driven by her hostility towards foreign powers, Empress Dowager Cixi's stance shifted from tacit approval to open support for the Boxers, eventually deciding to declare war on eleven nations, thus pushing the Boxer Rebellion to its climax.

description.zh-cn: 端郡王载漪因其子立储问题遭外国公使反对而仇视洋人，极力主张利用义和团向列强开战，是清廷主战派的核心人物。
description.en: Prince Duan, Zaiyi, harbored resentment towards foreigners after they opposed his son's appointment as heir apparent. He strongly advocated for using the Boxers to wage war against the foreign powers and was a central figure in the court's pro-war faction.

description.zh-cn: 清军神机营军官恩海在北京街头射杀了德国公使克林德。
description.en: En Hai, an officer of the Qing Manchu Banner Corps, shot and killed the German minister Clemens von Ketteler on a street in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 甲午战争战败后，西方列强在中国划分势力范围，加剧了社会矛盾和排外情绪，为义和团运动的兴起提供了背景。
description.en: After the defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War, Western powers carved out spheres of influence in China, exacerbating social tensions and anti-foreign sentiment, which provided the backdrop for the rise of the Boxer Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 事件后，邓小平被错误地认定为幕后总指挥，导致其被撤销党内外一切职务。
事件后，中共中央政治局通过决议，任命华国锋为中共中央第一副主席和国务院总理，巩固了其作为毛泽东接班人的地位。
中共中央政治局将事件定性为“反革命政治事件”，并出动民兵、公安和卫戍部队进行暴力镇压。
陈云在中央工作会议上率先提出为天安门事件平反，对最终平反起到了关键的推动作用。
作为毛泽东的联络员，毛远新向毛泽东汇报天安门广场的情况，并传达其指示。
在罗瑞卿事件中，罗瑞卿被指责为“反对突出政治”、“反对林彪”，随后被调离军事工作领导岗位并受到批判。
description.en: In the Luo Ruiqing Incident, Luo was accused of 'opposing the prominence of politics' and 'opposing Lin Biao,' and was subsequently removed from his military leadership position and criticized.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委内部日渐分裂，林彪与罗瑞卿分属不同派别，最终在1965年12月的上海会议上，林彪等人对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: The Central Military Commission gradually split, with Lin Biao and Luo Ruiqing in opposing factions. This culminated in the Shanghai Conference of December 1965, where Lin Biao and others launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，叶群与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Ye Qun, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，叶剑英与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Ye Jianying, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东首肯了林彪等人对罗瑞卿的攻击，导致罗瑞卿事件的发生。
description.en: Mao Zedong approved the attack on Luo Ruiqing by Lin Biao and others, which led to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东表示其是“听了林彪一面之辞，错整了罗瑞卿”，为罗瑞卿的平反奠定了基础。
description.en: Mao Zedong stated that he had 'wrongly purged Luo Ruiqing based on Lin Biao's one-sided account,' laying the groundwork for Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿逝世后，邓小平前往机场迎灵，并于8月12日的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: After Luo Ruiqing's death, Deng Xiaoping went to the airport to receive his remains and delivered the eulogy at the memorial service on August 12.

description.zh-cn: 因叶剑英就罗瑞卿跳楼一事作诗表达同情，周恩来严厉批判其“完全站到罗瑞卿一边”。
description.en: Because Ye Jianying wrote a poem expressing sympathy for Luo Ruiqing's suicide attempt, Zhou Enlai severely criticized him for 'completely siding with Luo Ruiqing'.

description.zh-cn: 1983年6月10日，国家副主席候选人廖承志因突发心脏病逝世。
description.en: On June 10, 1983, Liao Chengzhi, a candidate for Vice President, died of a sudden heart attack.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之役中，作为建文帝的大将军，与燕王朱棣为敌对关系，并屡次败于朱棣。
与谷王朱橞开金川门投降，归顺燕王朱棣。
永乐二年，在群臣弹劾下，朱棣下诏削去李景隆的爵位并将其合家软禁。
奉建文帝之命，至开封将周王朱橚全家押回南京。
在燕军渡江后，请求建文帝诛杀李景隆。
永乐二年，周王朱橚揭发李景隆在建文年间收受贿赂之事，成为弹劾李景隆的开端之一。

position.zh-cn: 重机械工程大队队员、工程司、副工程司、正工程司
position.en: Member of Heavy Machinery Engineering Brigade, Engineer, Deputy Engineer, Senior Engineer

description.zh-cn: 18岁时经公务人员普考分发至台湾省政府建设厅，曾担任中部六县市美援自来水供水系统兴建工程督导。
description.en: At the age of 18, he was assigned to the Department of Construction of the Taiwan Provincial Government after passing the civil service examination. He served as the construction supervisor for the US-aided water supply system in six central counties and cities.

description.zh-cn: 大学士孙承宗巡视辽东后，采纳了袁崇焕在宁远设防的意见，并在此后镇守山海关时更加倚重袁崇焕，视其为防御后金的关键人物。
description.en: After inspecting Liaodong, Grand Secretary Sun Chengzong adopted Yuan Chonghuan's proposal to fortify Ningyuan. He subsequently relied heavily on Yuan while defending Shanhai Pass, viewing him as a key figure in the defense against the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 袁崇焕在宁远之战和宁锦之战中，两次成功指挥明军击败后金的进攻。
description.en: Yuan Chonghuan successfully commanded the Ming forces to defeat the Later Jin invasions twice, in the Battle of Ningyuan and the Battle of Ningjin.

description.zh-cn: 在位期间，明熹宗采纳朝臣建议，提拔袁崇焕至兵部任职，并在宁远之战后多次予以升迁和嘉奖，支持其在辽东的军事活动。
description.en: During his reign, the Tianqi Emperor adopted the advice of his officials to promote Yuan Chonghuan to a position in the Ministry of War. Following the Battle of Ningyuan, he repeatedly promoted and rewarded Yuan, supporting his military activities in Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 韩非与李斯一同拜荀子为师，为同学关系。
description.en: Han Fei and Li Si studied under Xunzi together as fellow students.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受商鞅影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shang Yang.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受慎到影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shen Dao.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受老子影响，并对《道德经》有深入研究。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Laozi, and he conducted in-depth research on the Tao Te Ching.

description.zh-cn: 韩非反对儒家建构在私人情感与社会道德提升上的治国主张。
description.en: Han Fei opposed the Confucian approach to governance, which was based on personal emotional bonds and the elevation of social morality.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是《韩非子》的作者。
description.en: Han Fei is the author of the Han Feizi.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》一书传到秦国，其内容促使秦王政以战争为要挟，逼迫韩非出使秦国。
description.en: The book Han Feizi reached the state of Qin, and its contents prompted King Zheng of Qin to use the threat of war to compel Han Fei to be sent as an envoy to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾与堂谿公谈话。
description.en: Han Fei once had a conversation with Tang Xi Gong.

description.zh-cn: 会议确立了邓小平的领导地位，华国锋的权力被削弱并开始淡出权力核心。
description.en: The plenum established Deng Xiaoping's leadership, weakening Hua Guofeng's power and beginning his fade from the core of power.

description.zh-cn: 根据改革决定，自2018年1月1日起，武警部队由中共中央、中央军委集中统一领导，归中央军委建制。
description.en: According to the reform decision, from January 1, 2018, the People's Armed Police force is under the centralized and unified leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the Central Military Commission, and is placed under the command of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸重创了印度东南部沿海地区及安达曼和尼科巴群岛，造成超过1万人罹难。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake severely impacted India's southeastern coastal regions and the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, causing over 10,000 deaths.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1988年12月1日起担任中共西藏自治区党委书记，是骚乱期间当地的最高负责人。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as the Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region Committee of the CPC starting December 1, 1988, making him the highest official in the region during the unrest.

description.zh-cn: 林彪时任第115师师长。
description.en: Lin Biao was the commander of the 115th Division at the time.

description.zh-cn: 在长沙与周恩来共同审定并最终确定了被称为“长沙决策”的人事安排方案。
description.en: Jointly reviewed and finalized the personnel arrangement plan known as the 'Changsha Decision' with Zhou Enlai in Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 前往长沙向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况，并共同确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: Traveled to Changsha to report to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th National People's Congress and jointly finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 致信江青，告诫其“不要多露面，不要批文件，不要由你组阁（当后台老板）”。
description.en: Sent a letter to Jiang Qing, warning her 'not to make too many public appearances, not to approve documents, and not to form a cabinet (be the boss behind the scenes)'.

description.zh-cn: 1974年12月23日，周恩来向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况。12月26日晚，两人单独长谈，最终确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: On December 23, 1974, Zhou Enlai reported to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th NPC. On the evening of December 26, the two had a long private talk and finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 根据其意见，中共中央发出了关于准备召开四届人大的通知，启动了会议的筹备工作。
description.en: Based on his opinion, the CPC Central Committee issued a notice to prepare for the 4th National People's Congress, initiating the preparatory work for the meeting.

description.zh-cn: 《开罗宣言》声明盟国将坚持对日作战直至其无条件投降，并要求日本归还其所窃取的一切领土。
description.en: The Cairo Declaration stated that the Allied powers would persevere in the war against Japan until its unconditional surrender and demanded that Japan return all territories it had stolen.

description.zh-cn: 《开罗宣言》决定在相当时期内，使朝鲜获得自由与独立。
description.en: The Cairo Declaration decided that in due course Korea shall become free and independent.

description.zh-cn: 在德黑兰会议上，约瑟夫·斯大林表示“完全”赞成《开罗宣言》及其全部内容。
description.en: At the Tehran Conference, Joseph Stalin expressed his "full" approval of the Cairo Declaration and "all its contents."

description.zh-cn: 在和珅死后，将其府邸（后来的恭王府）赐予庆郡王永璘。
description.en: After Heshen's death, bestowed his mansion (later Prince Gong's Mansion) upon Prince Qing, Yonglin.

description.zh-cn: 在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论，习近平还在报告上作了批注。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
因呼吸道感染请假，缺席全国人大会议闭幕日会议。
中国工商银行由中国人民银行的工商信贷和储蓄业务分离而设立。
description.en: ICBC was established by separating the industrial and commercial credit and savings business from the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要股东持有中国工商银行31.14%的股份。
description.en: Holds 31.14% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 通过其代理人公司香港中央结算代理人有限公司作为主要股东持有中国工商银行24.18%的股份。
description.en: Holds 24.18% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder through its nominee, HKSCC Nominees Limited.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙警方以“涉及洗黑钱及税务欺诈”为名，突击搜查中国工商银行马德里分行，并拘捕5名银行管理层人员。
description.en: Spanish police raided the ICBC Madrid branch on suspicion of money laundering and tax fraud, arresting five members of the bank's management.

description.zh-cn: 美国在广岛和长崎投下原子弹，最终迫使大日本帝国投降。
description.en: The United States dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, ultimately forcing the Empire of Japan to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 德川家康于1603年开创江户幕府。
description.en: Tokugawa Ieyasu founded the Edo shogunate in 1603.

description.zh-cn: 该敕令的发布结束了罗马帝国对基督徒的迫害。
description.en: The issuance of this edict ended the Roman Empire's persecution of Christians.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝承认和平协议的达成，并以“就地释放”名义将大批朝鲜人民军战俘编入韩国军队，企图破坏停战。时任大韩民国总统李承晚对此表示反对，导致大韩民国最终未在停战协定上签字。
description.en: Refused to accept the peace agreement and forcibly conscripted a large number of KPA prisoners of war into the ROK army under the pretext of 'local release' in an attempt to sabotage the armistice. Then-President of the Republic of Korea, Syngman Rhee, opposed the armistice, leading to South Korea ultimately not signing the agreement.

description.zh-cn: 731部队是关东军下属的防疫给水部本部。
description.en: Unit 731 was the headquarters of the Epidemic Prevention and Water Purification Department under the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 京都帝国大学向731部队派出了多名医学专家，协助石井四郎进行研究。
description.en: Kyoto Imperial University sent numerous medical experts to Unit 731 to assist Shirō Ishii with his research.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军改称为东北民主联军。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was renamed the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 购买黑石集团价值30亿美元的无投票权有限合伙单位。
description.en: Purchased $3 billion worth of non-voting limited partnership units in The Blackstone Group.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋事件中，赵氏被正式承认为诸侯，建立了赵国。
description.en: During the Partition of Jin, the Zhao clan was officially recognized as a feudal lord, leading to the establishment of the State of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 前403年，周威烈王正式册封赵烈侯、韩景侯、魏文侯为诸侯，标志着三家分晋的完成。
description.en: In 403 BCE, King Weilie of Zhou formally enfeoffed Marquis Lie of Zhao, Marquis Jing of Han, and Marquis Wen of Wei, marking the completion of the Partition of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋最终导致晋国于前376年被瓜分完毕而灭亡。
description.en: The Partition of Jin ultimately led to the complete division and demise of the State of Jin in 376 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 赵国最终为秦国所灭。
description.en: The State of Zhao was ultimately conquered by the State of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 前228年，秦将王翦攻破赵都邯郸，俘虏赵王迁，赵国灭亡。
description.en: In 228 BCE, the Qin general Wang Jian captured Handan, the capital of Zhao, and took King Qian captive, leading to the fall of the State of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 赵国在胡服骑射改革后，于前295年灭亡了中山国。
description.en: After the 'Wearing Hun clothes and shooting from horseback' reform, the State of Zhao conquered the State of Zhongshan in 295 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 通过广播发布《终战诏书》，向日本民众宣布接受《波茨坦公告》，决定投降。
description.en: Broadcast the Jewel Voice Broadcast, announcing to the Japanese people the acceptance of the Potsdam Declaration and the decision to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 指挥中国人民志愿军第15军参加上甘岭战役，坚守40余天。
description.en: Commanded the 15th Army of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the Battle of Triangle Hill, holding the position for over 40 days.

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国成立35周年阅兵式上担任总指挥，陪同邓小平检阅部队。
description.en: Served as the general commander of the military parade for the 35th anniversary of the PRC, accompanying Deng Xiaoping to inspect the troops.

description.zh-cn: 秦基伟卸任国防部长后，由迟浩田接任。
description.en: After Qin Jiwei stepped down as Minister of Defense, Chi Haotian succeeded him.

description.zh-cn: 陈云和滕代远奉命接应兵败的西路军余部，其中包括李先念。
description.en: Chen Yun and Teng Daiyuan were ordered to rescue the remnants of the defeated Western Route Army, including Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 1940年10月24日，贝当与希特勒在卢瓦河畔蒙图瓦尔会面，商讨两国间的合作事宜。
description.en: On October 24, 1940, Pétain met with Hitler at Montoire-sur-le-Loir to discuss collaboration between their two countries.

description.zh-cn: 受疫情打击，首都机场的旅客吞吐量大幅下滑。
description.en: Affected by the pandemic, the passenger throughput of Capital Airport declined sharply.

description.zh-cn: 于1950年报请中共中央，拟新建一座民航专用机场，即后来的首都机场。
description.en: In 1950, it proposed to the Central Committee of the CCP to build a new civil aviation airport, which later became Capital Airport.

description.zh-cn: 机场建设因朝鲜战争爆发而搁置。
description.en: The construction of the airport was postponed due to the outbreak of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温如春的哥哥。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the brother of Wen Ruchun.

description.zh-cn: 因温云松身份敏感为由，拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: Rejected his job application due to his sensitive background.

description.zh-cn: 由于防火长城的审查机制，“温云松”成为网络搜索敏感词，导致其信息在百度、搜狗、新浪微博等平台被封锁或限制。
description.en: Due to the Great Firewall's censorship mechanism, 'Wen Yunsong' became a sensitive search term, leading to the blocking or restriction of his information on platforms like Baidu, Sogou, and Sina Weibo.

description.zh-cn: 格里戈里·季诺维也夫是共产国际执行委员会的第一任主席。
description.en: Grigory Zinoviev was the first Chairman of the Executive Committee of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 尼古拉·布哈林于1926年至1929年间担任共产国际执行委员会主席。
description.en: Nikolai Bukharin served as Chairman of the Executive Committee of the Communist International from 1926 to 1929.

description.zh-cn: 因不满广东土改进展缓慢，毛泽东于1951年11月后将赵紫阳与陶铸一同调往广东参与领导土改工作。
description.en: Dissatisfied with the slow progress of land reform in Guangdong, Mao Zedong transferred Zhao Ziyang along with Tao Zhu after November 1951 to participate in leading the land reform work.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命太原起义成功后，阎锡山被推举为山西都督。
description.en: After the success of the Taiyuan Uprising during the Xinhai Revolution, Yan Xishan was elected as the military governor of Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯曾派兵进攻山西，阻挠阎锡山回太原。
description.en: Yuan Shikai once sent troops to attack Shanxi and obstruct Yan Xishan's return to Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中与冯玉祥结盟，共同反对蒋介石。
description.en: Allied with Feng Yuxiang during the Central Plains War to jointly oppose Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 张学良通电支持蒋介石，并派兵入关，导致阎锡山在中原大战中失败。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang declared his support for Chiang Kai-shek and sent troops into the Shanhai Pass, leading to Yan Xishan's defeat in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，阎锡山作为国民党将领与中国人民解放军作战。
description.en: During the second Chinese Civil War, Yan Xishan, as a KMT general, fought against the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 2016年7月，潘良时由北京卫戍区司令员调任陆军副司令员。
description.en: In July 2016, Pan Liangshi was transferred from the position of Commander of the Beijing Garrison to Deputy Commander of the PLA Ground Force.

position.zh-cn: 助教、讲师、正教授、数学系主任
position.en: Teaching Assistant, Lecturer, Full Professor, Head of Mathematics Department

description.zh-cn: 1931年起在清华大学工作学习，先后任助教（1933年）、讲师（1934年）、正教授（1937-1945年）。1950年回国后担任数学系主任。
description.en: Began working and studying at Tsinghua University in 1931, successively serving as a teaching assistant (1933), lecturer (1934), and full professor (1937-1945). After returning to China in 1950, he became the head of the mathematics department.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到毛泽东的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到周恩来的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 由于水门事件导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职，时任副总统杰拉尔德·福特继任成为美国总统。
description.en: Following President Richard Nixon's resignation due to the Watergate scandal, Vice President Gerald Ford succeeded to the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 景德元年（1004年），辽朝大举入侵宋朝，兵锋直指澶州。
description.en: In the first year of the Jingde era (1004), the Liao dynasty launched a major invasion of the Song dynasty, with their forces advancing directly on Chanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 韩非出使秦国，后被迫侍奉秦始皇。
description.en: Han Fei went to the State of Qin as an envoy and was later forced to serve Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 在担任山东巡抚期间，袁世凯采取强硬措施镇压义和团运动，维持了山东省的稳定。
description.en: As governor of Shandong, Yuan Shikai took strong measures to suppress the Boxer Rebellion, maintaining stability in the province.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯在北京就任中华民国临时大总统，建立了北洋政府，开启了北洋军阀统治时期。
description.en: Yuan Shikai took office as the Provisional President of the Republic of China in Beijing, establishing the Beiyang government and initiating the Beiyang warlord era.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法期间，康有为派谭嗣同秘密游说手握重兵的袁世凯，希望他发动兵变支持光绪帝。
description.en: During the Hundred Days' Reform, Kang Youwei sent Tan Sitong to secretly lobby Yuan Shikai, who controlled a powerful army, hoping he would launch a coup to support the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼与希特勒是政治盟友，共同组建了轴心国联盟。
description.en: Mussolini and Hitler were political allies who formed the Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 孔鲤是孔子的儿子。
description.en: Kong Li was the son of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 在北宋时期，西夏政权地处河西走廊，阻隔了宋朝与西域的传统陆上商路。
description.en: During the Northern Song Dynasty, the Western Xia regime was located in the Hexi Corridor, blocking the traditional overland trade route between the Song court and the Western Regions.

description.zh-cn: 通过西征和建立蒙古帝国，重新打通并保障了欧亚大陆的商路（尤其是草原丝绸之路）的畅通。
description.en: Through his western conquests and the establishment of the Mongol Empire, he reopened and secured the trade routes across Eurasia, especially the Steppe Silk Road.

description.zh-cn: 在辖境内推行驿站交通系统，极大地促进了丝绸之路的畅通和沿线商贸往来。
description.en: Implemented the Yam (postal station) system within its territory, greatly facilitating the flow of traffic and trade along the Silk Road.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，孟小冬在香港与杜月笙办理结婚手续，成为其妾室，直至1951年杜月笙去世。
description.en: In 1950, Meng Xiaodong married Du Yuesheng in Hong Kong, becoming his concubine until his death in August 1951.

description.zh-cn: 华兴会与兴中会等团体合并成立中国同盟会。
description.en: The Huaxinghui merged with the Xingzhonghui and other groups to form the Tongmenghui.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦还定三秦时，击败章邯，将其围困于废丘，章邯最终自杀。
description.en: When Liu Bang conquered the Three Qins, he defeated Zhang Han and besieged him in Feiqiu, leading to Zhang Han's suicide.

description.zh-cn: 太平洋战争爆发后，日本对英美等国宣战，随即全面占领了上海租界。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Pacific War, Japan declared war on countries like the UK and the US, and subsequently occupied the entire Shanghai concessions.

description.zh-cn: 1913年至1917年，周恩来在天津南开学校（后称私立南开中学堂）就读并毕业。
description.en: From 1913 to 1917, Zhou Enlai studied at and graduated from Nankai School (later known as Private Nankai Middle School) in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪出逃的“九一三事件”中，周恩来全程主持了对该事件的处理工作。
description.en: During the 'September 13 Incident' of Lin Biao's defection, Zhou Enlai managed the handling of the entire event.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝在第十四届全国人民代表大会上当选为全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning was elected as a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress at the 14th National People's Congress.

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长
position.en: Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 在赵乐际担任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长期间，铁凝担任副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning serves as Vice Chairperson while Zhao Leji is the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝接替巴金，担任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: Tie Ning succeeded Ba Jin as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家主席习近平特使，出席墨西哥总统权力交接仪式。
description.en: Served as the special envoy of President Xi Jinping to attend the presidential inauguration ceremony in Mexico.

description.zh-cn: 田汉在长沙师范学校就读时，校长是徐特立。
description.en: When Tian Han studied at Changsha Normal School, Xu Teli was the principal.

description.zh-cn: 1930年，在安娥影响下，田汉加入了“左联”。
description.en: In 1930, under the influence of An E, Tian Han joined the "League of Left-Wing Writers".

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁于2015年2月被任命为中华人民共和国环境保护部部长。
description.en: Chen Jining was appointed as the Minister of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China in February 2015.

description.zh-cn: 在其推动下，中国第一家由企业创办的股份制商业银行——招商银行在深圳蛇口成立。
description.en: Under his promotion, China Merchants Bank, the first joint-stock commercial bank founded by an enterprise in China, was established in Shekou, Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 在其推动下，中国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构——平安保险在深圳蛇口成立。
description.en: Under his promotion, Ping An Insurance, the first commercial insurance institution founded by an enterprise in China, was established in Shekou, Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 李南央是范元甄的女儿。
description.en: Li Nanyang is the daughter of Fan Yuanzhen.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平担任中央书记处总书记，负责处理中央书记处运作。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping served as the General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, responsible for its operations.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在中央书记处重新设立后担任总书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as General Secretary after the Central Secretariat was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝创立了科举制度，通过考试选拔人才，打破了世族垄断。
description.en: The Sui dynasty created the imperial examination system, selecting talent through tests and breaking the aristocratic monopoly.

description.zh-cn: 在宣布戒严后，指示国军防谍司令部以“反国家势力”为由将其列入逮捕名单。
description.en: After declaring martial law, instructed the Defense Counterintelligence Command to add him to an arrest list under the pretext of being an "anti-state force."

description.zh-cn: 在宣布戒严后，指示国军防谍司令部以“反国家势力”为由将其列入逮捕名单。
description.en: After declaring martial law, instructed the Defense Counterintelligence Command to add him to an arrest list under the pretext of being an "anti-state force."

description.zh-cn: 在2024年3月明确反对尹锡悦的戒严计划；在戒严当晚，拒绝执行逮捕名单，并搁置了尹锡悦撤换其副手洪壮源的命令。
description.en: Explicitly opposed Yoon Suk Yeol's martial law plan in March 2024; on the night of the martial law, he refused to execute the arrest list and shelved Yoon's order to dismiss his deputy, Hong Jang-won.

description.zh-cn: 将民主、贵族政治及寡头政治都视为共和国的政体，对共和制的概念进行了分类和阐释。
description.en: Classified democracy, aristocracy, and oligarchy as forms of republic, thereby categorizing and interpreting the concept of republicanism.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，受好友邓朴方力邀，俞正声出任中国残疾人福利基金会负责人。
description.en: In 1984, at the strong invitation of his friend Deng Pufang, Yu Zhengsheng became the head of the China Disabled Persons' Federation.

position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，俞正声任中央政治局常委。
description.en: While Xi Jinping served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Yu Zhengsheng was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 肯尼迪政府时期，美国开始向南越派遣特种作战部队，开启了美军战斗部队进入越南的先河。
description.en: During the Kennedy administration, the United States began sending special operations forces to South Vietnam, pioneering the entry of U.S. combat troops into the country.

description.zh-cn: 在武汉会战前的御前会议中，裕仁天皇表示要给国民政府最后致命的一击，迫使中国投降。
description.en: In an Imperial Conference before the Battle of Wuhan, Emperor Hirohito stated the need to deal a final, fatal blow to the Nationalist Government to force China's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 刘志祥是刘志军的弟弟。
description.en: Liu Zhixiang is Liu Zhijun's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 时任国家主席胡锦涛根据全国人民代表大会的决定，任命刘志军为铁道部部长。
description.en: Then-President Hu Jintao appointed Liu Zhijun as Minister of Railways in accordance with the decision of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 刘志军在此期间担任铁道部部长及党组书记。
description.en: Liu Zhijun served as the Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Railways during this period.

description.zh-cn: 国家审计署在对京沪高铁的审计中发现了与刘志军有关的线索，直接导致了对其的调查。
description.en: The National Audit Office discovered clues related to Liu Zhijun during its audit of the Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, which directly led to the investigation against him.

description.zh-cn: 刘志军利用职务便利，为丁书苗在获取铁路货物运输计划、运作工程项目中标等方面提供帮助，使其获得巨额经济利益。
description.en: Liu Zhijun used his official position to help Ding Shumiao obtain railway freight transport plans and win bids for construction projects, enabling her to gain huge economic benefits.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面信息框，良十四世是天主教会的领袖教宗。
description.en: According to the page's infobox, Leo XIV is the Pope, the leader of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 在1962年9月的中共八届十中全会上，毛泽东提出要进行社会主义教育运动，并于1963年正式发动了该运动。
description.en: At the 10th Plenary Session of the 8th CCP Central Committee in September 1962, Mao Zedong proposed to carry out the Socialist Education Movement, which was formally launched in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2007年至2010年签约华谊兄弟文化经纪公司。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming was signed with Huayi Brothers Culture and Brokerage Co. from 2007 to 2010.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是十月革命的实际指挥者。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was the de facto commander of the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林将托洛茨基及其领导的左翼反对派强力镇压，并于1929年将其流放出苏联。
description.en: Stalin forcefully suppressed Trotsky and the Left Opposition he led, and exiled him from the Soviet Union in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 在西班牙内战中，斯大林主义路线清剿托洛茨基主义者并从西班牙撤军，最终导致了工人阶级的惨败和法西斯的胜利。
description.en: During the Spanish Civil War, the Stalinist line involved purging Trotskyists and withdrawing troops from Spain, which ultimately led to the crushing defeat of the working class and the victory of fascism.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武三十一年（1398年），为防倭寇袭扰，在奇山北麓建奇山守御千户所城，并在“北山”设烽火台。
description.en: In 1398, during the reign of the Hongwu Emperor of the Ming dynasty, the Qishan Guard was established at the northern foot of Mount Qi, and a beacon tower was set up on the 'North Mountain' to defend against raids by Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 为胡善祥追上尊谥“恭让诚顺康穆静慈章皇后”，并修陵寝，恢复其皇后名分。
description.en: Posthumously honored Hu Shanxiang with the title 'Empress Gongrang Chengshun Kangmu Jingci Zhang', restored her tomb, and reinstated her status as empress.

description.zh-cn: 刘备与公孙瓒在卢植门下学习时结为好友，刘备视其为兄长。
description.en: Liu Bei and Gongsun Zan became good friends while studying under Lu Zhi, with Liu Bei treating him as an elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 陈云被认为是1980年代保守派的代表人物。
description.en: Chen Yun is considered a representative figure of the conservative faction in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来被认为是保守派人物。
description.en: Bo Xilai is considered a conservative figure.

description.zh-cn: 因对胡耀邦在八六学潮中过于软弱不满，保守派促使其下台。
description.en: Dissatisfied with Hu Yaobang's perceived weakness in handling the 1986 student protests, the conservative faction contributed to his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平南巡讲话后，重新确立改革开放大趋势，保守派势力大减。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping's southern tour speeches, the trend of reform and opening-up was re-established, and the influence of the conservative faction was greatly diminished.

description.zh-cn: 因批评习近平的“独裁统治”，原中共中央党校教授蔡霞被开除党籍。
description.en: For criticizing Xi Jinping's 'dictatorial rule', former Central Party School professor Cai Xia was expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争在李承晚的总统任期内爆发，深刻影响了他的执政和韩国的命运。
description.en: The Korean War broke out during Syngman Rhee's presidency, profoundly affecting his administration and the fate of South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主党在1948年支持李承晚当选韩国首位总统。
description.en: The Korea Democratic Party supported Syngman Rhee's election as the first president of South Korea in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅是朴槿惠的主要政治对手，曾在2012年总统选举中败给朴槿惠，后在2017年朴槿惠被弹劾后当选总统。朴槿惠政府曾将文在寅列入政治黑名单。
description.en: Moon Jae-in was a major political rival to Park Geun-hye. He lost to her in the 2012 presidential election but was elected in 2017 after Park's impeachment. Park's government had placed Moon on a political blacklist.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅卸任后参加了继任者尹锡悦的总统就职典礼。
description.en: After leaving office, Moon Jae-in attended the presidential inauguration of his successor, Yoon Suk-yeol.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦就任总统后，韩国检方对文在寅前政府展开了多项调查，被文在寅方面认为是政治报复。
description.en: After Yoon Suk-yeol took office, South Korean prosecutors launched several investigations into the former Moon Jae-in administration, which Moon's side considered political retaliation.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯当选为首任中华民国大总统，象征着北洋政府的正式成立。
description.en: Yuan Shikai's election as the first President of the Republic of China symbolized the formal establishment of the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 1943年12月赴延安入中共中央党校学习。
description.en: Went to Yan'an in December 1943 to study at the Party School of the Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月，胡耀邦主持为薄一波彻底平反，恢复了其名誉。
description.en: In December 1978, Hu Yaobang presided over the complete rehabilitation of Bo Yibo, restoring his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 八六学潮被中共元老归咎于胡耀邦的纵容，成为其下台的直接原因。
description.en: The 1986 student protests were blamed by CCP elders on Hu Yaobang's indulgence, becoming the direct cause of his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰总统弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基在俄罗斯入侵后宣布与俄罗斯断绝外交关系。
description.en: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced the severance of diplomatic relations with Russia after the invasion.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗被指控向俄罗斯提供无人机和弹道导弹。
description.en: Iran is accused of supplying drones and ballistic missiles to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 上海总工会委员长汪寿华在四一二事件后被杀害。
description.en: Wang Shouhua, chairman of the Shanghai General Labor Union, was killed after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人陈延年在四一二事件后被杀害。
description.en: Chen Yannian, an early leader of the CCP, was killed after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人赵世炎在四一二事件后被杀害。
description.en: Zhao Shiyan, an early leader of the CCP, was killed after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件是中国国民党清党运动中的标志性事件，是清党在全国范围内展开的开端。
description.en: The April 12th Incident is a landmark event in the Kuomintang's party-cleansing movement, marking the beginning of the purge on a national scale.

description.zh-cn: 在《要民主还是要新的独裁》中批评邓小平是“独裁者”。
description.en: Criticized Deng Xiaoping as a 'dictator' in 'Do We Want Democracy or New Dictatorship?'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，魏京生参加了属于首都中学红卫兵联合行动委员会的红卫兵组织。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wei Jingsheng joined a Red Guard group that was part of the United Action Committee of Capital Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 在文革串联期间，魏京生开始对江青等人产生怀疑，形成反对立场。
description.en: During the networking phase of the Cultural Revolution, Wei Jingsheng began to harbor suspicions about Jiang Qing and others, forming an oppositional stance.

description.zh-cn: 在安徽金寨看到大跃进饿死人的废墟后，魏京生认为毛泽东是“刽子手”。
description.en: After seeing the ruins left by the Great Leap Forward famine in Jinzhai, Anhui, Wei Jingsheng came to believe that Mao Zedong was a 'butcher'.

description.zh-cn: 在1979年发表报道，对魏京生进行批判，并引述群众言论支持法院对魏的判决。
description.en: Published a report in 1979 criticizing Wei Jingsheng and citing public opinion in support of the court's verdict against him.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝称隆科多为舅舅，因为隆科多的姐姐孝懿仁皇后是雍正帝的嫡母。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor addressed Longkodo as 'maternal uncle' because Longkodo's sister, Empress Xiaoyiren, was Yongzheng's adoptive mother.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝继位后，立即封隆科多为总理事务大臣、吏部尚书，加太保等职务，使其成为两朝重臣。
description.en: Upon his accession, the Yongzheng Emperor immediately appointed Longkodo as Grand Minister Regent and Minister of Personnel, with the additional title of Grand Tutor, making him a powerful figure spanning two reigns.

description.zh-cn: 雍正五年，隆科多被定41款大罪，雍正帝下令从宽，将其在畅春园外禁锢，直至其于次年六月死于禁所。
description.en: In the fifth year of the Yongzheng reign (1727), Longkodo was convicted of 41 major crimes. The emperor showed leniency by commuting his sentence to confinement outside the Changchun Garden, where he died in June of the following year.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄于1925年起兵反奉。
description.en: Guo Songling launched a rebellion against the Fengtian clique in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄兵败后被奉军处死。
description.en: After his military defeat, Guo Songling was executed by the Fengtian army.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄是张学良的恩师。
description.en: Guo Songling was Zhang Xueliang's mentor.

description.zh-cn: 丁来富接替胡中强担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军军长。
description.en: Ding Laifu succeeded Hu Zhongqiang as the commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典检方以涉嫌性犯罪为由对阿桑奇展开调查并寻求引渡，该调查最终于2019年11月中止。
description.en: Swedish prosecutors initiated an investigation and sought the extradition of Assange on allegations of sexual offenses, an investigation that was ultimately dropped in November 2019.

description.zh-cn: 据雅虎新闻报道，在维基解密发布“七号保险库”文件后，时任中情局局长迈克·蓬佩奥领导下的中情局曾讨论绑架甚至暗杀在厄瓜多尔大使馆的阿桑奇。
description.en: According to Yahoo News, after WikiLeaks published the 'Vault 7' documents, the CIA, under then-Director Mike Pompeo, discussed kidnapping and even assassinating Assange while he was in the Ecuadorian embassy.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发，使得中美建立外交关系的可能性破灭，美国派遣第七舰队巡逻台湾海峡。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War shattered the possibility of establishing diplomatic relations between China and the US, and the US dispatched the Seventh Fleet to patrol the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 特朗普政府正式对中国进口钢铁和铝产品征收关税，并采取措施限制中国投资，引发了中美贸易战。
description.en: The Trump administration officially imposed tariffs on imported steel and aluminum products from China and took measures to restrict Chinese investment, triggering the US-China trade war.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚接替金九成为大韩民国临时政府主席。
description.en: Syngman Rhee succeeded Kim Gu as the President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金九与金日成在平壤举行的“四月南北联席会议”上会面，商讨南北统一问题。
description.en: Kim Gu and Kim Il-sung met at the 'April Joint Conference of North and South' in Pyongyang to discuss the issue of Korean unification.

description.zh-cn: 金九多次被日本当局逮捕入狱，包括因安重根事件和安明根事件。
description.en: Kim Gu was arrested and imprisoned by Japanese authorities multiple times, including in connection with the An Jung-geun incident and the An Myeong-geun incident.

description.zh-cn: 在金九回国前，周恩来等中共政要为其举行了送别宴会。
description.en: Before Kim Gu returned to Korea, CCP dignitaries including Zhou Enlai held a farewell banquet for him.

description.zh-cn: 叶群是林彪的妻子。
description.en: Ye Qun was the wife of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 叶群是林彪集团的核心成员。
description.en: Ye Qun was a core member of the Lin Biao clique.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月1日，以华北银行为基础，合并北海银行和西北农民银行组建中国人民银行。
description.en: On December 1, 1948, the People's Bank of China was established based on Huabei Bank, through the merger of Beihai Bank and Northwest Farmers Bank.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行是国务院组成部门之一。
description.en: The People's Bank of China is one of the constituent departments of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据董必武的提议，中共中央于1947年10月决定筹备建立中国人民银行。
description.en: Based on the proposal of Dong Biwu, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided in October 1947 to prepare for the establishment of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，中国人民银行对银行、金融资产管理公司、信托投资公司及其他存款类金融机构的监管职能被分离出来，成立了中国银行业监督管理委员会。
description.en: In 2003, the regulatory functions of the People's Bank of China over banks, financial asset management companies, trust and investment companies, and other deposit-taking financial institutions were separated to establish the China Banking Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期去职。
description.en: Left office in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局由中国人民银行管理。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is managed by the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 742年，李白因其才名获唐玄宗征召入京，出任翰林供奉，但两年后即被赐金放还。
description.en: In 742, Li Bai was summoned to the capital by Emperor Xuanzong due to his fame and appointed as an attendant in the Hanlin Academy, but he was dismissed with a grant of gold two years later.

description.zh-cn: 因高力士进谗言，杨贵妃开始排斥李白，导致李白失去唐玄宗的恩宠。
description.en: Due to Gao Lishi's slander, Consort Yang began to ostracize Li Bai, causing him to lose Emperor Xuanzong's favor.

description.zh-cn: 根据卢卡奇的观点，恩格斯将辩证法扩展到自然界是受到了黑格尔的错误引导。
description.en: According to Lukács's view, Engels was misguided by Hegel in extending dialectics to nature.

description.zh-cn: 就2019冠状病毒病疫情进行书信往来，盖茨在信中表达了对中国防疫行动的支持，习近平则回信表示感谢。
description.en: Corresponded regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, with Gates expressing support for China's epidemic prevention actions in his letter, and Xi Jinping replying with a letter of thanks.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十二大上提出，要把中国建设成为高度文明、高度民主的社会主义国家，明确了中国特色社会主义初期的发展目标。
description.en: At the 12th Party Congress, he proposed to build China into a socialist country with a high level of civilization and democracy, clarifying the development goals for the initial stage of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十三大上作报告，将中国特色社会主义的发展目标明确为建设“富强、民主、文明”的社会主义现代化国家。
description.en: Delivered a report at the 13th Party Congress, defining the development goal of socialism with Chinese characteristics as building a 'prosperous, democratic, and civilized' socialist modernized country.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十一届三中全会上，邓小平等人批评了与华国锋有直接关系的“两个凡是”，最终导致华国锋下台。
description.en: At the Third Plenum of the 11th CPC Central Committee, Deng Xiaoping and others criticized the 'Two Whatevers', which were directly linked to Hua Guofeng, ultimately leading to Hua's removal from power.

description.zh-cn: 在中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会中，王光谦担任副主席，主席是王沪宁。
description.en: In the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC, Wang Guangqian serves as Vice Chairman under Chairman Wang Huning.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，王光谦获得清华大学水利工程硕士学位。1989年，王光谦获得清华大学水利工程博士学位。
description.en: In 1985, Wang Guangqian obtained a Master's degree in Hydraulic Engineering from Tsinghua University. In 1989, Wang Guangqian obtained a Doctoral degree in Hydraulic Engineering from Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦于1992年起在清华大学水利水电工程系任教，后成为博士生导师；并于2021年10月被任命为清华大学副校长。
description.en: Wang Guangqian began teaching at the Department of Hydraulic and Hydroelectric Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1992, later becoming a doctoral supervisor; he was also appointed as the Vice President of Tsinghua University in October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆时任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Yang Shangkun was the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东的指示下，阎明复于1975年4月获释出狱。
description.en: Under Mao Zedong's instruction, Yan Mingfu was released from prison in April 1975.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，经杨尚昆推荐，阎明复出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: In 1985, upon Yang Shangkun's recommendation, Yan Mingfu was appointed as the Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳时任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Zhao Ziyang was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件过程中的表现，阎明复被免去中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: Due to his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Yan Mingfu was dismissed from his positions, including Secretary of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发迫使中国人民解放军放弃跨海进攻台湾的计划。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War forced the People's Liberation Army to abandon its plan to attack Taiwan across the sea.

description.zh-cn: 在四清运动中被开除党籍、下放劳动。
description.en: During the Four Cleanups Movement, he was expelled from the party and sent to perform manual labor.

description.zh-cn: 朱厚泽的工作表现引起时任中共中央总书记胡耀邦的注意，后出任中共中央宣传部部长，成为胡耀邦的重要助手。
description.en: Zhu Houze's work performance caught the attention of then-General Secretary Hu Yaobang. He was later appointed as the head of the CPC Central Committee's Publicity Department, becoming an important aide to Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳创造机会使其复出，担任全国总工会领导职务。
description.en: Then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang created an opportunity for his political comeback, appointing him to a leadership position in the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛接替朱厚泽出任中国共产党贵州省委员会书记。
description.en: Hu Jintao succeeded Zhu Houze as Secretary of the CPC Guizhou Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军对驻守金门的国军部队发动了榴弹炮突击，引发第二次台湾海峡危机。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched a howitzer assault on the ROC forces stationed in Kinmen, triggering the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官吉星文在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: Ji Xingwen, Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, was killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月，经中央人民政府内政部部长曾山的推荐，钱正英被任命为华东军政委员会水利部副部长。
description.en: In March 1950, upon the recommendation of Zeng Shan, Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government, Qian Zhengying was appointed as the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Water Conservancy of the East China Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克于1989年11月1日向钱正英颁发了“友谊勋章”。
description.en: On November 1, 1989, Czechoslovakia awarded the 'Order of Friendship' to Qian Zhengying.

position.zh-cn: 水利电力部/水利部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power / Minister of Water Resources

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任部长期间，华国锋是时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as a minister, Hua Guofeng was the serving Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 水利部/水利电力部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources / Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任部长期间，赵紫阳是时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as a minister, Zhao Ziyang was the serving Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.en: Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任水利电力部部长期间，李鹏是时任中华人民共和国国务院代总理及总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, Li Peng was the serving Acting Premier and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由第十一届全国人民代表大会选举产生。
description.en: Elected by the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗被瓦剌送还后，景泰帝将其软禁于南内崇质宫，长达七年。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was returned by the Oirats, the Jingtai Emperor placed him under house arrest in the Southern Palace for seven years.

description.zh-cn: 徐有贞向复位的明英宗进言“不杀于谦，今日之事无名”，力主将于谦处死。
description.en: Xu Youzhen advised the restored Emperor Yingzong, 'If we do not execute Yu Qian, this affair (the coup) will have no legitimacy,' strongly advocating for Yu Qian's execution.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗在识破曹石之变后，将石亨囚禁至死。
description.en: After uncovering the Cao-Shi Rebellion, Emperor Yingzong imprisoned Shi Heng until his death.

description.zh-cn: 在土木堡之变期间，明朝与瓦剌处于战争状态。
description.en: During the Tumu Crisis, the Ming Dynasty was in a state of war with the Oirats.

description.zh-cn: 在德米特里·梅德维杰夫担任总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫担任工业和贸易部长。
description.en: During Dmitry Medvedev's premiership, Denis Manturov served as Minister of Industry and Trade.

description.zh-cn: 在弗拉迪米尔·普丁担任总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫担任代理工业和贸易部长。在普丁担任总统期间，曼图罗夫被任命为副总理并随其出访。
description.en: During Vladimir Putin's premiership, Denis Manturov served as Acting Minister of Industry and Trade. During Putin's presidency, Manturov was appointed Deputy Prime Minister and accompanied him on foreign visits.

description.zh-cn: 弗拉迪米尔·普京签署总统令，任命杰尼斯·曼图罗夫为副总理。
description.en: Vladimir Putin signed a presidential decree appointing Denis Manturov as Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 根据部分媒体报道，陈良宇事件是由令计划等人炮制的一起冤案。
description.en: According to some media reports, the Chen Liangyu incident was a wrongful conviction case orchestrated by Ling Jihua and others.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局会议决定对陈良宇立案调查，并免去其在上海市一切职务，停止其在中央担任的职务。
description.en: A meeting of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee decided to open an investigation into Chen Liangyu, remove him from all his posts in Shanghai, and suspend his duties at the central level.

description.zh-cn: 代表中共中央军委发出二月来信，要求毛泽东脱离部队前往中央，试图以此调解争端。
description.en: On behalf of the CCP Central Military Commission, sent the 'February Letter' requesting Mao Zedong to leave the army for the central headquarters, in an attempt to mediate the dispute.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，尤其是在白沙会议上，林彪毅然站到毛泽东一边，坚决支持毛，赢得了毛泽东数十年的绝对信任。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, especially at the Baisha Conference, Lin Biao resolutely sided with and supported Mao Zedong, earning Mao's absolute trust for decades.

description.zh-cn: 在白沙会议上坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: Resolutely supported Mao Zedong at the Baisha Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在富田事变后，利用其造成的不利影响轻易夺取了毛泽东的军权。
description.en: After the Futian Incident, he took advantage of its negative impact to easily seize military power from Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东等中国共产党高层发动了三反五反运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong and other senior leaders of the Communist Party of China launched the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 经毛泽东批准，三反五反运动于1952年10月结束。
description.en: With Mao Zedong's approval, the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns ended in October 1952.

description.zh-cn: 经周恩来批准，三反五反运动于1952年10月结束。
description.en: With Zhou Enlai's approval, the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns ended in October 1952.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平发现运动中的问题并向中共中央报告，促成了运动的结束。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping discovered problems in the campaign and reported them to the CPC Central Committee, contributing to its conclusion.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海副市长潘汉年于1952年2月5日做五反运动动员报告，推动了运动在上海的开展。
description.en: On February 5, 1952, then Deputy Mayor of Shanghai Pan Hannian delivered a mobilization report for the Five-anti campaign, promoting its development in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，因巩俐高考分数与艺术院校录取标准相差11分，中央戏剧学院招生组呈报文化部艺术教育司，获特批录取巩俐。
description.en: In 1985, as Gong Li's college entrance exam score was 11 points below the admission standard for arts institutions, the admissions team of the Central Academy of Drama reported to the Arts Education Department of the Ministry of Culture and received special approval to admit her.

description.zh-cn: 2000年5月，巩俐被任命为联合国教科文组织“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: In May 2000, Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace.

description.zh-cn: 赵国因接受韩国上党郡而与意图夺取该地的秦国爆发了长平之战，两国成为敌对交战方。
description.en: The State of Zhao's acceptance of Shangdang Commandery from Han led to the Battle of Changping with the State of Qin, which also intended to seize the territory, making the two states adversaries in the war.

description.zh-cn: 参与了朝鲜战争。
description.en: Participated in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党三明市委员会的业务上级机构是中国共产党福建省委员会。
description.en: The operational superior of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee is the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共福建省委批准成立中国共产党三明市委员会。
description.en: The CPC Fujian Provincial Committee approved the establishment of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 被明世宗朱厚熜任命为《永乐大典》重录工作的总校官。
description.en: Was appointed by the Jiajing Emperor (Zhu Houcong) as a general proofreader for the project to create a duplicate copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 在王沪宁担任全国政协主席期间，姜信治担任副主席。
description.en: While Wang Huning serves as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Jiang Xinzhi serves as a Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月至2017年11月任副部长，2017年11月升任常务副部长（正部长级）至2025年9月。
description.en: Served as Deputy Head from December 2015 to November 2017, and was promoted to Executive Deputy Head (minister level) from November 2017 to September 2025.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，姜信治任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
description.en: While Xi Jinping serves as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Jiang Xinzhi served as the Executive Deputy Head of the CCP Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 姜信治接替陈希出任中共中央组织部常务副部长。陈希时任中组部部长。
description.en: Jiang Xinzhi succeeded Chen Xi as Executive Deputy Head of the CCP Central Organization Department. Chen Xi was the Head of the Organization Department at the time.

description.zh-cn: 杜家毫担任中共湖南省委书记期间，向以习近平为总书记的中共中央负责。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee, Du Jiahao was responsible to the CPC Central Committee with Xi Jinping as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 授予杜家毫“全国优秀县委书记”称号。
description.en: Awarded Du Jiahao the title of 'National Outstanding County Party Secretary'.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲接替杜家毫，先后担任湖南省人民政府省长、中共湖南省委书记和湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Xu Dazhe succeeded Du Jiahao, serving successively as Governor of Hunan Province, Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee, and Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 徐麟接替杜家毫担任中共上海市浦东新区委员会书记。
description.en: Xu Lin succeeded Du Jiahao as Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Pudong New Area Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杜家毫接替栗战书担任黑龙江省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Du Jiahao succeeded Li Zhanshu as Executive Vice Governor of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 作为朝鲜人民军最高司令官，金日成是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: As the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army, Kim Il-sung was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The Korean People's Army was one of the signatory parties to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官。
description.en: Kim Il-sung served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 董良翚是董必武的女儿。
description.en: Dong Lianghui is the daughter of Dong Biwu.

description.zh-cn: 在御前会议上，裕仁天皇做出了接受《波茨坦宣言》条款、结束战争的“圣断”。
description.en: At the Imperial conference (Gozen Kaigi), Emperor Hirohito made the 'sacred decision' (Seidan) to accept the terms of the Potsdam Declaration and end the war.

description.zh-cn: 洪武四年四月，常氏被册封为皇太子妃，成为朱标的正妃。
description.en: In April of the fourth year of the Hongwu era (1371), Lady Chang was officially invested as the Crown Princess, becoming the primary consort of Zhu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 南唐灭亡后，李煜被俘至开封，受封为违命侯，处于宋太宗赵光义的控制之下。
description.en: After the fall of the Southern Tang, Li Yu was captured and taken to Kaifeng, where he was enfeoffed as the Marquis of Disobedience and lived under the control of Emperor Taizong, Zhao Guangyi.

description.zh-cn: 黄忠是刘备麾下将领，时任征西将军。
description.en: Huang Zhong was a general under Liu Bei, holding the title of General Who Conquers the West.

description.zh-cn: 赵云是刘备麾下的重要将领。
description.en: Zhao Yun was an important general serving under Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，赵云率部与曹操大军正面交锋，并使用空城计将其击退。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, Zhao Yun led his troops to confront Cao Cao's main army and repelled them using the empty fort strategy.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，黄忠在定军山之战中斩杀了夏侯渊。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Huang Zhong killed Xiahou Yuan in the Battle of Mount Dingjun.

description.zh-cn: 习近平被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者，该思想是在他2012年11月当选中共中央总书记后逐步形成的。
description.en: Xi Jinping is officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, which was gradually formed after he was elected General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee in November 2012.

description.zh-cn: 评价认为，习近平思想的14条方略没有任何理论创新，将其写入党章的本意在于树立绝对政治权威，便于排除异己，为其长期执政做铺垫。
description.en: Commented that the 14 strategies of Xi Jinping Thought have no theoretical innovation, and that writing it into the party constitution is intended to establish absolute political authority, facilitate the elimination of dissidents, and pave the way for his long-term rule.

description.zh-cn: 段祺瑞是皖系军阀的首领。
description.en: Duan Qirui was the leader of the Anhui clique.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央党校于2020年8月17日宣布开除蔡霞的中国共产党党籍，并取消其相关退休待遇。
description.en: On August 17, 2020, the Central Party School of the CCP announced the expulsion of Cai Xia from the Chinese Communist Party and the cancellation of her related retirement benefits.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1969年参军入伍，1978年退伍。
description.en: Cai Xia joined the army in 1969 and was discharged in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1992年考入中共中央党校，先后攻读硕士和博士学位，2000年获法学博士学位。
description.en: Cai Xia was admitted to the Central Party School of the CCP in 1992, where she pursued master's and doctoral degrees, obtaining her Doctor of Law degree in 2000.

position.en: Professor at the Party Building Teaching and Research Department

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞在中共中央党校任教，直至2012年退休。
description.en: Cai Xia taught at the Central Party School of the CCP until her retirement in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 1989年的六四事件使蔡霞对解放军向学生开火的行为感到十分震惊，影响了她的政治观点。
description.en: The 1989 Tiananmen Square incident deeply shocked Cai Xia due to the PLA's use of force against students, influencing her political views.

description.zh-cn: 2017年左右，刘亚洲因写信建议习近平调整新疆政策而被警告不要再妄议习近平的政策。
description.en: Around 2017, Liu Yazhou was warned not to question Xi Jinping's policies again after writing a letter suggesting adjustments to the Xinjiang policy.

description.zh-cn: 2020年1月上旬，习近平拒绝了总理李克强就新冠疫情启动应急响应机制的提议。
description.en: In early January 2020, Xi Jinping rejected Premier Li Keqiang's proposal to activate an emergency response mechanism for the COVID-19 outbreak.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在2007年中共十七大报告中首次提出了“尊重党员主体地位”的论断，推动了党内民主的讨论。
description.en: In his report to the 17th Party Congress in 2007, Hu Jintao first introduced the assertion of 'respecting the principal status of party members,' promoting discussions on intra-party democracy.

description.zh-cn: 任命李克强为中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Appointed Li Keqiang as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 选举习近平为中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Elected Xi Jinping as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝于前112年派兵十万分五路进攻南越国，并于次年将其平定。
description.en: In 112 BC, Emperor Wu of Han dispatched 100,000 troops in five columns to attack the Nanyue kingdom, pacifying it the following year.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣伍修权担任苏联红军翻译以参与中东路事件。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Wu Xiuquan to serve as a translator for the Soviet Red Army to participate in the Sino-Soviet conflict.

description.zh-cn: 伯笃鲁丁在元朝担任政治人物，官至礼部侍郎、达鲁花赤等。
description.en: Bo Dulu Ding served as a political figure in the Yuan dynasty, holding positions such as Vice Minister of Rites and Darughachi.

description.zh-cn: 两人在2012年香港行政长官选举中是主要竞争对手，选战过程激烈。
description.en: The two were major rivals in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election, which was a fierce contest.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记、国家主席胡锦涛为梁振英及香港第四届政府主要官员监誓。
description.en: Then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President of the PRC, Hu Jintao, administered the oath of office for Leung Chun-ying and the principal officials of the fourth-term Hong Kong government.

description.zh-cn: 时任国家副主席习近平在会见港澳政协委员时，先与梁振英阵营的委员刘梦熊握手，此举被外界解读为中央政府对梁振英的支持。
description.en: Then-Vice President Xi Jinping's handshake with Lew Mon-hung, a member of Leung Chun-ying's camp, during a meeting with Hong Kong and Macau CPPCC members was interpreted by outsiders as a sign of the central government's support for Leung.

description.zh-cn: 李小新兼任中国共产党中央委员会组织部副部长。
description.en: Li Xiaoxin concurrently serves as a Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐于1984年获得北京理工大学工学学士学位，后于2001年获得该校工学博士学位。
description.en: Xiang Changle received his Bachelor of Engineering degree from Beijing Institute of Technology in 1984, and subsequently his Doctor of Engineering degree from the same university in 2001.
